tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,Gynae Problems,Pregnancy Tests,
review:
From the moment I stepped into Dr. Meeta Mam's clinic, I knew I was in capable hands. Throughout my pregnancy journey, her unwavering empathy, expertise, and dedication made all the difference. 

Dr. Meeta Mam's holistic approach to healthcare impressed me from day one. She prioritized natural remedies over unnecessary medications, ensuring my well-being without compromising on safety. Her guidance on managing common pregnancy discomforts like gastric issues, coughs, and colds with natural methods was incredibly reassuring.

What truly sets Dr. Meeta Mam apart is her relentless support for a normal delivery. With patience and encouragement, she empowered me with ********* *** confidence, guiding me every step of the way. Even after delivery, her thorough post-pregnancy check-ups and proactive approach to women's health, including cervical cancer vaccinations, reaffirmed her commitment to holistic care.

I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Meeta Mam to anyone seeking exceptional pregnancy care in Bangalore. She not only ensures a smooth and happy pregnancy but also fosters a sense of joy and positivity throughout the journey. With Dr. Meeta Mam, pregnancy truly feels like the beautiful, natural process it is meant to be.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
During my pregnancy, like every expectant parents, we wanted the best for our baby and us. Luckily we knew Dr. Meeta before my pregnancy. She has done my polyp surgery. After that surgery I was very convinced of continuing with her for my pregnancy journey, and I’m very glad that we did. She is one of the best doctor I have ever met.
Dr. Meeta is exceptional in patient care and what I liked the most about her is her positivity and ability to put her patients at ease. She listened to all our questions and spent time for answering those and addressing all our concerns very patiently. 
 
Through my course of interaction with Dr. Meeta, I also felt that she possesses a unique quality of understanding that each patient is different and that she understood exactly what we needed. I was 38 when I conceived. I had a lot of complications in my pregnancy including hypertension, high blood sugar, low placenta position, low baby weight. But Dr. Meeta always kept me motivated and ensured that I don’t worry about things when not needed. She told to concentrate on that part which we can control and not concentrate on those which we can’t control.  She advised to take the entire journey of pregnancy and childbirth step by step which made it less overwhelming. She helped me to manage all my issues mainly through diet and lifestyle changes. She mainly focused on protein intake to increase baby’s weight. I really liked that she would recommend and encourage to follow home remedies to rectify a problem rather than prescribing medications. She also suggested options such as meditation and reiki to keep my stress under check.
 
She has not only been supportive and motivating during the entire period but also extremely understanding of all the apprehensions and questions that I had and helping me through it. She instilled all the needed confidence in us and at every stage took the best care possible with timely medications, counselling and advise. Every time, I visited her, the warm welcome and the positivity I got from her was the most important thing I needed.
 
During second trimester of my pregnancy we understood that we won’t be able to complete 40 weeks of pregnancy due to mu complications. So she prepared me accordingly and from 26 weeks she gave medication to mature baby’s lungs. Finally in 33+ weeks I have delivered baby girl via C section. Since the baby was premature and having LBW, she did all the arrangements to admit baby in the NICU under the care of Dr Ankur Rajavanshi after the delivery.
 
It needs a kind heart and immense presence of mind to handle such challenges and my case was a clear indication of her dedication to her profession and her patients. Dr Meeta was a blessing for us. Thank you Dr. Meeta and Cloud nine Team for all your support and guidance and for making my Pregnancy and childbirth journey so memorable. I would strongly recommend Dr Meeta.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnant Women Counseling,
review:
During my pregnancy, like every expectant mother, I wanted the absolute best for my baby and myself, and thus began my journey of finding the best gynecologist around Whitefield area. Quick check with family and friends resulted in a few renowned names and my husband and I visited all of them to find out who we are the most comfortable with. I was already past my first trimester when I first visited Dr. Meeta and after meeting her I was very convinced of continuing with her for my pregnancy journey, and I’m very glad that I did. 

Dr. Meeta is exceptional in patient care and what I liked the most about her is her positivity and ability to put her patients at ease. I think this is very crucial for first time moms like me who over-analyze and google every medical term. :) She listened to all my questions and spent proper time answering them and addressing all my concerns very patiently. After each visit I used to come back calm and relaxed.

Through my course of interaction with Dr. Meeta, I also felt that she possesses a unique quality of understanding that each patient is different and that she understood exactly what I needed. She listened to my expectations, kept me grounded, and explained what I can and cannot control. I had some issues during pregnancy - anemia, high BP, high weight gain, low placenta position, lower baby’s growth than expected in some scans, and sometimes the blood test reports were not normal. But Dr. Meeta always kept me motivated and ensured that I don’t worry about things when not needed. We took the entire journey of pregnancy and childbirth step by step which made it less overwhelming. She helped manage all my issues mainly through diet and lifestyle changes. I really liked that she would recommend and encourage to follow home remedies to rectify a problem rather than prescribing medications. She also suggested options such as meditation and reiki to keep my stress under check. 

Throughout my pregnancy Dr. Meeta was very supportive of my decision of trying for a normal delivery. I was admitted during my 39th week as my labour pains began and during the entire delivery process Dr. Meeta and her team kept me comfortable and encouraged me in every possible way for a normal delivery before I had to opt for an emergency C-section. Her team took exceptional care of me while I was recovering in the hospital. The initial few days may seem very daunting for a C-section mom, but Dr. Meeta personally kept a check on me, advised normal diet and reassured me that things are all good which helped me face my recovery with positivity. 

Dr. Meeta was everything I expected in my doctor. I’m glad I chose her to be my gynaecologist during my pregnancy. I’ve been consulting her even after my delivery, and can say with certainty that she’s not a doctor you would go to only during your pregnancy, but someone you would want to consult during motherhood as well. 

Thank you Dr. Meeta for all your support and guidance and for making my Pregnancy and childbirth journey so memorable.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We had decided to consult Dr.Meeta Chawan for my wife's pregnancy from 4th Month, trust me it was the best decision we made. Initially hospital allowed only mothers to meet the doctor due to COVID situation and I was worried, as either myself or any of our family members couldn't get a chance to directly speak to doctor. But when I got a chance to meet the doctor via video conference and 1st week of December 2020 , Dr Meeta cleared all our doubts patiently. 

My wife cervix dilated by 3 CM in the 36th week itself but she didn't get the labor pain and Dr. Meeta Chawan suggested to wait for few more days to get the labor pain naturally for normal delivery and doctor initially doesn't prefer to go for C-Section or for starting the medication to initiate the  labor pain.  Family and friends circle was putting lots of pressure on us to get admitted for delivery, so we have visited the hospital again in the midnight. 
Duty doctor in the CloudNine examined my wife condition and consulted with Dr. Meeta Chawan via phone, then they asked us to take decision whether to get admitted to start the medication for labor pain or wait for few more days.  We were not able to make the decision and was in dilemma. Duty doctor explained us the situation and cleared all our doubts. So we decided to go home. Next day visited Dr. Meeta chawan again in the morning for OT. 
Dr. Meeta gave lots of confidence on  why we can take risk by going home and wait for few more days for labor pain and she preferred to push for the deliver al-teast by  37th Week.  It was on 9th Dec and cervix dilated by 4 CM but still no labor pain and doctor suggested to get admitted by 12th Dec, even when my wife is not getting the labor pain.   

As doctor suggested we admitted my wife on 12th Dec morning and doctor started the medication to initiate the  labor pain. Finally it was normal delivery with assistance of vaccum extraction, as my wife was unable to push the baby and got exhausted in the final stage. Due to vaccum assisted birth, my child head had bulged a bit. Dr. Meeta and pediatrician, explained the condition and they gave confidence that it will go away and does not cause serious problems.   As they have mentioned, we see changes in baby head as the days goes on. 
 
Best part is Dr. Meeta Chawan and duty doctor allowed me to be in the labor ward at the time of delivery.  This is my life time experience  , because of this, I could realize the pain and value of mother. We are really feel so blessed with baby. So I would highly recommend Dr. Meeta Chawan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We actually started looking for a good gynaecologist near Whitefield when we decided to have our second baby a year back. We had three options to choose Cloudnine, Manipal and Columbia Asia. Based on our previous experience with Cloudnine we decided to go with the hospital but not sure which doctor to choose. I left the choice to my wife and she decided Dr. Meeta Chawhan. Right from our first visit after our decision to have baby till the last visit after post pregnancy she had complete trust on the doctor in whatsoever complication might arise during the scan or blood test. She overcame all the little complications just because of the trust she had. How did she build that trust? Is that important? Yes, we wouldn’t have had our baby if we didn’t trust her. As simple as that. How did that trust grow? 
Let me explain here, 
on our first visit she made us understand two things 1. Second pregnancy is not that easy as first because of the following reasons a) 5 years gap, b) extra weight gained than normal during those 5 year gap. She first made us to think, decide and act. We decided and went to her for the second visit after conception. She said the same thing and asked us to do few tests. Although, i’m not very impressed after the second visit but my wife was very strong that she wanted to continue with this doctor for only  one reason “she cares for me”. Her personal care towards the patients health during pregnancy and after the delivery is the at-most important. She made my wife feel confident and positive towards all the complications that arise during the pregnancy.  On the day of delivery we had lot more surprises than we expected, yes just minutes before taking her to LDR, the doctor noticed that the baby’s head wasn’t at the right position to come out.. Also, the baby couldn’t resist inside as it passed motion and started drinking water, That’s when we felt the real expertise and care to bring both the life’s alive and she decided everything in a fraction of minutes.  She immediately rushed her to OT and took the baby out after little struggle as the baby have moved sideways. The baby didn’t respond as soon it came out, the doctor took all our worries and made all the possibilities to make the baby cry and respond. It is just because of her care and expertise, I have my wife and daughter hail and healthy now. We are writing this review 5 months after delivery and 1.5 years after our first visit to strongly recommend the doctor as the situation we had to go through had been one in thousand cases or millions but it was a happy ending. 
To be frank my wife had less complaints post second delivery (c-sec) than the first one (normal). We just  got words to say “Thank You” to the doctor but pray a healthy and long life for her.

Regards,
Santhosh & Saranya

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Mita's extensive experience is undeniable, but her patient waiting list is considerable. The hospital's booking system schedules appointments every 10 minutes for new patients, yet the doctor must also attend to emergencies and some patients who require more time. Consequently, waiting times can be significantly prolonged during certain visits. Given the high volume of patients she attends to, the time allocated per patient is very limited. You may perceive that the doctor is in a rush to address your queries and may prefer you to move on swiftly to accommodate the next patient. It's crucial to reconsider this aspect, as accessibility to the doctor plays a vital role in your pregnancy journey. ***** *** **** ***** *********** ******* ** ********* *** *** ******** *** ********* **** ** ****** **** Even in our case, my wife raised a health concern during OPD visit, which she took lightly at the time. However, this resulted in further complications simply because Dr. Mita didn't spend enough time scrutinizing the problem as her schedule is overly packed.

review:
***** ***** ** ******** *** *** ** **** ******* *** **** ************* ** ********* *** we met Meeta ma’am. *** ** *** **** ****** * **** *** ** ** ***** It was such a blessing to find a doctor like her. If someone talk to her they will be more relaxed. *** **** *** ******* *** *********** *********** She always encouraged me to enjoy the pregnancy journey. I was having a fear for pregnancy pain. But trust me she will take care of all. It was very smooth. I was back to my daily routine with in a week. I highly recommend her. 
Thank you ma’am for making this journey so effortless and wonderful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am writing this review to express my deepest appreciation and gratitude for the exceptional care taken by Dr. Meeta during the delivery of my second child. Her patience, expertise, and kindness made the whole experience a memorable and pleasant one.

The doctors approach to pregnancy and childbirth was refreshing and reassuring. I really appreciated the fact that she did not recommend any unnecessary medications, scans, or tests. She always prioritized my well-being and the well-being of my baby above anything else.

Her advice on maintaining a healthy diet and exercise routine was invaluable. It helped me to stay healthy throughout my pregnancy and to recover quickly after childbirth. I cannot thank Dr. Meeta enough for the guidance and support provided during this time.

I would also like to thank Dr.Meeta for being so accommodating and understanding of my needs and preferences. She was always available to answer my questions and address my concerns. Her positive attitude and caring nature made me feel at ease and gave me the confidence to trust the doctor with the delivery of my child.

Once again, I am grateful for the exceptional care and expertise. Dr. Meeta had truly made a difference in my life and the life of my family. I will always remember her kindness, professionalism, and dedication to her patients.

I really admire her hardwork and I have seen her in hospital even on Sunday's for IP rounds.

Dr. Meeta an amazing gynaecologist, and we are forever grateful to her. 

Highly recommended doctor !!!!!

We are blessed with a beautiful daughter and still continue to visit her.

review: I feel really blessed to have Dr Meeta as my gynaecologist during my pregnancy. She is an excellent doctor and a very positive person. One of the things we liked about her and what makes her stand out is her focus on natural remedies *** *** *********** *********** ************ Throughout my pregnancy she suggested in home remedies as much as possible, staying active and controlling my weight with the right food intake and exercises. Her guidance made both my pregnancy and delivery very smooth. Even during the 9th month, when we had complications, She handled them well, did not make us panic and as a result I had a normal  delivery with a healthy baby boy. Thank you Doctor Meeta for all your support and guidance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have been consulting Dr. Meeta Chawhan for the last 1+ years for pregnancy care and child birth at Cloudnine hospital, Whitefield.

We are extremely grateful to have met Dr. Meeta. We were extremely cautious about the whole pregnancy and childbirth experience. Dr. Meeta made us feel comfortable every step of the way and made the whole experience enjoyable.

We were tested positive for the virus during the 5th month of pregnancy, and were really concerned since we had lost a close family member to the illness just the year before. But Dr. Meeta helped us get through it smoothly and with as little medication as possible. 

Most of her treatment is natural. She suggests lot of natural remedies to most of the complaints. She only prescribes medicines when it is absolutely necessary.

She keeps us informed on what to expect at every stage of the pregnancy. This helps us to be mentally and physically prepared. 

We had opted for elective C section early on, but our case became an emergency unfortunately on the day of the surgery. The whole team at the ER at Cloudnine handled the situation professionally. There were a few other emergency cases that day and several planned C sections for that particular day. Dr. Meeta and her team kept visiting us in the IP room all this time, and kept advising us on the treatment options. 

Everything went smoothly and we are blessed with a baby girl.

We were overall more than satisfied with the experience at Cloudnine and with Dr. Meetha Chawhan. All her guidance and treatment made the whole experience very pleasant. We highly recommend Dr. Meeta for her experience and professionalism.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We found Dr. Meeta's profile over internet when we were browsing through the gynaecologist list for our pregnancy. As per the review, we planned to visit her and post the visit we decided to continue with her.

She had a very positive aura around her which helped me throughout my pregnancy. She always made me very comfortable with her calmness and made sure all of my queries are answered with logical reasoning.

It was advised to me to have all types of food and keep no restriction on the same. Ofcourse, the food was supposed to be home cooked; mainly protein rich since it helps in the growth of baby weight.

I really liked how she has always been in favor of not taking unnecessary medicines and try to cure the issues by natural methods (i.e. home remedies).

Her whole staff members has been very supportive during my delivery. Each and every person made sure that I get the bestest care not only physically but mentally too.

In the LDR, the whole experience (had a vaginal/normal delivery) just felt like a magical one just because of her and her team! 

How can I ever forget those words right after my last push 'Congratulations, it's a girl!'.

It was a very emotional moment for my husband and me. She gave us a few minutes with the baby to relish that moment which I can never thank her enough for.

The best thing was having my husband by my side throughout the delivery which was again supported by her. Huge thanks to her for this.

Generally, there are many restrictions on consuming all types of food right after the delivery for 1.5 months irrespective of the type of delivery one has had (which I feel is a myth, now). But, she advised me to have anything and everything healthy. I was also asked to start with walking so that the healing process gets faster.

And, it really did help me!

I'm still in touch with her for my post-natal care.

If I had to do all over again; I would do just because of the confidence and trust I have on her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy with PCOD,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
We were looking for a good gynaecologist when we got to know that we were expecting. We got to know about Dr Meeta Chawhan through online search and the experience has been very good since day One.
As this was my first pregnancy, I always had so many doubts and concerns and she used to answer all of them with proper reasoning. As soon as you enter her room in OPD, she greets you with so much warmth and makes sure that all your queries are answered properly. She is very positive and polite. Another best thing which I like about her is that she never advices to take unnecessary medicines and always focus on home remedies which are very easy to follow. 
She always made sure that my weight was under control and focused on diet and fitness. She suggest diet (Good protein intake) which makes sure that the baby’s growth is good.  
She always motivated me for normal delivery however, due to certain medical conditions we had to opt for a planned C section which also went very smoothly all because of her. Due to some personal reasons, we decided to go for the surgery during wee hours and she agreed at once. I would also like to appreciate all her OT staff(Assistant Surgeon, Anesthesiologist and all others) present during the surgery. They were all very cooperative and made sure that I was very comfortable during the delivery.
In case of any doubts, she responds on text as well without any delay. 
My pregnancy journey was a blessing all because of Dr. Meeta and we have been blessed with the best gift of our lives through her. Our baby boy is 5.5 months old now and her words during the delivery still echoes in my ears (“Aparna it’s a boy”).
I am still in touch with her for post pregnancy check ups and I am always excited to meet her because of her positive attitude (specially to listen to that first energetic line “Hi Aparna, what’s happening. Kya ho raha hai aaj.” 

It’s really hard to find Doctors like her these days. I would highly recommend her to all the couples who are looking for a good gynaec.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I would highly recommend Dr. Meeta Chawhan as she’s not just an extremely knowledgeable doctor who is good at what she does but also has the patience to listen to the patient, provide care that a patient needs, energy and enthu that lifts the patient’s morale and the friendliness that she brings into the conversation that takes out all fears and one can openly talk! 
She was recommended to me by one of my friends and I am glad to have her as my doctor when I became pregnant after a miscarriage. My prenatal test results (NIPT) showed some complications, we were extremely tensed and were not ready to hear the bad news / loose the baby. She patiently listened to our concerns and queries, removed all misconceptions, explained the positives and negatives of taking up further tests and also explained the complication in a very clear manner plus what NIPT screen test meant. It gave us confidence to take up amniocentesis to further get clarity if the issue is really there or not. Luckily amnio results all came negative and we now have a healthy girl baby. 

She encourages healthy eating and make up for the deficiency rather than prescribing a medicine. She monitors closely and then prescribes a medicine only if it’s absolutely necessary. She also recommends certain home remedies along with eating healthy and medicine supplements (if needed). She always says “Mother should have a balanced diet, with good amount of protein, fruits and vegetables and lesser carbs and stay healthy. The one gaining weight has to be the baby!” 

Thank you, Doc! It was your medical advice and guidance that helped us (including my dead husband here as he was anxious too after the NIPT, Amnio etc etc) sail through the 9 months and give birth to a beautiful baby girl + recover well from c-section. Thanks for making our journey easier and a memorable one.

We would unquestionably recommend Dr. Meeta to all expecting mothers and the ones who are thinking of starting their family! 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy Check Up,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review: I started consulting Meeta Mam from my 4th Month of pregnancy. I was a primi with Rh -ve blood group and husband Rh ve. In my double marker test there was one factor called Pappa and beta hcg which was low for me . In my anamoly scan it was detected that i am carrying a small baby (10th perct). I never had bp,sugar,thyroid no other health issue i was always helathy and had a normal weight,still i landed up complication of iugr,low afi and raised pi . It was Meeta Mam who came as a Angel like Doctor or a god in anonymous face,who from thestarting have guided me . Food medication exercise everything she cared like a mom and i followed her advice. Due to IUGR baby and low AFI ,High PI value in 33 weeks she suggested me to get Lungs maturity injection i got that . With her strict guidance and almighty blessing i prolonged my pregnancy to 37 weeks 4 days.But due to these complication she suggested me for C sec as it was a risky condition for baby as growth was already stopped.Like an angel she did my C section and i got my Baby girl safely on my hand without any complication or requirement of NICU though she weigh just 2kg . Her advice is v v imp to follow if you have risk in pregnancy.I strongly recommend meeta mam for everyone if you want to consult for a safe pregnancy.She was like God to me and my husband cause of whom i got my baby girl safely.Thank You Meeta Mam you are truely super doctor i have ever came through.The patience level,confidence and positiveness ,politeness and cheerful habit is something makes you unique in all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had a great experience with Dr.Meeta.
She was recommended to me by one if my friend.
I was new in Whitefield so went ahead with their recommendation and now have no regrets.**** ******* ******* *** *********** *************Since i had a miscarriage in my first pregnancy and i was prescribed susten medicine for my second pregnancy, i started having the medicine with my previous doctor's consultation.
But when i met her, she suggested me to stop it as it was unnecessary and was causing a lot of nausea and vomiting in my first trimester.
I was scared but followed her.
Everything went well with reduced nausea vomiting.
She always gave me home remedies to help with my acidity issues, vomit issues.
She always emphasized on the importance of balanced diet, with good amount of protein, fruits and vegetables and lesser carbs so that we can avoid diabetes issues and weight gain issues.
For stress management, she suggested me to go natural way by following reiki instead of any medications.
Very friendly doctor.
Would always listen to all my queries no matter how silly they were.
Since i had first delivery normal, she was always sure i would have normal delivery and push me to walk and stay active.
Even till last day, she was hoping for a normal delivery even with a macrosomic baby and ready to try but clearly stated the complications that could occur.
But since even the baby position wasn't favourable plus complications that could happen due to macrosomic baby, she had to go ahead with a c section.
And i am really thankful to her for her suggestion, as normal delivery would have caused more harm than good to me and my baby due to his birth weight.
I panicked during my c section and she took good care of me and informed my family outside about it and told them she has given me resting medication.

She would always reply to my whatsapp messages if anything urgent.
I had eclampsia post pregnancy, and she took great care of me.
She informed her staff and me on whatsapp on what to follow when i was on an emergency at night and followed up.
She still remembers my case after 3 months of delivery and always replies to my whatsapp messages saving unnecessary trips to the hospital.
Would always recommend Dr.Meeta to moms to be

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Obstetrics Problems,Maternal Care/ Checkup,
review:
I consulted Dr Meeta once for spotting problem and second time for pregnancy. For spotting she suggested natural way of weight reduction rather than going for tests and scan. She suggested to observe for 2 months, if then also problem doesn’t get resolved then I should go for scan. But with her advice on diet and exercise I reduced weight from 89 kgs to 67 kgs and the problem went away on its own. Doctor is very straight forward and practical, she will understand your situation well and suggest natural ways first rather than going for medicines or diagnostics. That really helps a lot in growing confidence in you and motivates you to work towards your problem yourself. Doctor also listens to your problem patiently and lets
you express well, she clarifies all your queries.
Second time I went to her for my pregnancy. Throughout this period I had some issues but she handled everything very nicely suggesting to drink lots of water, frequent food intake, exercises ,walking and working till the last day before delivery. That really helped me to stay confident and lead a very normal life throughout my pregnancy. I had a c section though doctor tried for normal delivery but my cervix didn’t open 3 cm so I opted for it. But magically I started feeling fit and started to do all work after 6 weeks of my delivery. Her skill in operating is appreciable as the cut healed really fast. I would always suggest Dr Meeta for everyone women I know. Even many of my friends, colleagues and relatives are also consulting her and they are also very happy with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Like everyone we too had too many doubts and concerns about pregnancy but the moment we started consulting Dr.Meeta in 2018 for our 1st baby all our worries were gone. The confidence she instills in mothers is truly impeccable. She listens and answers every query you have. She doesn't rush nor will scare you in case of any issues with pregnancy. 
Our 2nd pregnancy journey) Feb 22nd 2020 we shifted to pune from Bangalore, may 16th 2020 my wife was pregnancy positive, she was not happy as our son was still 1.7years old. My wife contacted Dr.Meetha whether to continue or abort but she strongly suggested her to continue since 1st baby was normal vaginal delivery.Till 3rd month my wife consulted Dr.Smitha in cloudnine Kalyaninagar. We took certificate to cross borders during critical covid situation, soon my wife finished her 3rd month scan we were in urge to consult back Dr.Meetha back in Bangalore.
Even after traveling 900kms from Pune to Bangalore in car due to covid situation Dr.Meetha didn't insist for a scan she said everything will be alright no need of unnecessary scan.
This pregnancy wasn't smooth like the 1st one, my wife had severe tooth ache, scatic nerve pain, amniotic fluid level high, thrice severe false contractions, Trans position of the baby in 37th week. Inspite of all these Dr.Meetha suggested exercises, healthy food habits, good lifestyle *** ***** *********** *********** 38th week my wife had a normal vaginal delivery. Dr.Meetha never discussed about cesarean section in any of the consultation.
*** ** *** ***** I am very thankful and grateful for keeping my wife safe and positive throughout the pregnancy. She is no less than an Angel who delivered my baby boy on 6th Jan 2019 and a baby girl on 2nd Feb 2021 and kept my wife and my angels safe. Truly blessed to find such a doctor. Above all, a better human being who has been compassionate, patience, positive vibes and supportive irrespective of what time you contact her.
We would highly recommend Dr.Meeta to any one who is carrying without a second thought in mind. We are truly honored madam. Thank you very much 😊 Definitely my wife misses you, she is always inspired by Dr.Abdul Kalam, Sadhguru, Anupama Vriksham and Dr.Meetha.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have started the consultation with Dr Meeta from the begining itself. Doctor is very friendly. Never put any unnecessary restrictions on anything. Always optimistic and has positive attitude. It was our first pregnancy and from day one she was telling us to prepare for a normal delivery. We were bit worried whether we will be able to have a normal delivery but doctor was always sure. In the 9th month, our last visit to doctor, she told us to get admitted the next day and also told us that doctor can only assist but actual delivery mother has to do so be ready for long labour hours. If you can bare the pain we can deliver without C section. We attended lamaze session in 35th month. The physiotherapist, Dr Nitha, taught us different breathing techniques and different stages of labour and how to differentiate between false labour and actual labour pain. We admitted to the hospital by 10:30 pm in night and labour pain started by around 5 am in morning. Nurses were in constant touch with doctor, the whole night. By around 6am Dr Meeta visited us and by 6:45 we got our son delivered. It was a normal delivery. Me and my wife were literally on Cloud Nine. That day only we knew what is meant by Khushi ke Aashu. It was a feeling that no one explain in words.  One thing, I specifically want to mention is that the breathing exercises was really helpful. I accompany my wife in the labour room. She was in enormous pain and I was literally clueless and had no idea what to do. That time only one thing helped us, the different breathing techniques we learned during the lamaze session. We are very thankful to the Doctor for her guidance and patience through out our pregnancy. Thank you Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I started consulting Dr. Meeta from day one of my pregnancy. I was worried about selecting the best doctor for my pregnancy and did a lot of research before selecting my doctor and I must say that this was the best decision I took. She has not only been supportive and motivating during the entire period but also extremely understanding of all the apprehensions and questions that I had and helping me through it. This resulted in a smooth prenatal period. She also encouraged home remedies for most issues and this was great as it helped avoid unwanted medications. 

I also really appreciate the fact that I could have open communication with doctor on any matter and receive answers that helped manage my entire pregnancy. Also due to COVID situation, we could not travel to the hospital for all check ups and had to consult doctor via video call. I was initially worried how this would impact me but all my doubts were removed because even during video calls, Dr. Meeta enquired about my condition and provided solutions as needed. I felt there was no difference in the treatment provided on call compared to physical check up. 

She is also highly responsive and responsible to/for her patients and this is a great quality. I had to rush to the hospital as my water broke and she was available and responding to the on call doctor and nurses at the hospital and guiding and checking up on the situation regularly. I really appreciate this as this put my worry to rest and I was more confident knowing that my doctor was available. Also, I must say that once doctor arrived and I saw her in the room, all my fears ended. This is the type of confidence that she builds in her patients. 

I look forward to continue having my check ups with doctor Meeta even after my delivery. Thank you doctor for making the entire journey a happy and wonderful one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It should not be treated as a review. Its a heartfelt note to doctor Meeta from a new born's parent. We visited her in Cloudnine, 9 months back at the onset of our pregnancy journey . Say it our luck or any blessing we chose her as our doctor. While am no one to judge her expertise/knowledge , we were rest assured from day 1 with her advices. Short, Crisp yet the important ones she tactfully answered all our doubts , queries with much friendliness and calmness. I had a thyroid issue which when discussed with her at the beginning, got rightfully treated throughout and didnt had any major complications. The best part is the positive vibes that she radiates which reduces half of the problem for a patient . *** ******* ********* *********** ********* *** rightfully preempts future needs and gives medication accordingly. For example, I had taken vitamins, proteins  and iron medicines much ahead of time under her guidance and that truely reflected when the fetus was growing in size. But the part for which me and my family will be ever indebted to her would be the last crucial days before delivery. I was supposed to have a C-Section and just 2 days before  delivery I was diagnosed with Covid-19 positive. While the entire family was in a state of shock, she was super confident in getting the delivery done with no issues and right after 2 days I was blessed with a healthy baby boy and from day 1 Dr. Meeta ensured the baby stays with the mother and yet be protected from getting infected from the virus. After 1 month now to those situation when we reflect back we feel we could not have asked for a better doctor and  a better consultation in my pregnancy time. While am still continuing post delivery checkups with her , am looking for a long time association with her for any gyne related issues. *** ** *** **** *** *** **** ******** Thank you doctor Meeta for all your advices and help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr. Meeta Chawhan for the pregnancy period from the second trimester onwards till the delivery of our baby. We are extremely happy and satisfied with all the expert guidance provided by the doctor.We started consultations with the doctor on a trial basis. Due to covid, only I was allowed inside the doctor’s chamber. It was very new and scary to me to consult the doctor alone without my husband as this was my first pregnancy. My fears were soon to be quelled by doctor’s smile. Her friendly demeanor relaxed me and made me comfortable. She answered all my questions calmly and provided me with her valuable guidance. I was very impressed with the first consultation and hence we decided to continue with her.Before every consultation, I and my husband would discuss and write down our questions. We were able to get answers to all our questions. The doctor always provided a thorough explanation after her diagnosis. The doctor provided guidance about my health, the baby’s health, diet and exercises to aid the pregnancy as well as the baby and numerous other pregnancy related aspects. All the guidance, suggestions and the expert help provided by the doctor helped us in having a smooth and enjoyable pregnancy period.The doctor is straight to the point and hence it helped us to set the right expectations about the pregnancy period and the delivery. The doctor always pushed us and guided us towards a healthy pregnancy period and normal delivery. However, we were made aware of the last minute uncertainties regarding the normal delivery. I rushed to hospital during my 40th week of pregnancy due to the water break. The labor had not started yet. The doctor pushed for a normal delivery even then and tried various methods to induce labor. Since none of them worked, we were briefed about the risks and were suggested to undergo a caesarian section. The surgery was successful and we were blessed with a healthy baby.I recovered quickly from the surgery. It has been three months I had the delivery. I’m still regularly consulting the doctor and following up with her guidance. It has been a very joyous, memorable and fruitful journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am very happy visiting Dr Meeta Chowhan. I went to her with my friend's reference who had an IVF and shared very good review to us. This was my first pregnancy and due to Corona situation I used to visit her alone as my husband had to wait outside. But I never felt any doubt on her and took any second opinion. She guided me very well through out my pregnancy till my delivery and I always trusted her. he used to be always very positive and to the point. I also felt that she is very friendly and makes comfortable to discuss any problem or answering any question which is very important during this whole journey. But she does not discuss things very prior like when I asked whether I can have a normal delivery or c section in my 7th month she said I still have lot of time for that and explained the possibilities for both. For sometime I thought may be she will prefer c section for me as she did not say anything definitely but I trusted her as she explained the things properly. And my thought was wrong. I understood this at the end, actually we can't predecide these things and she was absolutely right. At beginning there was no complicacy in my pregnancy, but in last scan it was found that amniotic fluid is less, baby weight is lilltle more 3.6 kgs and there is a cord in baby's neck. For these things she suggested an early induction in 39th week and she told that there might be a c section required for the complications but we will first try normal. At that point of time it was absolutely fine for me and I followed her suggestions. And she really guided and supported me till end and I had a normal delivery. I am grateful to be blessed with my little angel and we both are healthy. I really thank her for being with me in my whole journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review: I am under Dr.Meeta's consultation since May 2019. I faced 5th month miscarriage the same year. But she encouraged us to think positive and finally in Feb 2021 I delivered a baby boy under her treatment. She is the right combination of strictness and empathy that a doctor needs. Her knowledge combined with her calmness makes the patient trust her. She takes time to explain each topic the patient asks. We always used to ask a lot of questions, sometimes repeated ones but she explained them each time with same amount of zeal.  She is more focussed on keeping one healthy by changing diet, food habits and sitting postures. Always insisted on home cooked food and using regular spices from the kitchen.  I feel even after pregnancy I should follow her those tips as they will help me have a healthier life. So, this time too I faced short cervical length for which she gave right treatment and not rushed us to go towards cerclage (surgery which helps sometimes in short cervical length issue). We chose not to do that surgery. Every week she motivated me not to think about last pregnancy but to keep myself optimistic. Amid so much information from friends and family, she was the ultimate source of truth for me. Further in 27th week, I faced high sugar and cervical funnelling. She gave treatment to strengthen baby’s lungs. In 37th week, we had to rush to hospital in late night emergency. She came at that time and successfully did C-section (which was call of the moment) to deliver my baby. She was randomly assigned to us when we took appointment in 2019 and I am thankful to God for this.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Name: Stefy Sarah Philips
Delivery type: Normal vaginal delivery
Doctor: Dr. Meeta Chawhan
Hospital: Cloudnine Whitefield

My experience with Dr. Meeta Chawhan at Cloudnine was nothing short of phenomenal.

I had mainly 2 requests during my pregnancy:
1. To have a normal delivery, provided there's no serious health risk to me or my baby
2. To prevent the use of unnecessary medicines through out, and opt for their natural alternatives instead.

Luckily, Doctor Meeta's priorities as well aligned with mine - she did precisely this, and much more. She is honest, blunt as well as forthright, and emphasizes eating right, exercising and maintaining a healthy physique.

Dr. Meeta is extremely experienced in the field and knowledgeable, and inspires confidence. When she entered the room during my labour, her manner and actions assured me that someone super-qualified was in the driver's seat - and everything was going to be alright. Her able guidance allowed me to have just 3 hours of active labour, which culminated in the delivery of a healthy baby boy.

I remain forever grateful to Dr. Meeta for a cherished and memorable pregnancy, with absolutely no worries or concerns throughout. The duty doctors and staff of Cloudnine were immensely helpful and did a superb job as well during my admission. The facilities provided at Cloudnine Whitefield are definitely worth a mention with doctors visiting and guiding you every step of the way, all of which contributed to a really amazing pregnancy and delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *Short review*You should definitely choose Dr. Meeta as your doctor if1. You are someone who prefers natural delivery over c section 2. You prefer to take in nutrition more through food rather than supplements. The doctor gives you the required supplements but doesn't go overboard with them.  She prefers you taking your nutrition through natural foods3. You are ok with not getting answers to questions that aren't important at that point of time, like asking questions around natural delivery or c section in the first month.. Rest assured, she will answer all your questions at the right time. And it makes sense to do that as she doesn't want the mother to take unnecessary stress about things which are not even to be thought about at that point of time*Long review*We were new to Bangalore and didn't know any gynecologist.  We checked for doctors on practo and came across Dr. Meeta's profile. We saw very high number of positive reviews and most of them mentioned that she is more inclined towards natural delivery and remedies. Thats what made us choose herDr. Meeta is an excellent doctor. Through the entire 9 months, there wasn't even one instance when we thought of taking a second opinion about her advice.  This was inspite of me having a family full of doctors who are surgeons and specialists. We could have easily cross verified what she told us to do, through our contacts. But the way she explains the reason for all the things she tells you to do or for the medicines she gives is simply outstanding.Through out the 9 months she was patient enough to answer all our questions. But as I said before she won't really answer questions that are not relevant at that time. She'll tell you "there's still a lot of time for that. Don't think about it right now. We'll look at that when the time comes". Which is the right thing to do in my opinion. An expecting Mother shouldn't be thinking about unnecessary things and adding stress to her pregnancyEven during the time of delivery Dr. Meeta was extremely professional and had the right balance of motivating the mother and pushing her to push harder for the baby to come out. I would certainly recommend her to anyone we meet. It's a definite 10/10. You would be extremely lucky to get your baby delivered through her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We visited Dr. Meeta Chauwhan @ whitefield, Bangalore. Consultation started right from the first trimester. We were actually scared with the whole covid 19 pandemic and how things will turn out with delivery with all the covid 19 pandemic and associated risks.

Dr. Meeta has been very friendly through out the journey.  Aside the scans we seldomly visited the hospital for consultations. Most of the time the consultation was over the video/online unless physically check up was really needed. Dr. ensured that we are comfortable and explained everything in detail, answered all our queries. She helped us overcome the fear of delivering during covid. We never felt that consultation is being done over video. Consultation prescription and lab/scan reports were uploaded on the cloud nine mobile app.
Dr. Meeta advocated more on eating good than taking supplements or medicines. Our case was a little complicated with fibroid in uterus. We were nervous but she explained the complications, associated risks, possibilities and how to manage all this very nicely. With the dos / dons and diet suggested by Dr. we could control the fat and unnecessary body weight, pain due to fibroids and focused on babies health.
Considering the fibroid and twisted uterus, Dr. suggested to go for c section and managed the delivery smoothly. 
Post delivery we continue to consult and Dr is assisting with healing of uterus, recovery and fibroid treatment. 
It has been a great experience. We highly recommend Dr. Meeta.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was referred to Dr Meeta by Dr Manju Nair who treated me for repeated failure in pregnancy. Having been married for 9 long years somehow motherhood kept evading me and we reached a point when I had almost given up all hopes. Three times I conceived, but by 10th or 12th weeks I would miscarry. All doors and windows seemed shut. Finally we were referred to Dr Manju Nair at Cloud Nine Babs she ensured I succeeded getting pregnant with twins and referred us to Dr Meeta to take the pregnancy successfully forward. I still remember the first meeting with Dr Meeta. It was on 16 Mar 2020 with my first scan report. She literally surprised us with her overflowing energy and positivity. She instilled all the needed confidence in us and at every stage took the best care possible with her timely medications, counselling and advise. She was not just a doctor, but a great friend, philosopher and guide. My entire pregnancy was such a smooth journey under her care and practical approach to dealing with the entire 9 months. The last minute before delivery challenged our family like a demon in mask. As it was decided that we will need to go for C Section, everything was planned for 03 October 2020. As a protocol during this pandemic I had to get a covid test done and came the result as a boomerang. in spite of taking all precautions I tested positive and by 01st night my fluid levels went low and the babies had to be delivered on emergency. She took the best of all her efforts to ensure to get all arrangements done in cohesion with the hospital management and safely delivered my babies on 02nd October 2020 afternoon. She didn't stop with that but went and extra mile to get me moved to another hospital for covid management and entrusted my babies in the NICU under the care of Dr Ankur Rajavanshi as they were born late preterm at 36 weeks 5 days. It needs a kind heart and immense presence of mind to handle such challenges and my case is a clear indication of her dedication to her profession and her patients. I would strongly recommend Dr Meeta. She would reach me everyday to check on my health and also update me on how my babies were doingBeing under the care of Dr Meeta through your pregnancy means being safe. Thank you doctor...

review:
I am consulting Dr. Meeta Chawhan for my wife since 2018 *** *** ** *** **** ************ ** **** **** In this entire 3 years of journey she has really helped my wife at each moment and gave *** **** treatment to her. This October we got blessed with a baby boy and its just because of Dr. Meeta. 
We are blessed and grateful to have a doctor like her. Apart from her job, she really do care about her patients, she was always available in the difficult time of Covid also (Video as well as in person whenever required). She is a true example of a great doctor who has actually given her full life for the service of mankind.
Our Story starts from 2018 when my wife was carrying and everything was fine till 6 Months of pregnancy but suddenly baby heartbeat stopped on its own and we both went in shock and rushed to Dr. Meeta. She calmly handled everything and not just did normal delivery but also did counselling of my wife in her hospital stay. Her positive attitude gave positiveness to us also.  she has really supported my family in those difficult times. She monitored my wife health 24*7 at C9 hospital, Attending doctor/nurses used to call Dr. Meeta every 4-5 hours at nights also (once at 2-3 AM and then at 6 AM). She always lifted the phone and guided the attending doctor. 
Now in 2020 my wife`s pregnancy journey started again with Dr. Meeta`s guidance and in these 9-10 months she is always available & answered all the questions of my wife and gave the best possible guidance and treatment. she always respond all the messages and calls in the difficult time of Covid also. With god`s grace we are blessed with a baby boy last month. I would strongly recommend Dr. Meeta Chawhan  :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I have been consulting Dr. Meeta for last 4 years. 4 years back I consulted her for UTI and then for all my gyanac issues. She is always positive herself and encourage her patients also to be positive in any situation. For someone like me who hates to take medicines frequently unless essential, She suggests lot of natural and home remedies. I would like to call out my experiences with her for my Pregnancy and Delivery. In my 20th week, I was diagnosed with short cervix during the 2nd anomaly scan. This could lead to Pre-Term Delivery. She advised me complete and strict bed rest and assured me that we would and are doing everything possible in terms of medications and other precautions so that Pre-Term Delivery doesn't happen. She suggested me to take small steps and target - 1 week at a time and go through each week. Due to Covid-19 lockdown and my bed rest we tried to do video consultation frequently and as usual she always made me feel positive and relaxed. And at the same time, she also assured me that in extreme case scenarios, even if I deliver baby Pre-Term, we will take of him/her. Finally I delivered a healthy baby boy in my 37th week. Everyone had told me that you were in bed rest for four months, and it would definitely be a C-Section but Dr. Meeta proved them wrong as I had Normal delivery. More than medications and bed rest, I feel it was Dr. Meeta's positivity and talking, that helped me go through this tricky situation quite comfortably. Her Medical management, home & natural remedies that she suggested along with her positivity are boon for patients like me. Thank you Dr. Meeta.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We consulted Doctor Meeta for our first pregnancy.  From the very first meet, we were convinced that we are going to continue with her during this journey. She has an amazing positive spark in her that calms new parents and brings a great sense of self belief. During this whole 9 months of consulting her, she never advised to take supplements or unnecessary medicines rather she was pushing for home made remedies. She was very clear from day 1 that we should attempt for a normal delivery. She was very strict with the diet and made us understood the need to excerise and maintain a high protein diet. This eventually helped me not to gain extra weight. On Couple of occasions, I had to get admit due to severe nausea/vomiting(2nd month), Dr was available to guide us through calls even during the wee hours of the day. This was during Covid and with no family members able to come from home town, we were terrified how things will go during labour and after delivery. Few sessions with Dr meeta in week 37-38 helped us in regaining our confidence. During the labour, I was unable to bear the pain and almost screamed at the staff to take me to OT and do a C section. It was Dr meeta who hold me like a guardian angel and gave the strength to bear the pain and go for a normal vaginal delivery. The way she conducted the whole delivery process was so beautiful. As I am writing this, I and my whole family thank Dr Meeta for the being so nice and assuring.For all ladies and upcoming parents, your search for a great Gynecologist stops here.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

Let it be consultation in person or via video call.. Or via messaging. She was standing besides me to give all the courage and support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr. Meeta Chawhan for my second pregnancy after reading the reviews on practo. I had mishap during my first pregnancy. After meeting Dr Meeta the first thing she told me to forget the past and look forward being positive. During each visit she made me more positive and confident. Else I was overly terrified and scared each days during the 1st trimester. I started consulting her during the 2nd trimester of this phase. She made my journey so enjoyable. Apart from being a good Obstetrician she is one of the best human being who always bring positivity in her patients. During the journey the way she suggested about the diet , exercises and other things to follow I just listened to her blindly. And I found each day improvement in my mind and body. At the later stage I was seeing myself a complete different me. I started believing I will get back my rainbow baby in my hand whom I lost. During each visit she narrates what shall be the next plan what tests etc needed to be done. I just followed her. Since I was scared I discussed with her if planned C section can be done. From starting of checking up with her she always told me to do normal delivery due to its multiple advantages. However since I was scared I discussed with her about planned C section on my 37 the week. After checking all reports n baby’s growth she agreed on that. Now I am blessed with a baby girl. My baby is all fine and healthy and 17 days old. 
I consider her the Goddess of our life who has helped us to get a gift from the God up there and helped us to meet our rainbow baby angel. We shall be forever grateful on her.

I would recommend all to meet her if you really want your pregnancy journey to make the most memorable one. Another quite important part during the pandemic time when the lockdown was going on, she was available either through video consultation or physically (alternate days). Since our angel baby born during lock down phase we were scared how things will happen etc. Again she relaxed me and made me confident that no matter what Govt takes decision I will get to meet my baby for sure. Such a memorable experience I had with her during my pregnancy phase.

I thank her and the entire Cloudnine Whitefield staff (duty doctors, sisters, child soecialist doctors, administrative staff, securities, housekeeping staff) for taking care of me and my baby during the 3 days I stayed there post delivery.


-
Regards,
Sujata ( Dr Meeta Chowhan’s patient)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
When I got to know that I am pregnant , I started searching for a good doctor near my house and got to know about Dr. Meeta Chawhan. Started visiting her from day one and I still remember her first question - "Pregnant ... What's your feeling ?? Happy or Sad ? ." I said Sad, she asked why ??. I was like I am very scared by the delivery pain which we get during normal delivery (as my first one was normal delivery). 
She smiled and said don't worry, 99% this time also it will be a normal delivery. I said I don't want that pain again and then she convinced me by giving options available for normal delivery like painless etc.
I would say she is an amazing and talented doctor. From the starting she made sure I exercise or walk alot (since I was little overweight and this might increase the risk during pregnancy), eat healthy protein rich food, relax and most importantly enjoy the pregnancy.
I followed her instructions and was quite impressed by her detailed knowledge on all the conditions and issues. She is quite friendly, so you can discuss any problem related to your pregnancy.
I was waiting for the labour pain to kick in which didn't happen till my last week that is 40th week and I was quite tensed. Met her and spoke to her about it, she said don't worry. Our first motive should always be of "a healthy baby" and second for sure of normal delivery, but don't get tensed because of it. 
Finally, I got admitted and artificial labour was induced, post which also for a very long time the baby didn't come down (since the baby had the cord stuck around him). And the miracle happens, even after the situation, she waited for quite a long time and I delivered my baby via normal delivery.
I would give all the credit to her since I never expected that even after in such situation I will be able to deliver normal.
Anyway, thanks to doctor Dr. Meeta, will recommend her for her talent, ********** patience,friendliness, behaviour and most importantly her amazing work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My wife's last pregnancy was through and through a high risk one due to her age, hyper-tension and blood sugar. We were actually consulting another very experienced doctor in another hospital in Whitefield.

During the first trimester scan, it appeared that her cervix was small. As soon as the doctor looked at the report, she reacted sharply and asked my wife to undergo a binding procedure. We were psyched due to her reaction. However, we weren't convinced that she has to undergo a surgery so early in her pregnancy.

That's when we saw Dr. Meeta Chawhan through a friend's recommendation. In the first consultation itself she calmed us down - especially my wife. As soon as we stepped out of the consultation room, my wife told me that she got a very good vibe and would like to continue seeing Dr. Chawhan. We couldn't be happier that we did.

Throughout the pregnancy, Dr. Chawhan aptly demonstrated her expertise in handling such high risk patient, not just through diagnosis and treatment but also through her human touch. She knew exactly what our apprehensions were and how to alleviate them. She did so by slowly cutting down on the amount of medicine my wife was administered initially by the previous doctor. She also put only the much needed restriction on travel and food but eased that out too slowly. Also, through out the duration, we never had any feeling that she is recommending undue tests.

My wife's aunt is a very experienced (30+ Years) OB-Gyn practicing in Australia. She also kept vouching for Dr. Chawhan's treatment and case handling through my wife's pregnancy.

My wife normally delivered a healthy baby girl about a month back. Our heartfelt gratitude to Dr. Meeta Chawhan. She made this day possible. We recommend her whole-heartedly.  We would continue to visit Cloudnine, Whitefield just for her.

She is always on time for appointments.I would like to Thank her for handling my pregnancy very well. Overall, a great experience with Dr Meeta and would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Both my babies were delivered vaginally by doctor meeta chawhan. Her analysis of the risk is extremely commendable. 
My first pregnancy was a pre term , it was addressed before and lung development injection was given on time and baby was delivered vaginally at 35 weeks . 
Second baby was full term as the doctor analysed the risk of premature delivery and gave timely medications and baby was delivered vaginally at 41 week. 
Doctor waited until natural pain arrived and waited till the due date.
Highly recommend the doctor for pregnancy related issues and especially for people who prefer vaginal delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had an excellent experience with Dr Meeta. She was extremely positive, demonstrating a high level of professionalism and care throughout my visits. I appreciated her positive demeanor, clear communication, and the overall quality of their service.
Beyond her medical expertise, what stood out was her genuine care and positive attitude. It made a significant difference during a vulnerable time. I'm especially thankful for her support in managing gestational diabetes; her guidance made the journey much smoother. Grateful for such a compassionate and skilled doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Caesarean Section (C Section),Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,
review:
I am delighted to share my positive experience with Dr. Meeta  during my Wife’s pregnancy and delivery. From the very beginning of her prenatal journey to the joyous moment of delivery, Dr. Meeta exhibited unmatched professionalism, expertise and genuine care.

Throughout the pregnancy, she provided thorough and personalized care, ensuring we felt informed and supported at every stage. Her attentiveness and commitment to my wife’s well-being were evident during each visit, fostering a sense of trust and confidence.

When it came time for delivery, Dr. Meeta skill-fully guided the process, creating a calm and reassuring environment. Her expertise and comforting nature were invaluable during such a significant moment in our life.
