tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review:
We have had complicated pregnancy and I was lucky enough to find Dr Meeta and would highly recommend her.
I have gone through multiple miscarriages, ectopic pregnancies, abortions, cervical incompetence so it was never going to be an easy pregnancy . On top of it, it was twin pregnancy this time conceived using IVF and I’m glad we met Dr Meeta this time. Her analysis was always detailed and she was always one step ahead of the situation. I received cervical stitch and was able to carry out pregnancy.
Few of positives of Dr Meeta
- She was never in hurry, and listened to all our concerns
- She was always telling us the exact state but somehow she always managed to keep us calm even when it was difficult time for us
- She is well experienced and knowledgeable in handling complex pregnancies and what follows after IVF conceptions.
- She was always available. When I was about to go labor (preterm), Dr Meeta was out of country but she not only got everyone in hospital to carry out all the necessary steps including state of leak, lungs development injections, brain protection injections, providing antibiotics etc and she was in touch with us as well. I am always thankful to her for spending her vacation time on me and later when she arrived in bangalore, she wasted no time and did my c-section. I do not think she got any rest before reaching hospital. After kids were born, she was following in NICU as well even when she was not the consulting doctor

Again, i would highly recommend her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This was my first pregnancy and I have been under Dr Meeta Chawhan care right from the start, it was a wonderful journey for us. She has very positive attitude and very supporting nature. She keeps calm and has patience to listen and clarify each and every doubt of yours. She is there to answer all your questions and makes everything sound so easy & relaxing. My pregnancy was handled with utmost care by her and she was there throughout giving me confidence and required support. My overall experience with doctor Meeta Chawhan was superb and excellent.

Dr Meeta M'am is very friendly in nature and very responsive too. She mostly advises on natural remedies rather than prescribing chemical/heavy medicine. Her diet plan really helped me a lot  throughout my pregnancy. Thank you so much to Dr Meeta for making my pregnancy look so normal and the 9 months just flew under your care.

Doctor Meeta M'am is so responsible and even she will be available when you really need her for any assistance.Dr responds on your texts/WhatsApp/call if it's really important and urgent. I Would highly recommend Dr. Meeta Chawhan for anyone who want medications under gynecology and pregnancy/ obstetrics.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
To start with, a big thank you to Doctor Meeta chawhan. Undoubtedly the best doctor in town and I am fortunate to consult her for my high risk pregnancy.She is best not only because of her knowledge and treatment style but because of her positivity. From day 1 you enter her room till I got released from the hospital with my baby it was only positivity from her. I had developed some issues during my third trimester but her treatment and early diagnosis was really helpful. If she finds something is not normal with your reports she will action immediately to cure on time rather than sitting on it.
The best thing with doctor meeta is she will not give you any unnecessary medicine and rather will suggest you natural food and some home remedies which if you will listen diligently it will be beneficial during and in long term after your delivery. 

Every visit she will greet you with a smile, she makes sure to tell you every possible doubts or questions you might have for your upcoming days and never will be impatient if you have any further questions.

Trust me I always felt she absorbed all my worries and when i use to leave the consultation room I had a very happy and empty mind.

Highly recommended doctor without any second thoughts.

Thank you again for our little and healthy bundle of Joy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Meeta Chauhan, the name which defines the benchmark.
Thank you for all your help in delivering our baby.
You have always been patient and taken time to listen to us and explain things in a way that is easy to understand. You have gone extra mile to explain things, for thorough examination.
You have been kind to treat us with respect and dignity and always made us feel that you care for us by showing your concerns about our overall health and well-being.
Its hard to find people like you who are so friendly, gentle knowledgeable and sincere. You have helped us in our toughest times and we are so greatful to you.
thank you for your compassion, care and expertise. You are truly a gifted doctor and we were lucky to have you as our doctor.
We feel so blessed to have you on our side. Thanks for makin us feel comfortable. We appreciate everything you have done for us.
Its doctors like you who make people like us believe in your profession.
Thank you for being an amzing doctor! Thanks for blessing us with the new life in our family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr Meeta for irregular periods. She is very friendly and immediately puts you at ease. She suggested for scan and in the scan, a dermoid cyst was detected in my ovary. Doctor suggested laparoscopic surgery to get this removed before it grows big enough and ruptures causing complications down the line. Meeta mam explained the surgery procedure and assured me it's nothing to be worried about as incisions would be very small and hence recovery would be fast. She guided me through all prerequisites of the surgery. Overall it was very smooth process from the time of admission to day of discharge. Post surgery I recovered with minimum required medications. All things were taken into consideration so well throughout the procedure that I did not face any problems or side effects at all with any of the prescribed medications or the surgery procedure itself. I was feeling well enough to be discharged the next evening of the surgery. Post surgery, in one week itself i started feeling almost like before and in another week I was able to continue with my daily routine with of course some exceptions like not lifting heavy things etc. Overall the procedure went very well and even though as soon as I heard about having to go through surgery i was worried but Dr Meeta helped me understand about the advantage of laparoscopic surgery, which is small incisions and subsequently faster recovery time than normal surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The Covid-19 lockdown situation meant we had to drop our plans of going to hometown for my delivery and we were very sceptical if any doctor would consider taking new patient during the third trimester of pregnancy. Thankfully, we were not disappointed at Cloudnine hospital and Dr. Meeta was everything nice and positive. Her caring attitude and friendly demeanor would immediately put a patient at ease. I was also explained the importance of exercises and healthy foods by Dr. Meeta and she encouraged to go for a normal delivery if there are no last moment complications. We had regular consultation sessions, ofcourse keeping all necessary precautions because of the ongoing pandemic crisis. She explained the baby's current and expected conditions during these sessions and I had a newly instlilled confidence because of them. She also arrived in time when I had to rush for an emergency c section operation and was very encouraging during the preparation of the procedure...I had a successful delivery, thanks to her and the team :-)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: It was a great experience with Dr. Meeta Chawhan. she is very optimistic. During my pregnancy my husband was not with me from 2nd trimester till my delivery but Meeta ma'am gave me confidence and my pregnancy journey was very smooth. I had gestational diabetes from the 1st month of my pregnancy, however she suggested me well balanced diet and limited medications, moreover she suggested me a excellent endocrinologist. My weight gain during my pregnancy was only 3 kgs with a healthy baby. Thanks to Meeta ma'am for her guidance.  My delivery day and post delivery experience was also so good. She never recommends unnecessary medications rather suggests always a well balanced diet, I feel so blessed to meet Dr. Meeta. A Optimist, trustworthy, professional yet friendly and most important, my guardian angel — these are the words comes to mind to describe Dr. Meeta Chawhan. Keep spreading happiness, thank you!!❤️Lubna, Amit and baby Prisha we all are grateful to Meeta ma'am. God bless you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was very scared with my second pregnancy as i had pre eclampsia, icp and hellp syndrome with my first pregnancy and i was told i will have this again in my second pregnancy. I delivered in swastha hospital during my first pregnancy and i went there only during  my second pregnancy but the doctor scared me so much that I started feeling that i may not survive. My husband told me to change the doctor as i was very depressed. I searched for best high risk pregnancy expert and i got Dr Meeta’s name. I went to her and she was so good and positive that i started feeling nothing will happen to me. She always supported me emotionally and gave lot of positive vibes. I lost 4 kg weight in my first few months as my first doctor kept me on a very strict diet as i had gestational diabetes but Dr Meeta allowed me to eat all healthy food in limit and I started enjoying my pregnancy. I was never stressed again. I had only ICP with my second pregnancy and I delivered safely in 37 weeks 1 day. My baby is healthy and safe. God sent Dr Meeta as an angel for me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Meeta delivered our first baby and during our second pregnancy also we consulted her.

Her approach towards patient care is extremely detail oriented and focused on ensuring natural remedies used for most issues. During both my pregnancies I was diagnosed with GD early on and with her proper coaching and correct diet and exercise plan , I was able to manage it effectively. She is an extremely busy doctor and despite of that she never rushed during my consults and patiently responded to my endless questions with detail explanation. 

During my second pregnancy,  at the time of regular check up at week 37 ,  due to various reasons we had to go for an emergency operation and she organised everything for us at the hospital without us worrying about it overnight and instead , insisted on me focusing on myself and LO vs worrying about anything else. She took care of everything at the hospital.
The experience we had with Dr. Meeta has been extremely positive which helped build our blind trust on her. I have recommended her to lot of my friends and family members who also now share similar positive experience with her.

I would strongly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted Dr Meeta for my pregnancy. My first meeting with her gave me enough confidence that she is the one whom I was looking , for the below reasons-
1) Her positive attitude and the way she keeps you motivated throughout 
2) Explaining the situation in detail and showing us the path for the same
3) She completely believes in home remedies and never prescribed any unnecessary medicines
4) She believes in having a healthy pregnancy and will always try to ensure that you don’t get into any kind of health troubles , eg- keeping an eye on your weight gain in order to avoid gestational diabetes, etc
5) is extremely approachable at all times
Adding to it, I had a pre- mature delivery and the way she handled the entire situation was commendable.  Initially she tried her level best to avoid going for a pre- mature delivery. But when that was not possible and we had to go for it, It was her confidence that helped me wash off my worries.
I would highly recommend her at all times.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hello, I am Jyoti here. It was Covid 19 lockdown started in bangalore in march 2020 and we were very scared to continue with our big multi speciality hospital due to possible infection fear. It was a big challenge to shift in between the pregnancy for a new hospital and doctor nearby. With our friends reference & suggestions we started consulting with Dr Meeta Chauhan in cloudnine whitefield. It was perfectly a right decision. She supported and guided us with confidance for all our pregnancy and health related concern. We didn't look back for multi speciality facilities further. Dr Meeta guided us for healthy diet plan over traditional eating habits for focused effect on health of child and self without gaining weight much. Her focus was to prepare the body for Normal delivery through simple excersise. 
She monitored the health and growth continuously and waited till day of EDD without being in hurry. Finally on 15th Aug the baby was delivered in good health. 3 days after we were discharged safely to home. Now my baby is 20days old, all fine.
I recommend to go for Dr Meeta Chauhan for pregnancy related concerns. 
Thank you madam for your support during our pregnancy.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Caesarean Section (C Section),Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy,
review: Delivering our little bundle of joy during this pandemic with ease and peace of mind would not be possible without Dr. Meeta Chawhan. We consulted her for my second pregnancy at Cloudnine, Whitefield and the first consultation itself convinced me on continuing and completing this journey with her. Her positive outlook towards things is what helped us sail through this journey smoothly. Her focus on diet and exercise during pregnancy kept me from gaining a lot of weight, meanwhile keeping me and the baby healthy and in the best of shape. She believes not only in medicines but also in traditional home remedies that resolve a lot of general pregnancy issues. She attended to all our doubts and answered all questions with a smile and patience. I had an elective C-section on August 4th due to a previous CS. All my anxiety and fear in the OT disappeared when I saw her walk in and within minutes I had my son, one of the best moments of my life for which I extend my heartfelt gratitude to Dr. Meeta. The recovery too has been smooth, all thanks to her. Thank you for being the dedicated, thoughtful, and compassionate doctor that you are!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We started to consult Dr. Meeta for pregnancy management from start till delivery. In the hindsight, I can blindly say it was one of the best decision I have ever taken. Throughout pregnancy she explained small things in detail (like why do we need certain test or why certain medicine is required etc). She did emphasise on importance of having home food/healthy diet and maintaining sugar level (I had bit high) by diet, if possible so that I can avoid unnecessary medicines but prescribes if it becomes necessity. Best part is, every time I met her, she was smiling and happy to consult me which gives lots of positive vibe and confidence. Throughout journey, she suggested certain exercises and lab/scan tests with reason(s) behind them. I never felt anything was prescribed without reason. She will explain the reports of lab and scan test properly and you wouldn't go back home having any doubt in your mind. Her friendliness will let you clarify even the smallest and silliest doubt you might have. In 3rd trimester, I had some complications and was admitted to hospital (and was worried about pre-term), She handled it in a wonderful way and really helped me to keep positive mindset. Under her care, I delivered healthy baby boy via normal delivery at full term. My pregnancy felt like a wonderful journey due to her.

I am extremely happy to have met her and highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I started consulting with Dr. Meeta from very beginning  of my pregnancy . The doctor is very confident and friendly and explains everything very clearly. I had border line sugar & hypo thyroid but the doctor controlled both sugar level and thyroid very neatly. She was very strict on my diet and regular monitor of sugar level. Also the doctor encourages for  normal delivery. I was very very sensitive towards any kind of pain and my whole family including myself not even thought in my dream that I would have deliver normally but It happened in reality only because I tried my level best to follow all the suggestion from diet to regular workout prescribed by the doctor. Presence of Dr Meeta in the labor  room gave me massive mental strength during the delivery. I remember I started walking just after 2 hrs after the delivery. Post delivery health recovery was very smooth for me.
Only cons I have found with Dr Meeta is that she keep herself very defensive in 1st two months of pregnancy and prescribes lot of tests to make sure that everything is  on the correct track.

In bottom line I can say if one can follow every instruction as Dr Meeta prescribes she will must get desired result  on time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Hello, I am Jasmitha Vijay.

 When I am about to deliver a baby in a week, my regular doctor switch  to another hospital. Being parents,we were very scared to select a doctor and did a lot of research for a normal delivery. Finally, through a reference from my sister, We  came to Dr.Meeta. In one visit, we understands that she is the bestest doctor because she explained each and everything from my reports as my regular doctor did nothing. She tests me internal in a good way.She also trained me some exercises and in the healthy diet.

I followed each and everything said by Meeta Mam.We totally trust her. 

Finally, the day comes for delivery, I got pains from the Morning(23/04/2022) On and Off. On night, I am unable to control, as the pains are heavy. So we admit hospital at 10.00 pm. The junior doctor monitor the nsr scan.The cervix length was .2cm diluted  when she induced. After 3 hours, contractions have started heavily as I was not able to control. The junior doctors came and  check it was diluted to .8cm and white bleeding 

 The time comes,I admitted to labour room, after 15 min Meetha mam came and Finally I deliver a healthy 4.010gm  baby boy. It was a normal delivery.

I am very glad to found her for my delivery. Our journey of delivery with Dr.Meetha and Cloudnine Hospital,Whitefield has been a memorable one.I strongly recommend Dr.Meetha.

 Thank you Dr.Meetha for your guidance,advice and support.We would rate 10/10 for Dr.Meetha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: This was my 2nd pregnancy and we were blessed with a baby boy under the guidance and care of Dr. Meeta Chawhan on 9th Dec , . Our first child was delivered normally in Sweden, a country where the healthcare system is one of the best in the world. We had been skeptical of experiences from our relatives in India. After some careful reference checks we decided to go for Cloudnine Whitefield and Dr Meeta Chawhan.I had developed complications like borderline Gestational diabetes and Cholestasis in my 3rd trimester but the confidence with which Dr Meeta guided me is truly commendable. She encouraged me to take a healthy diet and keep myself active which really helped me throughout my pregnancy through logical perspectives. Even with these complications the doctor ensured a smooth normal delivery, thanks to all the staff at the Cloudnine hospital Whitefield for the smooth delivery and postpartum care.Dr. Meeta and cloudnine had been like a guide throughout our journey, somebody we always looked up to on various aspects of lifestyle and diet

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Just after we decided to have second child, we started looking for a good gynaecologist. It was very important for us to find the best one as we had bad experiences with first child and lost her..
After reading the reviews on Practo, we decided to consult  Meeta Mam with lot of hesitation.. After the first consultation itself we got most of our questions answered and got the confidence that we can try for second child..
Right from the time I conceived we were nervous but were ready to take utmost care. Meeta mam guided us really well, explained the situation at every stage and suggested what is good and why. She built confidence in us while not giving any false hopes or promises. She tries to keep the medications to minimum, insists on healthy diet while not over stressing on the supplements.
We are blessed with a healthy and beautiful baby boy now. Very happy with the guidance we received from her and we are forever grateful to Dr. Meeta. This has been a life changing event for us. 

Strongly recommend Dr. Meeta to whoever looking for a gynaecologist. Choosing her as my gynae is the best decision we made.. She is extremely professional and friendly... While consulting her you can be rest assured that everything will be taken care of.. We wish her all the happiness in the world.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had visited Dr Meeta since my 3rd month of pregnancy in Cloudnine Hospitals, Whitefield and recently delivered a healthy baby boy. My overall experience with doc and hospital was excellent. Dr Meeta is very friendly in nature and very responsive too.she makes everything sound so easy & relaxing.she mostly advises on natural remedies rather than prescribing heavy meds. My baby was suspected to b borderline IUGR, however thanks to her early diagnosis & medication, we could avoid the problem before delivery. The thing I liked the most is we had a very detailed & healthy discussion on how we should proceed with the delivery and what would be best for both mom & baby. She made herself available when we needed the most. On the day of delivery everything was so well taken care of and the hospital also made the whole process seamless

The only thing I ever came close to complain is on hospital administration was the wait time on certain busy days . However that problem was tackled by taking early morning appointments, which was perfectly fine for us. 

I would highly recommend Dr Meeta for any pregnancy related visits. The positive vibe you get from the doc cant b any better any place else.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We started consulting Dr Meeta from my initial stage of pregnancy and delivered a healthy baby boy in Sep'21 through C-section delivery... it was a wonderful journey for us. She always motivates and kept us positive throughout 9 months. I have encountered  multiple issues during  my pregnancy like gastrational diabetes, less hemoglobin,  cold etc and what I liked most about her that she never prescribed many medicine to me even when I asked for and her recommended diet have done wonders. And everything went normal throughout the journey. Though we were nervous for the D-day but with the help of Dr. Meeta things went really well and smooth and I have recovered real fast. She is very positive, experienced, calm and explains everything in complete detail.. I always felt real comfortable to discuss everything during our consultations. I will recommend her for sure ... and you can consult her without having any second thoughts. I am really happy and satisfied with my experience of having a positive and healthy pregnancy with Dr. Meeta.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
We consulted Dr Meeta from very beginning of my Pregnancy.
 We are fortunate to find a doctor who gives personal care to patient along with expert medical advices.
 She is very friendly and trustworthy, always listens and clarify all doubts in a detailed manner.
 Always  insist on trying home remedies first(with this unnecessary medication is avoided) which worked for me.
 She advised to take protein rich diet and as a result of this I did not gain much weight during the pregnancy also helps in coming back to my original weight after delivery.
 Her advice on diet plan , exercise, motivation to enjoy each and every moment of pregnancy made my journey smooth and memorable.
 My first and second trimester was very smooth but in third trimester i developed cholestasis of pregnancy(ICP)
 However with expert advice from her, i sailed through that difficult times smoothly.
 In 37th week of my pregnancy, I had normal delivery and delivered a healthy baby.
 she was always energetic and positive, she entered LDR and with in max 30 minutes i delivered my baby.
 Dr Meeta and her team is very professional and also helpful during my admission in hospital.
 
 We pray for a healthy and long life for her.
 We are thankful to Dr. Meeta and highly recommend others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnant,
review:
Came across Dr Meeta through Google reviews and glad I choose her
In the  first appointment itself she made a very good impression on us giving us assurance that she would deliver the baby healthy making sure the mom is also healthy 
Her friendliness and practicality impressed us as she doesn’t give unnecessary medications or restrictions 
She always advices to try home remedies & insists in eating lots of protein rich foods 
I have followed her advice in my whole of pregnancy and delivered a healthy baby gal with 3.8kg. She makes sure the mother is healthy and the recovery is fast post delivery and prepares you from your first trimesters 
There were no complications to me or the baby in my entire pregnancy journey even though I’m 35 yrs old with a previous miscarriage history.
From day 1 she has tried for natural delivery and made sure I practiced healthy eating & suggesting daily walks and asking to do household chores to stay fit and active. 
I would highly recommend her for anyone who is looking for a natural&safe delivery.
She is amazing with her friendly nature and explains any issue with patience and practicality

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was December 2020 and we had heard about Dr Meeta from few of our friends and decided to go with her for my second pregnancy.  It was pandemic situation all over the world and we were looking for a doctor nearby our residence. We  had positive vibes post meeting Meeta from the very first day. She guided us medically and emotionaly throughout this journey. She always recommended natural diet based remedies and exercises to remain healthy. She was a mentor apart from a doctor and helped us these 9 months to make sure our little angel arrived safely into this world. On July 24th we were blessed with a little princess and I still remember that night. We had gone on emergency to hospital as I couldn't feel fetal movements. She coordinated with the hospital staff and made all arrangements over phone and made sure she was there even at 11 PM on a Saturday night at hospital to deliver my little one. She made sure both my kid and me are safe today and we are very grateful to her! Looking for my post natal appointments with her. I'm already feeling healthy and energetic after just 20 days of my c section. All credit goes to her and her guidance throughout this journey!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited doctor Meeta Chawhan for my first pregnancy checkup. We just randomly chosen the doctor in Whitefield cloud nine hospital as we had no proper information and we were in hurry *** *** *** *** ***** 

I had consulted another private hospital at very initial stage of pregnancy and I was not satisfied with the treatment and I was scared of loosing pregnancy as I was experiencing slight bleeding problem now n then so we decided to consult at cloud nine.

Dr. Meeta Chawhan was very friendly n gave good medicine for the problem that I had and brought confidence in me. There was a gap in consultation for 3 months as I had been to Germany with my husband due to his new job but I came to India and continued continued consulting her from 7th month of pregnancy. She crosschecked and aligned all the vaccinations like flue shot, TT and another one due to my O'negative blood group that I was supposed to take when I was in Germany. I'm really thankful to her *** *** **** ********* ********** ** ********** My healthy baby boy has been delivered by Dr. Meeta Chawhan on May 18th 2020. Unfortunately I couldn't consult her post delivery as I moved to Germany parmanently with my son to join my husband.

Thanks Meeta for making my dream come true and handing over it into my hands!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
This was my first pregnancy and I researched a lot before selecting my doctor in Whitefield.Based on reviews given by people for Dr.Meeta we decided to choose her and I have to say that I felt very lucky and grateful that we made the right decision.

I  started counselling with Dr.Meeta from day one of my pregnancy. I was very nervous after my first scan when i was told that I'm pregnant with twins but she handled everything very calmly.She answered all my questions very clearly and also explained many things in detail..She is very approachable and her friendly nature relaxed me and made me comfortable. 
I was pregnant for 32weeks and then I had painless C -section.Overall my experience with Dr.Meeta is great..She is very confident and positive about everything that's what I like the most about her.Even after pregnancy I have consulted her many times and she was a great help there also.

Thank you mam for all ur advices and help.Iwill highly recommend Dr Meeta to all the future mother's ** *** ** ** ********* ****** ** **** ** an amazing person.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Meeta Chawhan has been with us throughout the pregnancy - from the day we dropped into her office to make sure test results were really true to the day she delivered our baby. With all the struggles I had gone through to have a child, I was extremely nervous about this pregnancy. My husband had actually done some random net search to find a doctor, as we had just returned from the US and didn’t know anyone in the city. In our mind, we were there just to confirm the pregnancy.  But after the first consultation, there were no second thoughts about changing to any other Gynaecologist.
Best thing about Dr. Chawhan is her reassuring demeanour. Time and effort she took to always cheer up my spirits made sure that those nine months remained as a wholesome treasure of a memory with me. She is atypical for an allopathic doctor - thoughtful before prescribing unnecessary medication. She brings human touch to her interactions beyond lab reports and CT scans. *** ** **** ************* *** accommodative of cultural nuances that influence many decisions that expectant parents make. I am now bringing up a healthy and sparkling daughter and thank Dr. Meeta Chawhan for the part she played in bringing her to this world.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I came to know about Dr. Meeta through my friend and decided to consult her.

She has very positive attitude, keeps calm and has great patience to listen and clarify each and every possible doubt. She prefers simple yet effective home remedy solution for the treatment. She encourages healthy weight gain and exercise throughout the pregnancy.

There were some complications during first trimester. She provided great support to handle the situation and recover from it.

I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes during second trimester. She advised not to take medicine rather control diet and monitor blood sugar level on regular basis. It worked out nicely.

I was really worried when diagnosed with ICP and low amniotic fluid reported in the IG scan. Physical consultation was not available that time due to surge in Covid cases. She made me feel relax during video consultation and looked confident with healthy delivery. It took all my fear away. We are blessed with a healthy baby girl! Such experiences make the journey memorable and a happy one.

I am fortunate to consult Dr. Meeta for my pregnancy. She is a doctor cum friend for me :-) I look forward to continue my post delivery check ups with her. Thank you mam for everything that you do..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Visited for pregnancy
This was my first pregnancy and we were in dilemma to choose the right doctor in cloud nine Whitefield for consultation. 
Frankly based on review people had given for Dr. Meeta we decided to consider her and are truly grateful that we made right choice in choosing Dr. Meeta. 
I started consulting Dr. Meeta right from initial days of my pregnancy
And am very much thankful for all the advices she had given me through out my journey for entire 39 weeks. 
As this was my first pregnancy we used to have lots of queries and mam had answered them all calmly and was a greatest support especially during covid. 
She suggested mostly home remedies, than medication and following her advices throughout right from exercises to diet helped my entire cycle go smoothly. 
As my due date was nearing mam had examined me frequently even during this covid situation and when my labor pain started i had come to hospital late night the duty doctor examined me and was in constant touch with Dr. Meeta and updated my situation at every instant to her and when I was moved to labor room she had come immediately and seeing her I was at ease as I knew I was in trusted hands. She encouraged me during labor and with her advices and instructions she performed vaginal delivery and happily delivered baby Girl. 
Am continuing checkups with mam Post delivery as well. 
Thank you mam for making our entire journey wonderful and memorable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been consulting Dr. Meeta Chawhan from the start of my pregnancy. During my consultations, I found her very positive, knowledgeable, empathetic and friendly person. Dr. Meeta Chawhan is a great doctor and wonderful human being. Not only she has taken care of my health but she also ensured smooth delivery of my baby during the peak time of pandemic. It is rare to find a doctor, who combines such personal touches and care for a patient with outstanding quality of medical care. She is a wonderful counsellor and lovely to speak with. I immediately felt at ease and felt confident on every occasion I consulted with her. I never felt rushed and she always asked if I had any other questions. The best thing about her is that she always encourages  home remedies and she is easily approachable. During pandemic, video consultations were really helpful and made our life so easy. She always joined on time. We are extremely happy and satisfied with all her expert guidance. I highly recommend Dr. Meeta Chawhan to all future moms.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I consulted Dr Meeta from the first month of my pregnancy, and I am very lucky to find a very good doctor in her. Dr Meeta listens to all questions carefully, and then clears any confusion in patients mind very effectively. 
She is very clear in her thoughts and what must be done in a given situation.  Through-out my pregnancy I found Dr Meeta always approachable, ready to help and giving tips that were suiting me perfectly.
*** ***** ***** ************ ********** She believes in maintaining good diet and a healthy life-style. She advised me to focus on protein rich diet and that worked perfect for me as I did not gain much weight during the pregnancy. Dr Meeta advised exercising, walking and continue with all the daily routine till the last day. Due to COVID, we could not arrange our parents visit, Dr Meeta ensured that she made all arrangements while getting admitted in hospital. Finally, we were blessed with baby boy, though C-section. Dr Meeta and her team took excellent care during the hospital stay.  I recovered quickly from the surgery and got back to my regular routine within a week's time.  Thank you Dr Meeta for making this journey very comfortable and memorable for all of us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We consulted Dr. Meetha Chawhan for my pregnancy since it was an IVF pregnancy we need at-most care which was really made by the doctor . I consulted the doctor from my 1st trimester after  each and every scan she explained the report in very detail we will get to know what was happening with the baby very clearly . She is very friendly in nature she clears all our doubts with smile , in my 3rd trimester me and my husband both tested COVID positive  when I shared my husband’s health condition  with the doctor she voluntarily ready to donate plasma I never saw such a kind hearted doctor with highly qualified designation  . She treated me not only as a doctor as a mother she helped me a lot I am saying these words from the bottom of my heart .  If you are with  Dr.Meetha she will take care of everything you can just relax and enjoy your pregnancy . With all her support I got delivered with a healthy baby boy in Normal delivery . I am very happy for consulting Dr . Meetha Chawhan and I strongly recommend the Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We started consulting Dr. Meeta when my wife, Shivani, was 3 months pregnant. I felt she is so much perfect in her job and all her predictions came true till delivery and post delivery as well. There were few complications in pregnancy like gestational diabetes and low placenta. I must appreciate the way she advised us which resulted in no issue at all till pregnancy.
Best thing to commend her is that she focus on natural food to tackle all complications. We followed her instructions and blessed with healthy baby.  Post delivery consultants helped my wife to recover in 3 days after C section. This was unbelievable for us. 
Cloudnine staff and nurses are so much compassionate that we felt everyone is like family. Care for mother and baby was so much that we never felt any need of attendant. They also taught us how to take care of baby after discharge like giving bath to baby, burping techniques, feeding techniques,  how to sooth crying baby, changing diapers too.
We are thankful to Cloudnine and Dr. Meeta and highly recommend others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
*** ** *** **** ******* * **** ********* ** *****Dr. Meeta has all the qualities a patient would look for in a doctor - highly skilled, empathetic, ethical and trustworthy! In other words, she was a blessing for me, i will be grateful to her for life. 

The first time i met her, we discussed at length my medical background and after hearing her out, i was relieved that i had made the right decision going to her for treatment. She immediately instilled in me the confidence and reassurance that everything would be alright under her care.

Throughout the 9 months, she insisted on a healthy lifestyle and minimum medication which i think most patients look for.
She was also extremely patient to hear out all the concerns/queries and explained everything in full detail during all consultations. The patience and calmness with which she handled me and my concerns was reassuring that i and my baby were in great hands.

During my third trimester, i had developed cholestasis of pregnancy (ICP) and my NST results were also not great. However, the skill and care with which she handled the situation was commendable. 
I delivered a baby boy under her care and will be always indebted to her.
Highly highly recommend her!
Thanks doc and god bless you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I strongly recommend Dr. Meeta Ma'am. When my husband and I got to know about my twin pregnancy, we were very much concerned about having a right Ons/Gynec, with whom I can feel comfortable as it was my 1st pregnancy and who can do the rightful thing to avoid premature delivery. 
After consulting with multiple doctors during my second trimester, I got the right positive vibes with Dr. Meeta, and hence I decided to continue with her. 

The good thing about her, she listens calmly and explains each and every report, test, many things which we expecting mothers may experience. She also recommends only the necessary scans or tests to be done and asks us to avoid non-necessary hospital visits or even pregnancy accessories. 

With god's grace, we got blessed with twins, and she guided me well how can I take care of babies and myself.

I do feel that we made the right decision at the right time. Thank You Thank You Ma'am, for making me comfortable during my pregnancy and post-pregnancy and giving us this happiness.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnant,Pregnancy Check Up,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review: I consulted Doctor Meeta during my seventh month of Pregnancy @ Cloudnine, Whitefield. I was in a devastated state and had lost trust in all doctors before meeting her. She's a lucky charm. The moment I started consulting her, every problem/assumptions assoicated with my pregnancy dissappeared. She insisted so much on Protein diet, no pain killers, just excercises. She encourages normal delivery and tries till the last moment for normal safe delivery. However, in my case, my cervix dint open on waiting for so long after my water broke naturally and ended up in an emergency C section and delivered a healthy baby boy. She answers to all questions patiently. She is the only Gyno in Bangalore that takes care of a proper consultation. She spends time in every consultation, gives you ample time to get your doubts clarified. To me she's the one who gave belief not all doctors are the same (Due to the bad experience I had in the first two trimesters).My baby & I will be forever grateful for the way she handled my last trimester🙏I would highly recommend Dr. Meeta to anyone that needs a positive support throughout pregnancy!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review:
We consulted Dr.Meeta Chawhan during my second pregnancy and believe me it is one of the best decisions taken to have consulted her. She guided me well on what to expect and what not aptly in each trimester. Without going for unnecessary medications, she would encourage on taking good diet and the wonders that exercise and diet would do on the health of a mom and baby. This made it easy for me to take a good care of myself amidst managing household chores especially during the covid pandemic lockdown. Thanks for her approachability through video consultation whenever required(even during the period when I was away in hometown attending a family function in my third trimester, her advice on periodical tests followed by the required guidance continued).
With all the good care and guidance of Dr. Meeta, I delivered a baby boy in January (It was a Cesarean though as my first delivery was also the same) with a smooth post-pregnancy recovery. Many thanks to Dr.Meeta, the duty doctors and the staff of Cloudnine Whitefield for taking utmost care including covid precautions all through and making this journey of mine a happy one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We got to know about Dr. Meeta from my sister who had a difficult pregnancy but could deliver a beautiful girl child with her expertise.
We were living in London, and due to the Covid-19 pandemic had very few Midwife consultations. Little sceptical with our ongoing treatment there, we opted for video consultation with Dr. Meeta. The initial consultations with Dr. Meeta gave us sufficient confidence to move to Bengaluru and continue our journey with her at Cloudnine.
She stresses a lot on diet and exercise which I think are critical during pregnancy. She is very punctual and listens to you/your issues and has logical answers for all of them. And the moral support we received whenever we spoke with her just took away all our stress.
Finally, I could deliver a healthy baby boy through elective C-Section (personal choice as I am fearful of elaborate operational procedures) though Dr. Meeta was insisting on normal delivery as I was healthy and had all parameters in place.
Post my C-section, the diet that was followed for me as Dr. Meeta’s patient was vegetables/fruits based and we were totally impressed.
All I can say is my family and I will always remain indebted to Dr. Meeta for her guidance and the happiness that she has brought to us in the form of our healthy, happy baby boy during such testing times :)

tags: Wait time,
review:
We started consulting Dr. Meeta in 5th Month of our pregnancy at CloudNine Whitefield hospital (prior we were consulting to a different hospital.)

Our experience throughout the journey was amazing. Getting appointments, getting all tests done was easy even during covid time in cloudnine.

Doctor was very friendly, professional and we always get positive vibes from her whether it was direct or video consultation.I would definitely recommend her to our aquaintances.

This was our first pregnancy journey and inspite of some health issues & covid related challenges the journey was smooth with the guidance of Dr. Meeta Chawhan..🙂

Baby had less AC in her later ultrasound results  so doctor suggested to take more protein in diet also she added some protein and vitamin supplements for baby to gain weight asap. 

As per doctor's suggestion, we waited till 40 weeks for natural labor but it didn't happened,  so I had to get admitted for induced labor at night on 16 November, 2020 but we had no luck after hours wait.

Because baby's heartbeats were dropping in process of induced labor, we had to go for an emergency ceaserian and after wait of 12-13 hrs of labor our beautiful, healthy baby girl was delivered safely by doctor Meeta through c-sec on 17 November,  2020.

Doctors and staff were cooperative and friendly in our stay at cloudnine me and my husband both are grateful for all the care taken by them. 

Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I will highly recommend Dr Meeta. I was consulting a different gynecologist for my pregnancy but at 31 weeks , I had severe pains and got admitted in cloudnine whitefield. Dr Meeta was saviour for me as she connected with my gynae and took my case. She tried to hold the pregnancy with all medications and in parallel prepared me and baby for delivery. But suddenly after 4 days I was in labor and delivered baby, thanks to Dr Meeta and team who were promptly available and delivered my baby. Me and my husband never expected such smooth experience of labor and delivery with Dr Meeta as she was a different gynae whom we first met just 3 days back. There are few points I want to highlight about Dr Meeta:
1. She works with a plan and gets you prepared for all situations.
2. Always available and answers all your queries with patience.
3. Very friendly. You will always feel relaxed after talking to her.
4. Always Recommends home medications.
******* *** ** *** ** *** **** ***** ** ********* * **** ****
Thank you Dr Meeta.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: As it was my first pregnancy, we were quite confused and worried initially whom to consult with but after going through Practo reviews about Dr Meeta and meeting her in person at Cloud9, Whitefield all our worries comes to a full stop.She is very positive in her attitude and always advice you what is good for you.She focuses more over home remedies and ask to do Pregnancy relevant physical exercises which Is very unlikely like other other doctors who relies more over medicines in today's world. Its during 8th month when I have been diagnosed with GDM and she patiently have explained about the consequences of it if not been controlled any sooner, which eventually she managed to do with her expertise knowledge.I have given birth to our little princess via C-section during pandemic calmly which wouldn't have been possible without Meeta Ma'am.Its her positive attitude and professional way of handling the things with care that my 9 months of pregnancy just went like blink of an eye. I would highly recommend her as a gynaecologist.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Mine was a 40+ conception via ICSI, with haemorrhage issues in first trimester, fear of Down's syndrome in the second trimester, Growth scan anxieties (low baby weight, protein supplements etc.) in the third semester, and subserosal fibroid in the cervix towards the end! All through, Dr. Meeta was our solace, she treated me with minimum medication and maximum care. The climax was dramatic indeed, the umbilical cord wrapped around the baby's hand, and probably the baby yanked the placenta, leading to what is called palacenta abruption i.e. placenta detached before the labour fully set in, leading to baby's pulse dropping sharply. Dr. Meeta recognized it immediately (bloody amniotic fluid) and did an emergency C-section and got out a healthy baby safely & switfly. She also removed the fibroid (which turned out to be non-malignant after the biopsy result). Dr. Meeta was a beacon of support all through my journey in  touching the shores of happy motherhood. And we are more than happy to recommend her for anyone aspiring for the same.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited Dr.Meeta two year ago since i had developed UTI , her approach and the interaction has left such a positive impact that when i got pregnant ,we approached her straight away.Throughout pregnancy she encouraged me to be active and exercise regularly and told us the importance of eating healthy and getting required protein naturally then from suppliments. She also gave equal importance to mental health.She always use to discuss all possible aspects of a scan/report and no matter what worried us  she always made us feel at ease by explaining it in a clear cut manner because of which i never felt fear or anxious and it also boosted my confidence , All of which helped me a lot to stay calm and composed even when i had to go through an emergency c-section a day before my due date.Thanks to her i delivered a healthy baby girl and had a quick recovery without any complications. We are thankful to Dr.Meeta for guiding us through the pregnancy and making it a memorable journey. Highly recommend her to anyone looking for a gynecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Dr. Meeta was referred to us by a few friends who consulted her during their pregnancy. Her approach has always been holistic to focus not only on reports/ scans but also on diet, exercise, having right state of mind. Along with providing necessary medical guidance she supported on the psychological front which was very helpful for me during my pregnancy. There are so many blogs, articles online which are contradictory that confuse the expectant parents; but Dr. Meeta has always been very transparent and straight forward which gave us confidence to follow her advice without any ambiguity. She clearly explains all reports and reasons for what makes the body behave the way it is so that we get the assurance that such things are normal. She patiently answered even the silliest of my questions. I had gestational diabetes and severe acid reflux in the first few weeks. With the changes in diet suggested by her things got back to normal very soon and I had a smooth pregnancy. I also took reiki classes as suggested by her which helped with me stay positive and energetic. I could manage the workload at home and office work until my delivery. Dr. Meeta ensured the video consultation was no different from face to face consultations. Tests were suggested at the appropriate frequency inspite of lockdown and restrictions. Inspite of complications, with the right interventions I was able to deliver a healthy baby. Thanks to Dr. Meeta and the whole cloudnine team for the same.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: From the day 1 we are consulting Dr. Meeta. She has been very supportive throughout the phase of pregnancy and post delivery.We meet her at very early stage of pregnancy. *** ** ****** ************* *** explains so well about all the medical situations(positive or negative) upfront and her positive attitude makes us comfortable.As we we move further in our pregnancy she always suggested best care, best solutions, zero medicine and most importantly focused on home care. She always motivated us being 1st time parents and always focused on home based remedies primarily.   Her advice, suggestions made our pregnancy journey comforting even in this covid situation. For any kind of emergency she was always available throughout our journey, that was really helpful. During my delivery I would have given up completely with the kind of labour pain I had but it was only Dr Meeta who made it possible as a normal delivery for me. Most importantly the kind of positive vibes you get out of her in labour room is amazing. I am glad that I consulted her, She is just an amazing doctor for me.She is a blessing! knowledge rich expertise to handle pregnancy.Wish we had more doctors like her in all corners of Bangalore :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
It was my first pregnancy and we were talking to all our contacts to know which doctor to consult. After all our research online & offline finally we came to know about Dr. Meeta. glad that our research ended with perfect doctor. 

Being in the first pregnancy I had a lot of questions and confusions, Dr. Meeta helped to answer in a very friendly manner and encouraged me to enjoy the pregnancy.

During delivery she was of much help and support, she was in constant touch the whole night while I was admitted for delivery. 

Post delivery during visiting hours she promptly answered all the queries. The best suggestion being "Return to your normal routine as soon as possible after the delivery."

Medically, she is the one who believes in "minimum medication and maximum care", I can say this from my experience. She prescribes medicines only when it is absolutely required.

In a nut shell: Dr Meeta was a doctor and friend for the whole time during the pregnancy. 

A heart felt thank you from me, my family and of course the little one whom you brought into my arms. :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am very fortunate to have Dr. Meeta Chawhan as my consultant. I was living in far corner of Bangalore and I was consulting with another doctor and when we shifted to our new home, I was worried about, how the new doctor would be and how she will treat me. I discussed with my sister in-law and she preferred Dr. Meeta Chawhan as my consultant because my sister in-law also consulted with Dr. Meeta Chawhan and she handled my sister in-law delivery very well. So I decided to go for Dr. Meeta Chawhan and at first meeting I knew that she is my doctor, she listened all my concerns and her way of talking  and treating me filled a self confidence within me. She always gave me valuable suggestions everytime when I get the chance to meet her. She is very intelligent. At this time of pandemic I consulted her on video call and she always gave me enough time to explain my condition and provide satisfactory solution for my questions. I will always be thankful to her for the care and love. Now I am a very fortunate mother of very cute little Angel. May God bless Dr. Meeta Chawhan, thankyou so much Mam. I would urge every one to ask for Dr. Meeta Chawhan as thier consultant, she is very kind and generous doctor. Thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I consulted Dr. Meeta for my first pregnency after doing all the research online. After watching one of her YouTube video we decided to meet the doctor. The first meeting with her went so smooth that we made up our minds to go ahead with her. Since the beginning I wanted a normal delivery and she supported me during my entire pregnency by guiding me towards it gradually. Her straight forward attitude with no false promises kept us on toes throughout 9 months. She always insisted on home remedies/traditional methods and never kept me on medicines which I liked the most. I was rather directed to stay active and continue to work till I got into labor. I continued my workout routine with excersize as directed. She keeps a close eye on vitals and diet and puts you back on the plan with no tolerance. I still can't forget how she entered the OT and made things looks so simple. We were blessed with a baby boy on 11th of July and we sincerely thank Dr. Meeta for being the guiding light for us. I'm definitely reaching out to her if at all we plan our second. :)
Thanks
Priyanka

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have consulted Dr.Meeta for my second pregnancy and it turned out to be one of the best decisions i have ever made. The kind of care, guidance and support i received from Dr Meeta throughout my pregnancy has been phenomenal. She listened to all my queries patiently and answered them categorically. She made sure to reassure me and instil confidence in me throughout my consultation.  Her expertise in prescribing right medications (home remedies if applicable) at the right time is remarkable and highly appreciated.  Most important of all, i had to make an emergency visit to the hospital late night and was rushed to the labour room by the emergency medical team. Dr Meeta who happened to be off the duty at that time was informed about the situation and she was by my side in few minutes comforting me and ensured that i had a safe normal delivery!! I am thankful to Dr Meeta for the wonderful support she has extended towards me and would strongly recommend her to anyone looking for pregnancy care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnant,Pregnancy,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Labor and Delivery,Normal Delivery,
review:
Before explaining my story, I wanted to explain about my elder sister who delivered a baby in Cloud9 Hospital. 

Exactly last year in 2019, Dr. Meeta madam had helped my elder sister to deliver a baby in Cloud9 Whitefield. I use to visit most of my sister's consultations with Dr. Meeta. After those visits and delivery, I loved the way she interacted with my sister. It may be the confidence that she gives to her patient, It may be the solution she gives for each problem which can occur. Or It may be the atmost care they take during the delivery time. 

Experiencing all this as a third person, It has become a very easy decision for me to opt for a consultation with Dr. Meeta for my baby delivery. 

1. The Confidence she gave me has helped me come out with all smiles after each consultation and in having a smooth delivery. 
2. She used to provide apt solution for each problem I had during the pregnancy time. 
3. The care they took for me during the delivery time is unforgettable. 

On top of all these she is so sweet to talk and makes you comfortable. 

I would rate 10/10.

Thank you., 
Manasa.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
We went to cloud nine and visited Dr. Meeta Chawhan for my wife's second pregnancy after reading the reviews on practo. She checked my wife and suggested for USG and after she told everything is fine, no need to worry, she made my wife more positive and confident. One good part of doctor ***** * ****** ********** ** *** ****** ***** *** ******* ** **** *********** ******** very less medicine and maximum home therapy. 
She always helps and explain things to my wife during my wife entire Pregnancy to till delivery and this is quite important which, I think.

She always suggests to take healthy food add more fiber in your food and no outside food, And daily walk for 1hr which really help in my wife case.
My wife, born baby boy on 23rd of April during lock down phase, but we are lucky we got a good doctor during this critical situation and she is always available for any kind of emergency. 
I would recommend Dr Meeta.

We really thank full to Dr Meeta and entire cloud nine team for their efforts and care to their patients during the pandemic time when the lockdown was going on in entire country everybody inside of their houses.
Hats off to cloud nine team.

Special Thanks to Dr Meeta Chawhan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Hypertension (Preeclampsia/ Eclampsia),Cesarean Delivery,
review: I chose Dr. Meeta for my second pregnancy after reading the reviews and they are so true. I had consulted different Dr & City for my first pregnancy which was high risk pregnancy with high BP & 1.8kg IUGR baby. I was so worried about the second pregnancy in the beginning. But everything kind of changed positively after consulting Dr. Meeta. I delivered a healthy 3.1kg baby in 37th week via c-sec as per the plan. Due to low birth weight of 1st baby my health condition was monitored closely. First thing is she instantly makes you feel comfortable and feeds positive energy into you. I was so free to discuss even petty things that I was facing during the term and she patiently advises on how to handle them. *** ******* ********* *********** ********** ****** she gives lot of home remedies. I never had high BP during this term. Her food diet chart was the best with more protein in it. I followed it religiously that way I had put on only 10kgs and 3 days after delivery i had reduced by 8/9 kgs. Whole family is happy with her. I thank Dr for her support to have smooth pregnancy experience.

tags: None
review: I chose Dr Meeta to help me through my first pregnancy and to sum up my experience in short - it was the best decision I took. Dr. Meeta is outstanding in her work and it shows in the way she deals with her patients and also the way she leads her team in the hospital. I opted for c-section procedure for my delivery and she guided me throughout my entire journey from day 1 till I delivered just perfectly. She is herself a very positive person and ensures that her patients also stay optimistic throughout. *** ********* *** experience in her field is immense and it shows in the way she deals with every question and situation that comes before her. I have to say one more thing, when I was in the OT for my procedure, I was very scared and anxious (it's quite natural to feel so), but just a sight of Dr. Meeta in the OT got me my confidence back and soon after half n hour Dr. Meeta announced the arrival of my new born. During the recovery process as well, Dr Meeta personally monitors her patients and her team ensures nothing is done without Dr. Meeta's consultation. I highly recommend Dr. Meeta. If I plan a second pregnancy, without an iota of doubt, my consulting doctor will be Dr. Meeta only.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Exercise,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Obstetrics Problems,
review:
*** ** *** **** ****** *** *** **** ***** ***** I moved from Delhi with 3 months of pregnancy, worried about new unknown city and doctors. Moreover I was suffering from PCOS and it was my first pregnancy at age of 30 which made me more cautious to choose my ob-gyn. I zeroed upon Dr. Meeta seeing her education and experience. Coincidentally she did her studies from my home town and home state which is one of the best colleges to get for medical studies. 
Beyond expectations Dr. Meeta turn out be even better. Because of following things I feel about her. 
She is very friendly towards her patients. 
She is kinda doctor who helps her patients with not only medicines but also lifestyle, diet and exercises.
I am no expert but I believe pregnancy is all about lifestyle, diet and exercises and medicines are kinda supportive though I was suffering from PCOS.

Above all she is always cheerful even cheered up me in OT when I was in lot of pain :p

With her helps I enjoyed my pregnancy a lot and now I have a little bundle of joy in my arms. 

Thanks a lot ma'am :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We  had visited Dr. Meeta Chavhan at Cloud9 Whitefield for our pregnancy. We had a planned pregnancy and we had consulted with her since then.  She is amazing. We trusted her, follow her blindly and my wife delivered our baby in a Normal delivery.
We being to-be-parent had many questions and always carried a long list of queries every time we visited her, She used to listen to every silly queries and answer everything with proper explanation.
Secondly, She never prescribed any medicines for any thing unless it was absolutely required. And encouraged to do daily exercises, healthy diet for being healthy during the pregnancy term.
Her advice's works like magic.  My wife's pregnancy was a bit tough as she was diagnosed with short cervix at week 27 and we had to count each and every day praying that the pregnancy continues strong.
Dr. Meeta's  positive guidance during this time of the pregnancy  specially helped my wife overcome the mental and the physical stress.
In-fact with her advice , encouragement and precautions , pregnancy continued till the 39th week and delivered a healthy baby.
My wife had her labor started at night and we rushed to hospital. She came to hospital  at 3 am  in morning, almost in no time, since everything was unplanned and happening so fast.  
We'll always grateful to Dr Meeta Chavhan for gifting us our bundle of love since the pregnancy was a role coaster.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr.Meeta is an epitome of positive energy.We first met her on 25th July 2018, exactly a year from then we were blessed with a baby Girl on 28th July 2019.
Coming to my pregnancy journey, Dr.Meeta guided us to have a right mindset. She is very straight forward in her approach which is highly essential for prospective parents. Though we faced certain health challenges, Dr Meeta's timely advice helped me walk through them smoothly without any hassles. She focuses majorly on home remedies and recommends home cooked food which helped me maintain a healthy weight gain during my pregnancy journey. My family was surprised with my physique and the quickness in resuming back to my previous weight. Dr Meeta is very clear and very strong in her subject. She has a quick solution for every problem. Most importantly she is available on Sunday's which was very helpful to working couples.Cloudnine Whitefield is very lucky to have such a talented and efficient Doctor working for them. She is very quick and wise decision maker. Dr Meeta explains the pros and cons of every situation.
My family is extremely indebted to Dr.Meeta for, her guidance helped me attain motherhood which is a dream of every woman. She is a blessing to this profession. Dr.Meeta thank you for being my guiding angel.God bless you so that you can reach great heights.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Had a very bad experience during my pregnancy and delivery at Cloudnine with Dr. Meeta Chawhan. Got pregnant after many years of trial and loss. Hence this was a very precious pregnancy.
******** ***** *********** *** ** **** ***** ** ********* ************ 
•	She does not spend much time during doctor visits, and talks too fast. **** ** ***** ** **** ***** * ***** **** *****•	The most traumatizing part was after the delivery the doctor did the delivery and left the OT. The baby was neither shown to me nor was told if it was a boy or girl and if the baby was healthy. He was not given the golden feed too. Met my baby after 4 hours when was taken back to the ward. When complained, hospital is covering up saying that I don’t remember since was sedated. Please note sedation was only on the lower part of the body and I remember all incidents, surprisingly wouldn’t remember these scenarios???
•	Doctor did not even call for a follow up, and the dressing was also removed by an on duty doctor as doctor was on vacation **** ** **** ** *** ****** ** ***** ** *** **** *** ** ****** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy,Pregnancy Check Up,Prenatal Checkup,Cesarean Delivery,
review: I started consulting doctor Meeta in Cloudnine whitefield branch from my 5th month of pregnancy as we have read good feedbacks about her. She is very friendly, lively n informative. I used to feel energetic n positive after talking to her. She cared for me and addressed all my concerns patiently. She explained us what can be known from each scan and why do we need that.  She will highlight the positive side even though if something is not good. She gave a diet chart to keep the weight in control and for every check up she instructed me what to do before the next check up. She kept me motivated throughout the pregnancy. As there is an issue with babys position she prepared us that it can either be a normal delivery or a c section. As I haven't got pains even after 40 weeks she suggested for pain induction. I got pains after few hours but my baby passed motion meanwhile. As babys heart beat is getting affected, she decided for an emergency c section. They rushed me to the OT in few minutes and took the baby out.  My baby n I are in good health. Thanks to Meeta for making my pregnancy journey a cakewalk.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I started consulting Dr meeta just after I took pregnancy test and I am pretty much satisfied with the treatment. I just delivered normally though I had few complications like gestational diabetes, previous history of miscarriage . Dr meeta made sure that I had normal delivery and tried her level best and encouraged me and supported me throughout my pregnancy . She never prescribed unnecessary medicines or tests and always encourage natural remedies. She encouraged me to be active throughout my pregnancy which eventually helped me to recover on time post delivery . Best part about Dr meeta is that she took right decision at the right time as she suggested for an early delivery at 37 week as she was not satisfied with the last ultrasound. I must say she is an amazing and talented doctor and she always stressed on eating right so that I will not gain unnecessary weight. 

I am really glad that I took the right decision to choose her as my doctor.

I would like to thank her for giving me the best pregnancy experience . 

She is extremely friendly , patient while listening, give enough time to the patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:

I was happy with Doctor friendliness, Positive attitude,Caring and Supportive nature, Explanation of health issue, Treatment satisfaction.

Dr Meeta Mam was exactly the kind of doctor that me and my husband was looking for. It was great to get Dr Meeta Mam's help and support during my pregnancy. She is really nice and understanding and she always welcomes the patient with a smile... Have never seen a doctor so friendly, so polite like her. My pregnancy is full of complications but every time she used to calm down with her nice words and explained all my queries from the day one when I first visit till delivery. She encourages for proper diet, exercise and only important medication.I was under care of Dr Meeta until baby delivery and she really handled all the complications that arose during my pregnancy very well. Me and my husband really wants to thanks for all the care and support provided and making baby delivery memorable one. I would happily refer anyone to her and I have already recommended her to my friends and relatives.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Hi ,I'm Moumita Dey Sarkar.Recently I delivered a beautiful baby girl under observation of Dr.Meeta Chauhan,Cloudnine Whitefield. My Pregnancy journey was not so easy ,I was under Dr.Meeta from the beginning of my pregnancy.Everything was smooth till 5th month scan,then I got diagnosed with short cervix.From there I was on strictly bed rest and I was fully dependent on Dr.Meeta.Her medications,her way of dealing with patients, everything was so on the point.She assured me everything will be fine if I do as she advises.I am so happy with her guidance.We need doctors like her 😊.Thanks a lot Meeta Mam for holding and guiding me like an angel through my rough patches.

review:
I had visited Dr.Meeta Chawhan after seeing couple of good reviews on internet and heard good feedback from my apartment friends. I too had the same experience with her. I visited her first time for my second pregnancy. On every visit, I go to her with some problems or negative thoughts and she sends back me with positive energy to home. 
During labor also she entered  labor room like a toofan since she came to know that i was not co-operating for normal delivery. She gave me courage and made me understand how to co-operate. She did my normal delivery with so patiently and smoothly.  At the last,I delivered a healthy baby at the age of 42 years without any complications and extra weight gain. She is not just a great doctor, also a wonderful human being.

Overall, my second pregnancy journey with Dr. Meeta Chawhan is unforgettable. I recommend to all expected moms who stays in whitefield area.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is one of the coolest doctor I have ever met. I chose her for myself by just seeing her profile & experience on cloudnine hospital app. After 1 or 2 visits I felt pretty comfortable with her & decided to deliver my baby under her supervision. Because of my obesity, hypothyroidism & piles, I was pretty worried about my unborn child & delivery. But everything went smooth under her guidance. She tried her level best for normal delivery but labour induction failed so I insisted for C section. So she did that. She explained everything in details but final decision was from ourside. Everything went so well that I recovered externally within 8 to 10 days. She helped me a lot by guiding & prescribing minimal medication. Even after delivery, she is taking care of all postnatal condition. I would love to recommend her to my nearer & dearer.  I wish I would have visited her during my first pregnancy too.
