tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy with PCOD,Pregnancy care and management,
review:
I had visited Dr. Meeta for a consultation on a lump in my breast. The doctor was friendly and during this conversation she asked me about plans for a baby and guided me with pre- pregnancy councelling as i was also suffering from mild PCOD . So when i got pregnant i did not have to think twice to choose her as my gynec. 

Her approach is more related to changing lifestyle than prescribing unnecessary tablets . I also had gestational diebetis which got diagonised in the 1st trimester itself and she guided me through it all through my pregnancy by weekly tracking my diet and sugar levels. I also had IUGR and she gave me realistic expectations around the baby weight and health. 

Overall i would recomend her for pregnancy related care.. Especially if its a high risk pregnancy please do consult her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was lucky that i chose Dr. Meeta as my gynaecologist when I became pregnant.. in my very first appointment, i was awestruck by her enthusiasm, her energy, her positivity and her friendliness.. not many doctors have this kind of caring attitude towards their patients.. Apart from her friendliness, she is extremely knowledgeable and  has a lot of experience in handling high risk pregnancy.. my journey was also very tough..firstly i got pregnant after 11 years of marriage sonit was a very precious pregnancy... in my very first scan i was diagnosed with hematoma which in simple terms meant that i had a high risk of miscarriage ..i was kind of devastated bt Dr. Meeta put me in bed rest and monitored me closely. I also had vaginal bleeding in my first trimester and then at the later stage was diagnosed with umbilical vein varix which is a very very rare condition. I was crying after getting the diagnosis (being a professor and researcher  in human genetics, i could understand the implications of the diagnosis) and still remember how Dr. Meeta calmed me and explained that how she has handled such cases in her professional career and that the outcome was positive in all such cases.. Also she encouraged and motivated me throughout my  pregnancy to eat healthy as she was concerned about the baby gaining proper weight..
It was for her medical advice, guidance and instructions  that i was able to give birth to a beautiful baby girl and recovered easily from c section.  Thanks is too small a word bt still thank u dr. Meeta for making my tough journey easier..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,Post Pregnancy Classes,
review:
I delivered a baby boy at C9 Whitefield on 27 DEC 2018. My Dr Meeta Chawhan is very supportive, experienced and guided to us very nicely at every stage of my pregnancy. 
During my first and second trimester of my  pregnancy , I was consulting Dr Kamal Unikrishna. But In last trimester she refuse to take my case, reason best known to her only.  Me and my husband were in shocked and feared due to her non- professional behavior.
Then we rushed to C9 Whitefield, they advised us to contact Dr Meeta Chawhan. When we met Dr. Meeta Chawhan and discuss our case and problem in detail with her, then she told us "Need not to worry, I am taking you case". She investigate my case very sincerely and seriously and gave us clear information and guidelines for normal delivery. She also gave us her personal number and said " You can contact me any time in case of emergency ".  It make us relaxed. 
After that I contact her so many times over phone for my queries in odd and normal hours. Every time she replied to my queries positively and satisfied me with proper guidelines. 
On my delivery day I went to the hospital in evening but she was not present there at that time. But as the team of C9 informed her about my condition, She immediately rushed toward hospital and, attended and handled my case very efficiently. Finally I gave birth to healthy baby boy (3.4 Kg) through normal delivery. 
Really me and my husband are very thankful to Dr. Meeta Chawhan who helped, handled and guided us time to time very professionally, efficiently and positively. 
Thus I would say that Dr Chawhan is well experienced, nice, very professional who guides properly to all the patients.
In my opinion all the pregnant women should consult her for her safe and normal delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I started going to her the day my first scan was done which was July 2021. Dr Meeta is an wonderful positive mentality person firstly. She is always very to the point in the treatment. At the same time she is friendly and highly professional. She even attended patients (was one of them) when she was expected to be at home for personal difficult time during covid. It’s a very unique in any doctor. 
Regarding her treatment, I was completely new in this as was first time expecting . But the way she handled I followed her each and every suggestion. Rather I would say I blindly followed her prescription and her suggestion in every visit. She always suggested natural things for any complications during pregnancy. And trust me it worked so well, my complete journey was very smooth. . I did not gain any extra weight after delivery. I can share my true feelings about her. 
After delivery check up also she was very right to the point. She gives her patient very well diagnosed comments. Even when I was worried for many reasons she helped me to overcome very easily. She has very good patience and tight attitude to understand our mind. Highly ethical person. 
After delivery I truely missed her visit.  Suggesting her for pregnancy is a very small gesture. She is wonderful, if you are new in Bangalore, please just go to her and she ll handle well till the moment you hear your baby’s voice. 
Lastly, thank you to such medical practitioner, thank you Dr Meeta. Thank you for being there always . Wish you a great journey always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: Consulted for second pregnancyDr. Meeta is very friendly, kind hearted, a philosopher and guide and we highly recommend Meeta Mam We are very Happy with her treatmentWe consulted Meeta Mam at the end of my first trimester as we were out of city and here I would like to thank Dr. Shefali Tyagi for recommending Dr. Meeta Chawhan.Initially we had video consultations because of covid situation and in the first talk she spoke to me in a manner as she is a friend of mine and explained everything about second time pregnancy what are all the care to be taken.later consulted physically and every time I visited it's a big relief and stress free for me as she listens to the issues and never in a hurry, she gave me natural remedies, exercises which helped me throughout the pregnancy and post pregnancy too.. and made easy for my household works.. she won't prescribe the medicine unnecessarily.. she used to give tips and suggestions for my elder kid isuues also and how to cope up with two kids in future.. this shows her humanity and kindness which I loved the most..in my 38th week I went for regular check-up and was uneasy and uncomfortable so after the heartbeat check mam told to go for NST exam in which we came to know baby is in stress and have to deliver asap.. there she took right decision and she gave me confidence as I was worried. I admitted to the hospital that night.. she managed and organised everything for us and as per her word they induced for labor pains and motivated me and giving updates to mam whole night. morning mam came to meet me and said it will take little time and told not to worry about pains and go for epidural when my cervix was at only  at 2cm, as I was not ready to bear the pains again and it was bit relief after taking epidural and relaxed a bit..as she said with in no time my cervix got opened and gave birth to baby boy.. Her prediction, dedication towards her job  kindness, support, guidence towards patients is awesome.Thanks Meeta Mam for supporting, encouraging, guiding.. Thanku Team..  and Hospital staff for managing in this covid situation and making my journey Happy 😊Very Happy to consult Dr Meeta and we highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
** ***** *** **** ** ******** ****** ** ********** She is extremely arrogant **** ****** ** **************** The way she speaks, it feels like she is doing a favor. 
We would like to mention one of the many moments when we unwantedly tolerated her attitude. 
It was the second day after our daughter was born. Dr Meeta entered the room and the first thing she asked my wife (in a very harsh manner as always) was 'zinda ho?'. Who does talks like this to a patient who is suffering with pain? ** **** *** ******** ** ** ******** ******* ** * *** ******** **** **** ** ** ********* * **** * **** **** ** *** *** **** **** **** But that day I was just patiently standing in the room and helplessly tolerating her arrogance because the well-being (or life) of my wife and my newborn daughter was in her control. 
She apparently believes that doctors have rights to treat their patients in whatever way they want. **** *** ******* ********** ** **** **** * ******* ********* We spent a decent 850 bucks for every consultation with her. On top of that if we have to bear her unruly behavior, I don't think that should be acceptable. 
*** ***** *** *** **** ** ********** ************ * **** *** *** ********** ***** *** ********* ********** **** *** *** ***** ****** ** **** ***** *** **** *** **** **** ** *** ****** 
And the experience we had here in Cloudnine Whitefield is certainly the other way, majorly because of this doctor. We made a mistake by choosing her for our second kid's delivery ******* **** ** *** ** *** ******** ******* **** ** **** ******** 
Of course no one in our extended family is going to consult her ever in future. Highly Disappointed and Aggrieved.
reply_text:
It's actually so sad. From the first interaction you were so unhappy, so uncomfortable, suffered so much and yet didn't change the doctor nor the hospital. You had all the options to speak up since the beginning but never did. You had all the options to quit but you still stuck on till the last and decided to suffer more till the end. Seriously!!!

As you quoted Well being or life of your wife and your newborn daughter under the doctor's control and you stood there doing nothing. Seriously!!!

I wish you luck to find a doctor who shares the same understanding and wavelength as yours.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Trusting your doctor completely is a vital part of your pregnancy journey and I was able to place my trust and confidence completely in Dr.Meeta from the very first consultation itself. She radiates positive energy. She was very straight forward in letting us know what needs to be done from our end and any associated risk at every stage of pregnancy. For almost all health issues that I faced during my pregnancy she had a home remedy for it. She tries to avoid unnecessary tablets but doesn't take any unwanted risks also. She will communicate only what is absolutely necessary for you to know so do remember to ask her questions if you need additional info.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I delivered my baby boy under Dr. Meeta's supervision and started visiting her even before we planned for pregnancy. She helped us prepare ourselves both physically and mentally for this beautiful journey through natural lifestyle changes and some pre check-ups.One thing which really maks me appreciate her way of dealing with prenatal journey, is her major reliance on natural home remedies for treatment and quite minimal usage of medicines, unless absolutely required. From mental conditioning to providing confidence during anxious times, she has been a great support in my magical journey. Her focus on yoga, exercises and keeping oneself mobile and active even till last weeks of delivery is what sets her apart and helped me deliver baby with a minimal of labour pain one can imagine. Thank you, Dr. Meeta for your tremendous support throughout our beautiful journey leading to parenthood.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Meeta was my consulting doctor throughout my pregnancy. She is someone who would not give unnecessary medicines and mostly give you home remedy options for common pregnancy issues. Her check up schedule is such that any major health issues can be caught early on and treated with lifestyle change/ minimal medicine, in my case she caught my tendency to get GDM in my first trimester itself and we managed it with only diet and lifestyle change throughout my pregnancy.Even at the time of delivery she was very open to discuss both vaginal and c-sec delivery methods and educated me about the pros and cons of both.I definitely recommend Dr Meeta for any gynecological issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
When we came to know that I was pregnant I was new to Bangalore and simply didn't know much about that city . so we went to my nearest cloudnine brunch and randomly selected Dr meeta chawhan for my pregnancy journey.After my 1st consultation,we decided to stay with mam because of her treatment procedure she described to us and her friendliness. At that time I thought my journey would go with lots of medicine and tests but I was proved wrong."No unnecessary medicine and tests" I was only taking iron and calcium .Also she was not going to give me any medicine for my gas , acidity .She believes in home remedies like ajwain water ,amla ,jeera water etc . My journey was so smooth with Dr. Meeta. 
No words would ever be enough to express our gratitude to you doctor. But a big thank you for bringing our angel to earth.

context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),Labor and Delivery,
review: Dr. Meeta is an expert of her area, very efficient with how she operates and goes about the case at hand. Gives good attention to details, explains and listens to issues of the mother to be. She is very friendly, fills patients with positivity and gives much needed care and advice. We had to rush for delivery in emergency at night due to water break, care of cloudnine was very professional. Was immediately addressed with doctor available on call. Surgery was scheduled for morning, and we were blessed with a boy. Very happy with overall experience with Dr. Meeta. Would recommend her for any pregnancy or gyanaec issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr. Meeta for my pregnancy journey, which unfortunately became critical starting from the 5th month. I experienced frequent bleeding every week and felt completely lost about what steps to take next. It not only affected my physical health but also took a toll on my mental well-being. Dr. Meeta played a crucial role as my savior during this challenging time. She patiently and clearly explained all the issues I was facing, enabling me to comprehend and make the necessary decisions for my well-being. Dr. Meeta's round-the-clock availability and constant motivation during this difficult phase, coupled with her timely and appropriate treatments for all my emergencies, helped me overcome all the obstacles I encountered. I am sincerely grateful to Dr. Meeta for her unwavering support and guidance throughout this journey.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She was my gynaecologist and I was so satisfied and thankful that I chose her for my pregnancy journey. No unnecessary medicine and test were prescribed and she will always talk to the point and straightforward. I never thought I could do normal delivery, but all thanks to her. She said we will wait until your last delivery date for normal pain and will not rush and induce any artificial pain. She always use to say delivery is a normal process and let time and body take its course of time and let them act on their own. I will always be thankful and grateful to you mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy care and management,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review: There are not enough words to describe how thankful we are for the wonderful experience during my pregnancy and delivery. Dr Meeta helped bring a perfect miracle into our lives and we couldn't be more thrilled with her! Mine being a complicated case, with her guidance and support it was a good journey . Because of Dr Meeta’s professionalism and optimism we felt like we were in good hands. She was very approachable , would recommend home remedies before medicines and always had a smile on her face . We thank her from the bottom of our hearts and will be forever grateful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We were lucky to have Dr. Meeta take care and guide us through this sweet journey in delivering our bundle of joy. Her enthusiasm and positivity ensured that we came out happier after each visit. She suggests natural healing over medication and involves medicine as last option. We were able to achieve the baby growth mostly with diet, and needed medicines and supplements for a very short duration at later stage of pregnancy, to achieve the expected growth target. We had issues like gestational diabetes and high water level, and with her guidance we delivered a healthy full term baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Without Dr. Meeta, my pregnancy journey wouldn't have been as enjoyable as it was. The energy she passes on as soon as one enters her room is commendable. With the confidence she gave me, I was active until the evening I got admitted for delivery.She has been quite practical with her approach, right from day 1. Her approach on using medicines just as a supplement and making the best out of our daily diet helped me gain the optimum amount of weight throughout my pregnancy. With her constant motivation and push, I attempted to learn swimming during my pregnancy too. She helps you take informed decisions at all points in time. All of this, to ensure the delivery process goes as smooth as possible. Although I ended up delivering my baby through an emergency C-section, all of the activities I did all along, helped me recover super fast. Would definitely recommend!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I started consulting Dr. Meeta for my pregnancy. I had a lot of questions and confusion since it was my first pregnancy with consciousness about my own health as well. She is very ************* *** supportive.
I had few complications and she ensured to monitor me regularly. She described each stage of my pregnancy and what I liked the most is her focus towards limited usage of medication by taking natural alternatives. Another thing which I loved is that she described various options for any situation or issue which I can chose while being very clear on critical points. We both decided our next course of action based on facts from medical examination rather than preconceived notions. My surgery went well which ensured a successful delivery with a healthy baby. 
I have fully recovered within 15 days and am able to do everything as usual thanks to her post delivery support. Wanted to convey my deepest thanks for her support throughout pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Parturition,Pregnancy Scan,Prenatal Checkup,Labor and Delivery,
review: We would like to wholeheartedly thank Dr. Meeta Chawhan for her support and the treatment offered during my second pregnancy. Dr. Meeta is highly experienced in her domain, friendly yet professional. She patiently listened to all my health issues throughout my pregnancy and offered the exact treatment addressing the complications that arise at the age of 35 years. I am extremely happy that she prescribes only the required medicines and always suggests natural remedies. My pregnancy journey throughout these months has been smooth from planning till the delivery of our little daughter. I consulted her both online and offline. I would recommend Dr. Meeta Chawhan to every aspiring and would-be parents. Thank you Ma'am once again for being there and adding happiness and joy to our lives.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Exercise,Child Birth Education,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Maternal Care/ Checkup,
review:
We conceived after 3 years.We were really worried of how we would go thrugh it.
But Dr.Meeta helped us through our pregnancy.
She informed us what was lacking and what the diagnosis is going to be. We were asked to meet here when required and guided us to what needs to be done. Timely scans were done. She told us what needed to be improved and guided us how it needs to be done. Even during the delivery of thebaby she calmed us and explained the process and the risks invoved and made it hassle free for me and the baby. She tried to help in all ways possible.It is journey with Dr.Meeta that we will remember and cherish throughout our lives.

We would highly recommened to visit her for your pregnancy care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Since I moved from Singapore to india for my delivery , I was looking for a gynecologist who I could trust. After my research I finalized Dr. Meeta chawhan. From my first visit I was sure that she is the one I would like to be associated with. Dr.Meeta is friendly and most importantly explains clearly what an expected mother is supposed to be doing . From eating right to working out she always discussed with me on my visits. Finally my delivery was a smooth sail. She knows her patients well enough. Hence I strongly recommend Dr.Meeta Chawhan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had consulted Dr. Meeta for my first pregnancy and I am glad I made that decision. She is a very patient doc who will address all the queries in your mind automatically. I had bit of complications during my journey but Dr. Meeta made it so comfortable for me with her combination of traditional remedies and positive vibe. She never prescribes any unnecessary medicines. Overall I had a fabulous experience with my delivery with her.Even post pregnancy I have been consulting her for my issues and she helps to calm me down and provide me a great resolution.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We decided to visit Dr. Meeta post reading all the good reviews and I can say it was a good decision.As it was my first pregnancy, there were so many thoughts, doubts, fear and so on... But with Dr. Meeta 9 months passed smoothly. She would never prescribe unnecessary medicines and would always focus on natural remedies.I was covid  in my 8th month and even at that time she made me very comfortable and relaxed.Her amicable nature, experience, knowledge and guidance is all anyone could ask for during pregnancy."Congratulations it's a girl" still echoes in my ears(as I dozed off after that 🤪)I had an emergency C-Sec and was very nervous but when you finally see your doctor you know she will do the right thing.Thank You doctor for giving me a happy and relaxing pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We consulted Dr Meeta for pregnancy planning till baby birth and my experience with her was really great.
She listens patiently, makes you feel very comfortable and addresses all queries and concerns very convincingly. She is very positive, in all complicated situations she will provide positive suggestions which is really great.
Throughout my pregnancy, she guided me very well, ***** ********** *********** ********* *** ******
I thank her for making my pregnancy a beautiful experience. Highly recommend her to all the expecting moms.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** ** *** ***** She was recommended by our family but we still went for more experienced doctor during first trimester. But thankfully we came to Dr. Meeta for the second opinion as we were not satisfied with the first doctor.  

This was my second pregnancy and I was already aware of this whole process. But Dr. Meeta made this a experience, I really enjoyed consulting with her.

The best thing happen when I was admitted in the mid night and I was wondering if any other duty doctors is going to do the delivery. But there she was right before the delivery around 4:30AM in the morning. I know how difficult it would be to come to hospital for the deliver at 4-5am in the morning and then again come at 8am for the OPD.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: One of our friends recommended Dr Meeta and she was part of our entire pregnancy journey. She has helped in a lot of things and made this pregnancy a memorable one. Dr. Meeta has rich knowledge and expertise and we recommend her for everyone. Her confidence and subject matter expertise calmed us down during stressful stages of pregnancy. The best part is her energy and the positive vibe when you consult her which is exactly what you need. Overall, you will be very lucky to have her as your doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Meeta Chawhan is very friendly * ********* ******.She is full of positive vibes. It is our first child, but all over the pregnancy period, she has supported emotionally and guided us properly for the next step. She always prefers natural ways rather than prescribing so many medicines. Also, she always motivates to do exercises and remain active, doesnt prescribe unnecessary tests/ scans etc. Because of her support and guidance we were able to have normal delivery for which she encourages first if there are no complications. Overall it was an excellent experience with her, I advise all to go with her without any doubt.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
She was recommended to me by a friend. I started visiting her for pre pregnancy tests and continued with her through my pregnancy and delivery. She is without doubt the best doctor I have ever come across.

I miss my appointments with her now that i dont need to visit her anymore. Her words gave me confidence. She is so knowledgeable, confident and cheerful that even if you are sad or tensed about something , while coming out of her cabin, you would be cheerful! She made pregnancy look like cakewalk for me!
Her prescription includes minimal medication and she suggested home remedies too when required!

She was unintentionally my therapist too for the pregnancy. I regained confidence just by talking to her!

She is magical and I would blindly recommend her to everyone!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,
review:
I was referred by another renowned gynaecologist to Dr. Mita. There was blood clot seen in my first scan and it was cleared by medication given by her. She had always prescribed very less medicines and always encouraged to fix the problems by dietary changes.I had lots of ups and downs during pregnancy.From covid to gestational thyroid to short cervix, she had explained every issue clearly and given us full dose of confidence that it will be resolved if I follow her instructions. I followed all her instructions and medication and by gods grace received best gift of our lives on 3rd November 2022.
I am really grateful that I was referred to Dr. Mita who is undoubtedly best in town.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
When my husband and I found out that we were pregnant we immediately started looking for well experienced gynecologists in Bangalore. Initially approached 2 doctors and then came to Meeta mam for our third visit and immediately we knew that she was the one to deliver our baby. 

Being first time parents we had so many questions and doubts. Meeta mam made sure that our questions are answered and her enthusiasm and expertise made us at ease during our every visit. We had faced few issues during our early pregnancy which she helped us overcome with confidence

 Looking back, My labor day did not go as expected mainly because of the extremely poor management by the hospital but my pregnancy journey was really memorable all thanks to Meeta Mam. I had a C section delivery with no complications for which I thank Meeta mam and her team. My post-partum recovery was really smooth and I could easily vouch for Meeta mam’s professional expertise in the matter. I would highly recommend her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Visited for pregnancy checkup and delivered a sweet boy with her diligent and friendly care.
I consulted her to confirm my pregnancy and her friendly nature won my heart. I suffered from bad case of nausea throughout my pregnancy. She guided me with all natural ways to deal with it and boosted my spirits without forcing for unnecessary medication and tests but also ensuring that I was not having any severe health issues causing the nausea. She waited till the last possible moment so i can deliver naturally but my baby was in breach position so i had to go for c-section. I had minimal pain in postpartum and she took care for common postpartum issues like stitches care by educating me and doing regular checkup to ensure everything is smooth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Due to an emergency situation we had to change our gynac in the last minute and in our very first meet with Dr. Meeta Chauhan we knew we were in the right hand - not only she was very approachable everytime but she treated me with all the patience and confidence!She has a rich experience and took prompt and timely action to ensure smooth delivery of our baby boy. Her confident advice and suggestions are very comforting which indeed helped me to keep my stress level low :)We are highly grateful to her and the unit of Cloudnine hospital

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I delivered a baby girl in October 2022, under the excellent supervision of Dr. Meeta Chawhan. I am a PCOD patient and had a cyst in my ovary that was quite large. Also, I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes during my 7th month. Dr. Meeta handled my case with utmost care. She is a very patient, friendly, supportive, and committed doctor. Although my biometry (Hadlock) indicated that my baby might be underweight, I was able to deliver a healthy baby weighing 3.1 kg. It became possible because of the exceptional guidance provided by Dr. Meeta.

My mantra during my entire pregnancy has been "trust Dr. Meeta and follow her advice." She is a star doctor. I strongly recommend her!

Thank you, doctor, for the miracle you have brought to our lives.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have visited Dr.Meeta Chawhan when I got pregnant with my first baby. You are lucky if you are consulting her. She is very friendly doctor, tries to solve any medical issues with dietary changes, only gives medication when it is necessary. 
I always had a fear of normal delivery & so I was planning for a C-section, but Dr.Meeta advised me for normal delivery as I didn’t have any complications in my pregnancy. I delivered through normal delivery with no complications and I am happy that I have followed her advice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited doctor Meeta for my pregnancy check-ups and during our first meeting itself i was sure about taking up my pregnancy journey with her. She is one of the best gynaecologists in Bangalore. The way she will explain you things is really great and gives you enough time to listen to you. She makes sure that you go home happy and stress free after every visit. She made me feel i am in safe hands during my delivery and everything went perfectly well after delivery. I thank her for making my pregnancy easy and healthy . I always look up to her for any gynaecology related concerns for all my family members.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Labor and Delivery,
review: I consulted Dr Meeta Chawhan for my pregnancy and delivery from 4th Month. I would highly recommend her. She listens patiently to all the problems. She suggests home remedies for common problems which might occur during pregnancy like diarrhoea or constipation. She is very strict in healthy dieat and encourages mother to take balanced high protein diet. This helped me in controlling weight gain during my pregnancy. She prepared me for normal delivery and suggested excercise routine. We had wonderful experience throughout pregnancy and delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We got Dr Meeta’s reference from online web search and decided to pay her visit when we realised we were expecting. From day one the experience was very good.

She was always very attentive and gave ample amount of time to us and was never hasty in any manner.

Another best thing about Dr. Meeta was her positivity, as this was my first pregnency, I always had lot of questions and confusions and Dr Meeta always gave me logical reasons about my doubts and suggested to enjoy the phase. Rather than jumping directly onto medicines, she would suggest to go for natural remedies for any kind of health concern that is faced during pregnancy. 

Overall it was a great experience with her and I was able to enjoy and felt safe under her guidance during my whole pregnancy and post delivery phase. All thanks to Dr Meeta.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr meeta is very professional and always gives natural remedies rather than medication which i liked the most. Doctor suggestions helped not to gain much weight during my pregnancy but help with baby weight gain alone. Always greets patient with smile and explains the health issue clearly if any.Doctor suggestions really made sense to me to every stage.Doctor has very positive attitude and gives us to choose delivery mode c sec or normal even at last moment unless there is a risk to baby. My pregnancy journey has been smooth with dr.meeta guidance. Kudos to her

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Mighty recommended!!

I’ve a heart of gratitude for Dr Meeta Chawhan for ensuring that the most beautiful and the much awaited part of my life, my babygirl gets delivered with all the care, and no stress via an IVF procedure:)

Right from the conception, she has been extremely prompt, meticulous and sensitive towards the diet, fitness, observation, tests with minimal medications. She also tried her utmost for a normal delivery but since the pain didn’t aggravate, C section was required which I must admit went on so smoothly. 

I was very touchy about the movements of the baby and if everything was going smooth, Dr Meeta always allayed my fears and ensured the happiness quotient was intact. She made sure my weight was under control esp because I have a tendency to put on! 

Gift yourself the experience of a great pre and post pregnancy under Dr Meeta’s guidance, thank you Doctor:))

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Met Meetha mam for my second pregnancy after consulting 4 other Doctors... Was very scared in my second pregnancy bcz of the complications which I had, but Meetha mam made sure she address and explains to me in a very positive way. I was very impressed seeing that she even replies when in some emergency we text her and ask some doubts, she immediately response to the texts which makes us feel we are in safe hands..

Thank you mam for all your support.
My pregnancy journey was very smooth and happy because of you🥰😊

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Meeta Chawhan - One of the confident gynaecologist I have ever met, because of her confidence even we didn't have any doubts about our pregnancy. She addresses each and every concerns regarding the health very calmly and without giving any stress, because of which even we were at ease. My delivery was very much convenient & comfortable with Cloudnine(Whitefield) under Dr.Meeta Chawhan's guidance. If we could go for a second pregnancy it will be under her guidance only, no second thoughts on it.
Thank you.
Nimya Menon

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I was recommended by one of my friend to Dr.Meeta. I came to Bangalore after baby shower during my 7th month and a growth scan was taken and found my baby weight was just 1.3kg and the amniotic fluid around the baby was in border 9.3. I had IUGR, however she guided me the right way to follow diet with required proteins for a day along with required suppliments for baby growth. She also educated about baby lung maturity issue in case of reduction in amniotic fluid and guided on getting betametasome injected for same. Initially when I heard these issues i was sure my delivery would go for a c section as I was expecting my baby would be underweight but because I followed her instructions my baby weight was normal and I was able to try for normal delivery and it was a success. She has always explained the situation of the medical condition well. She is enthusiastic and positivity in her speech makes me enthusiastic as well. Wonderful experience and thank you doc for everything

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I consulted Dr Meetha during my pregnancy. I had a great experience and a smooth pregnancy under her care. I am really thankful to her that I have a healthy baby girl now. 
I was having gestational diabetes during pregnancy, Dr Meetha helped me understand my condition and guided me to follow a healthy lifestyle and receive proper medication. She helped me to stay confident about my health. After my child birth I was able to recover quickly. I would highly recommend Dr Meetha for consultation during pregnancy

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Exercise,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Normal Delivery,
review:
I had my second normal delivery in July this year thanks to Dr Meeta. Before her I had consulted two doctors but it couldn't work out with them for some reason. She has a lovely positive personality. Despite a super packed schedule she always attends with utmost patience.

From my first consultation to the after discharge support and care I was very pleased with the whole experience. I don't think I would have managed to have a normal delivery if I didn't not have a doc like her. Given my high functioning anxiety; a professional and competent doctor like her was a prerequisite.

I would highly recommend her for a smooth pregnancy and delivery experience. Haven't met a better gynaecologist and obstetrician before. The tireless effort and work she puts in for you as a patient is a sheer blessing. Kudos to you for doing what you do 😊stay blessed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: *** ***** ******* ** ** ********* ****** *** delivered my daughter on 14th July 2022. Actually, we started visiting her on my 7th month of pregnancy because I was not happy with my previous doctor. She is very experienced and friendly doctor which made me so comfortable during my pregnancy journey. My baby had two cords around her neck which wasn't visible even via scan reports on 37 weeks but I felt less movements all of a sudden.It was doctor Meeta who told that the baby is on distress by seeing the NST reports continuously for 3 days and decided to do LSCS on 37 weeks 5 days. For doctor Meeta only our baby was born healthy. Our heartiest gratitude to her to deliver our baby healthy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr.Meeta Chawhan is very professional and carry lots of positive vibes along with her. I was very confident and my pregnancy journey was like cake walk because of her confidence support and treatment methodology. She always use to listen our queries very patiently and answer questions with proper practical reason. Her focus throughout was to ensure safety of mother and baby health via healthy eating habits, portion diet, regular walk and exercise. Her primary approach was always to home remedy before going into any medication.

She was constant source of motivation for us.😊

I miss her opening statement  (Awr Piyoosha kya chal raha, kya ho raha hai aaj) and closing statement (go home enjoy).

I would definitely recommend Dr. Meeta Chawhan for all the MOM TO BE.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hello, I will start sharing my experience by putting a Thank You note to Dr Meeta.

We started visiting Dr Meeta after completion of first trimester. Since then she became the pillar and helped me throughout my pregnancy journey. She listened to my health history with patience and guided me for positive delivery. 
I had an emergency C-Section and delivered a healthy baby girl in 36th week under her guidance. Dr Meeta was available as soon as I was admitted and performed the surgery. She gave me confidence and positivity even in the OT.

I am really thankful and blessed to have Dr Meeta by my side as she was a constant support and brought positivity. She helped me overcome my bad past experiences and strength to trust myself. She explained all the issues and remedies well before and made us prepared. Many thanks to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Care of women with repeated miscarriage,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),
review:
Having undergone consecutive miscarriages, my husband and I were very dejected and concerned, when a friend referred me to Dr.Meeta.

During our first consultation, she made me feel comfortable and gave me a lot of positivity at that difficult time. She was very patient, did a thorough job of under my history and gave me very actionable advice on what we can do to minimise the chance of a miscarriage. 

God willing, we got pregnant in a couple of months. Dr.Meeta made us feel positive by communicating clearly about her approach, being friendly and approachable in addressing all our questions ans concerns through the pregnancy. 

Now,my husband and I are parents to a beautiful 3 month old baby girl and we are truly grateful to Dr.Meeta. We are lucky to have found a doctor who is perfect in all aspects and would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
This was my first pregnancy and like all other first timers, I was very anxious and susceptible about what and how to do best for my baby but doctor Meera Chawhan explained everything so well and made my pregnancy journey so easy that I didn't have even tiniest of problem during my 9 months.
She was always focused on eating whole foods and avoiding supplements. She always encouraged me to follow the holistic approach in case of any issue and that helped me throughout even after delivery. I would like to thank doctor Meeta for all her guidance and will definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Even before I conceived I knew that I wanted to consult Dr Meeta only as we had heard and read really good things about doctor Meeta. Doctor Meeta will listen and understand your problem and will explain things in a very nice way so that it's easy for common people to understand as well. She promotes healthy lifestyle and using natural things to improve ones health and to treat ailments rather than relying heavily on medicines. I had many issue during my pregnancy, starting with hypothyroid, to uncontrolled sugar to low blood count to heartburns and many more. She always tried to make sure that I use the least amount of medicine and treat issues naturally. I would recommend Doctor Meeta wholeheartedly and will go back to her for my future consultations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We consulted Dr Meeta for our first pregnancy after seeing the positive feedback on Practo. From the very 1st consultation she was very open about the different aspects of our pregnancy journey. Throughout the 9 months she had only advised home remedies for any problem and never encouraged to take medicines. She was always very clear that taking care of mental health is as important as physical health. We always wanted normal delivery and followed doctors instructions. We were blessed with a beautiful baby boy on 1st June through normal delivery. Dr Meeta was a guiding angel for us throughout the journey. For all ladies and expecting mothers, I would recommend Dr Meeta if you want your journey to be simple and beautiful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We recommend Dr. Meeta chawhan as we consulted her in cloud nine during my wife's pregnancy.It was a twin pregnancy and  during our first visit itself my wife was very happy that she understands all her problems with patience and suggests best practices and home remedies .As her profile suggests that she has 25 years of experience which is visible through her accurate diagnosis and confidence with which she talks to the patients and handles cases.We are happy with the support which she has provided during this whole journey and it continues till today.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We started consulting Dr. Meeta at the very start of my pregnancy and she has been wonderfully supportive and guided me through out and helped deliver my bundle of joy in Jan 2020.

Since this was my first pregnancy; i was very anxious to find a dependable  gynecologist and were looking up options and had visited couple of Dr.s when one of my neighbors in my apartment gave me Dr. Meeta`s referral.

As a medical doctor; she is very good at her job and my comfort with Dr Meeta grew with each visit to her- She did not recommend any un necessary medicines, gave me  the right medical guidance at  each junction, patiently helped me through all my questions and doubts in each interaction and always provided me the support that i needed during my pregnancy journey.

tags: None
review:
I had  consulted Dr.Meeta Chawhan in cloud nine(Whitefield) right from the starting of pregnancy till delivery . We are vey happy with doctor  in way of treating the patients and explaining the minute things right from  medications to the  clarification on  every medical report.

I always used to get energy after her  every consultation due to her clear and positive explanations and  especially for  her words "Go & Enjoy the pregency". She always suggests to take natural supplements instead of too many medications.

I had a severe itching  in 3rd trimester , her suggestions and  medications  really helped me a lot in enjoying the pregency for remaining period.

Periodic consultations and suggestions in  9th month had helped  in finding  the  complications  at an early stage and finally delivered baby boy after 37 weeks with c-section. Thanks to Dr.Meeta.

I would highly recommend her for consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited Dr Meeta Chawhan from pregnancy confirmation till delivery. My pregnancy went smooth with no major complications and  credit goes to her. She is so positive and her vibe gave me so much confidence throughout my term.She always greeted me with a good smile, listened to all my concerns and explained each and everything in a detailed manner. I felt she never prescribed any unnecessary medication. During last trimester though my sugar levels were high, she encouraged me to control it through proper diet without any medication. She always advised on right weight gain, healthy protein intake and physical activity. Following the routine prescribed by her helped me in delivering a healthy baby and kudos to her. Thank you so much Doctor for such a sweet and positive experience.. we will always cherish it. I will definitely recommend Dr Meeta chawhan to all expecting mothers for a healthy and safe pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I started consulting Dr. Meeta from pre pregnancy stage. from the very first meeting, I got very positive response and vibe from her. She has a very friendly and jollly personality. This helps a lot during pregnancy as this is a time when people are worried sick about every little thing. She always explained things very well about what the condition is and what should be the remedy. She's never prescribed unnecessary medicines or tests for me. curing problem the natural way was always her first choice. I had lots of complications during my pregnancy but through her guidance I didn't face any problem during delivery. I had to go for c-section but recovered extremely quickly in just a few days. I am really thankful to have met her. Would recommend her for anyone for pregnancy.

review: I delivered my first baby in whitefield cloudnine.My full pregnancy journey after conception was treated by Dr. Meeta.I was very well treated by her with the issues of low weight of the baby and low aminiotic fluid levels.At some stage we were expecting a pre matured baby.But her guidance and treatment had helped us to get a healthy full term baby with proper weight.One of the positives about her is she does not prescribe any unnecessary medications and favours the natural processes, ***** **** ******* ***** *** * *****If we plan for 2nd baby I would definitely consult her again.On top of all this, her friendly nature and enthusiasm will definetly makes our pregnancy journey more joyfull and positive.One of the doctors whom you can rely and trust upon for bringing a new life ..

review:
We started consulting Dr. Meeta from starting of pregnancy till delivery.
Whenever we used to visit she used to talk with a smile and used to solve all small small queries. She will never ask for extra tests, medicine or anything. Always used to emphasise on healthy food.
Used to get always positive vibes from her. She used to answer my silliest questions also with a smile. Never got irritated. Nd used to say go home and enjoy your pregnancy which used to feel really good 

I delivered a baby boy in November by normal delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We visited Dr. Meeta for our first pregnancy care and what a smooth experience it was from there. In our first meeting, we were sure that we are in great hands especially when she said "I will help you enjoy your pregnancy". She is one of the most polite, humble and professional doctor one can come across. One of the many best thing about Dr. Meeta is she never prescribes allopathy medicine until necessary and recommends homemade remedies. Just 10 days before the due date, my wife suffered from gastritis attack with severe abdominal pain and vomiting. Dr. Meeta handled it with ease and encouraged us during the difficult time. 
Finally the delivery was as smooth as pregnancy and we became proud parents of our baby boy. 
We are already endorsing her to our friends and strongly recommending for anyone looking for pre and post delivery care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

review:
We consulted with Dr. Meeta at Cloudnine Whitefield branch right from first month of pregnancy. She has been extremely helpful right from Day 1 helping us understand what our journey during pregnancy would be. 
Her explanation of every scan report and the next course of action helped us be at ease of mind. 
She was approachable even on a weekend over phone when we thought we had an emergency situation.  She also suggests a lot of home remedies which we appreciated a lot.
Dr.Meeta handled my delivery where we were blessed with a baby daughter. With Meeta’s help this was a normal delivery. 
We continue to consult with Dr.Meeta now post-pregnancy.  I would 100% recommend her to my friends n relatives. 
A huge thank you to Dr. Meeta and everyone at Cloudnine Whitefield who helped us bring our little bundle of joy into this world.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Meeta is very friendly *** **** **** ********* ** *** ********* ******* ******* She listens and clarifies all the doubts calmly. I got sugar in my pregnancy. She suggested to go with walk and controlled diet instead of medicine. She tried for normal delivery even though the chances were very less. Finally I got C- section because my baby weight was on higher side but I was alright because of all the exercises I had done during my pregnancy and got discharged in 2 days itself.

During all my visits, Dr Meeta always suggested natural treatments/therapies to maintain good health during pregnancy and after. Following all these, I had a normal delivery. I am very glad to have found her for my delivery.

tags: None
review: It was my first pregnancy and It was very difficult to find  the good doctor. Then we met with Dr. Meeta Chauhan and started to consult from start till delivery. She is very friendly, positive and straight forward with her patients. Throughout pregnancy she explained each and every small thing in detail; also she is never in hurry and clarifies even the smallest and silliest doubt with a smile.Good thing in her is, she always prefer and suggested home remedies wherever possible, and never ask for extra tests/medicine.She never prescribed anything without a reason and advocates normal delivery & also prepares the patient's psychologically for the same. Finally I delivered a baby boy in October 2019 by normal delivery without any complication. I'm really thankful to Dr. Meeta and would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I have been visiting Dr. Meeta for 1+ year now, before and during the pregnancy resulting in successful delivery. 

One quality that stands out is Doctor's friendliness and positive attitude during the entire process. During entire pregnancy she stuck to natural food and remedies vs medicines. She was able to diagnose any deviations early on with necessary tests and was able to course correct with right medication/natural remedies during the pregnancy. She pushed for normal delivery till the end despite all the odds to ensure normal delivery. Only when there was no possibility of normal delivery, she suggested C-Section and delivered the baby safely. Also, she ensured the post delivery recovery to be smooth despite my health issues. 

Overall, I had a pleasant experience with Dr. Meeta and Cloudnine. I would like to recommend to others who wants to consult a caring doctor and push for normal delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I would really recommend Dr. Meeta for pregnancy and baby delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Meeta was my gynac during my prregnacy & also did delivery via C-section. I must say, the way she handled my case & made me comfortable was amazing, especially given that my term was in middle of covid pandemic.


I had to go in for emergency C section, 5 days before due date & she handled it very professionally & a safe manner. Had ZERO post-operative complications or side effects of any kind. Post delivery recovery went very well too. It's been 6+ months post surgery & I have ZERO issues that I generally hear about C section deliveries.

I am very thank full to Dr. Meeta for making my maternity journey a success.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Meeta Chawhan is synonymous to ultimate professional obgyn care and lots of positive vibes. We were under her supervision in the entire pregnancy and even post delivery. She was very supportive and focused in her methodology and we always felt very confident with her. She always used to explain every details and listen to every question of ours. We had complications of Polyhydramnios  and ICP in the third trimester, both had own possible threats to the baby’s health. ICP in our case was quite severe and was considered as a significant complication. Dr  Meeta was absolutely calm and composed in her treatment and instilled lot of confidence in us. Eventually we ended up having a full term healthy baby and C section was super smooth. We are her fans and would love to thank her for everything from the core of our heart.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Being first thing parents my husband and I were scared and anxious about our pregnancy as it was happening in the middle of the pandemic. Meeta mam was God send and put a rest to all our fears and uncertainties. She was direct, thorough and was able to clearly articulate the situation in a way that we could comprehend. The best part is thatb she doesn't prescribe extensive medication unless it's absolutely necessary and believes in holistic health and well-being. The diet and exercise regimen that she had suggested has helped me to stay active and a smooth post partum recovery.  I'm super glad that we chose her and forever grateful for her service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
We first met Meeta madam in 2019 for some problem. I had been trying for baby at that time. Doctor understood and suggested one infertility specialist for me. After some time with that doctor, i finally conceived after 7 years. Once conceived, it was a very easy decision to go back to Meeta madam.
It has been an exhilarating journey of 9 months with its own share of ups and downs.one thing that has been static during this time was Meeta madam's unfaltering support. 
Positive qualities about her are:-
1. She does not suggest any unnecessary medicine.
2. She has a memory of super computer.
3. You will get response on your urgent whatsapp ping anytime provided it's urgent.
4. She is strict if you are not disciplined.

I will definitely recommend her any day for a fulfilling maternity experience.

Thank you so much doctor for the utterly bitterly gift.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I consulted Dr. Meeta and she made this beautiful journey very comfortable for me. 
She is friendly and patiently listens to all our concerns/doubts. She was our constant source of motivation. 
Her communication, confidence and knowledge makes every complex situation easier. Her focus throughout was to ensure safety of mother and baby's health via healthy eating habits, portion diet, regular exercising. Her prime approach always was to follow home remedy and to take medications/external supplements when home remedy does not work in favour.

Our journey of pregnancy and delivery with Dr. Meeta and Cloudnine Hospital Whitefield has been a memorable one and a good one for that! Thanks so much Doctor :)

review: Dr.Meeta Chawhan is vivacious and competent gynaecologist who I was fortunate to consult. My pregnancy had complications, she was not only proactive in arranging the treatment, but also managed to give us a good overview of our options in a high-pressure environment. She bats for normal delivery.I would highly recommend her.

review: I highly recommend Dr. Meeta. This was my first pregnancy and I have been under her care right from the start. review: I consulted Dr. Meeta Chauhan for my second pregnancy. She is extremely professional and prescribes medicines only if it's extremely necessary. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We consulted Dr.Meeta Chawhan during my wife pregnancy. During all our doctor visits with her, she used to spread so much positivity and gave me so much confidence during each stage of pregnancy. For most of the issues, she recommends home medicines/remedies and prescribes medicines only if it is really required. She suggests protein rich diet which would help the baby gain weight. She used to explain the scan reports also very clearly. She is very responsive and answered all of my queries.
She is a very practical person and encourages us to have a positive mindset during pregnancy. The delivery experience was also very smooth.
I highly recommend her to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
A long overdue note of gratitude for the wonderful care Dr. Meeta has given me for last 2 years.
Despite the unusual circumstances of going through this experience during the current pandemic, she made me feel at ease throughout the entire duration of my pregnancy and delivery.
She was thorough in her explanations and took her time answering my questions, often anticipating them. Medicines were prescribed only if they were absolutely necessary otherwise she always recommended a balanced diet, physical activities and most important of all - positive mindset. She understood that every factor, however minor, is still a factor, and she dealt with each one head on. Her expertise made me feel reassured, confident and taken care of.
Humble, trustworthy, passionate, friend, and most importantly, my guardian angel - these are the words comes to mind to describe Dr. Meeta Chauhan. Keep spreading happiness, thank you!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr Meeta for my second pregnancy. In the first consultation itself I knew this is the doctor who I can trust and rely on. She is a disciplined, punctual and extremely professional doctor who always fills you with positive vibes. She always suggested natural home remedies and never suggested any unnecessary medicine. I had few complications in my pregnancy still the doctor always kept me motivated and insisted on being positive. She will try her best for a normal delivery and I had a successful normal delivery without any complications. She had back to back deliveries lined up but she still made it on time for my delivery and made it look easy. And then left with the same energy for her next delivery. Thank you so much doctor for being our guide and a constant support during this entire beautiful pregnancy journey.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I consulted with Dr. Meeta for my pregnancy and had a great experience. She gives very informative and logical explanations to all concerns and queries which makes the journey more comfortable. I could trust her views because she explained things very well. Great thing about her is that she encourages people to have a positive perspective towards everything going on during pregnancy and deal with issues in the most natural way possible. I strictly stuck to the diet suggested by her and had a healthy baby as well as could keep my weight gain and sugar levels in check. I'm really grateful to her for keeping my spirits high throughout the journey; glad that I chose to consult with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I consulted Dr meeta for my first pregnancy.In the very first meeting I was sure that mam would be the best for me.Her advise and friendliness made me comfortable always.She always focus more on the diet rather than medicine.I had complications during eighth month where I experienced premature labor pain but mam handled it very well.At 39 weeks I was diagnosed as covid positive just one day prior to my delivery date.Mam spoke to me over call and assured that she will handle my case and everything will be as planned.Although I was in isolation but the staff was 24 hrs available for me.In OT mam again assured me that everything would be fine and I delivered a healthy baby girl and by god's grace she was covid negative.Mam motivated me to be strong as I was away from my baby for 20 days untill I tested positive.I am still in consultation with mam post delivery as well .Thank you mam for always being there for your patients.Lots of love!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would strongly recommend the Doctor, whoever is looking out for one of the best Gynecologist in Bangalore. Fully Satisfied with the Consultation of the Doctor and happy delivering my Second Baby in CloudNine Whitefield Branch. I like the way Doctor treats her patients, very friendly, helps in clarifying the concerns, very approachable and always recommends home remedies for getting the sufficient Vitamin, Protein, Calcium during the entire pregnancy period. Always she supports and gives confidence to her patients and 99% she recommends for normal delivery, which is most important thing in her. I also had 2nd normal delivery with Doctor's support and advise. She is extremely helpful when it comes to any clarifications that we have during the pregnancy period.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I consulted Dr.Meeta for my first delivery(twins) , which I conceived through IVF.  I would strongly recommend this doctor as she was very friendly, boosted our confidence and mainly did not prescribe any medicines unless absolutely needed. She suggested home remedies for most of the pregnancy symptoms like swollen legs, tiredness etc.  
I had to get admitted in an emergency during my delivery as one of my twin baby passed stools in the womb. Dr, Meeta and her team were readily available and delivered my twins within 45 minutes and I did not feel any discomfort during c-section procedure, she also counseled me before the procedure and assured me that everything will be fine. 

Even post delivery , she encouraged me to walk around after 24 hours and start mild exercise after 8 weeks,  Her advice helped me recoup faster and walk around, did not have any difficulty with the stiches . 

Me and my husband thank Dr. Meeta and her entire team at cloud9 whitefield.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review:
Dr. Meeta is a very friendly person with lots of positivity to begin with. She understands patient's problem and address them with atmost care.

I never saw a allopathy doctor prescribing home remedies (beyond the regular medication)  which worked perfectly during  the tough times of pregnancy.

Her vast knowledge and experience made me feel comfortable during every visit and especially during the delivery time. She nicely handled and addressed the critical situation that arose during my delivery which is really really much appreciable.

The staff nurses and associated doctors  in her panel were very friendly and made me feel home always.

BIG THANKS to all of them especially the below.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Got in touch with Dr Meeta through a reference at the beginning of my pregnancy and was consulting her throughout. She was extremely confident, something that a nervous first time parent could totally appreciate. Was detected with a short cervix and advised bed rest with medication. The way Dr Meeta handled and explained (without an iota of panic) was commendable. Infact we went for a second opinion out of sheer fear of losing the pregnancy, and suggested alternate treatment, however she stood her ground throughout and asked us to take it one day at a time. We continued consulting her and finally delivered with her. Would highly recommend her if you are looking for a fairly professional and a straight forward obstetrician. Can’t thank her enough for the confidence she gave us and the way she handled us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Hi All, Just want to share my experience with Dr Meeta who was recommended by few of my apartment colleagues who themselves had a great Happy experience. We started consulting her from the month of April 2021 and right from day 1 she always was like a guardian and her suggestions for better health were always with no or very less medical aids .She was more focussed towards natural home remedies. Her energy levels and involvement with us in the journey was a real relaxation for having mental peace after every consultation done. With her efforts and prescriptions along with almighty's blessings we had a new member in the family with no complications at all. Overall a happy rewarding experience with doctor Meeta. Please do visit her for any medical support needed without any second thoughts. Thank you.🙏

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
****** *** ** *** **** ** *** *** **** ******* ******* *** ****** It is very rare to find such doctors these days.

She listens patiently, makes you feel very comfortable and addresses all queries and concerns very convincingly.

Doesn't overdose you with a lot of medicines, believes in naturopathy and prescribes medicines only where really needed. A strong advocate and patron for normal delivery and tries her very best to help her patients deliver normally.

I had recovered from PCOD and I had Gedtational Diabetes Mellitus too from the fourth month for my second child. But thanks to Dr Meeta Chawhan,  delivered perfectly normally with no complications what so ever.

After a lot of secondary research, my husband and I had zeroed in on Dr. Meeta and consulted her right from the first pregnancy check. We are really happy that we found her. It had been truly a wonderful experience with Dr. Meeta Chawhan.

Thank you so much Doctor! God bless!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had consulted Dr. Meeta for two pregnancies. I heard about her from two friends who had delivered babies in Dr. Meeta's guidance. I met Dr. Meeta at the beginning of my first pregnancy and was assured that I was in save hands. She is extremely understanding, caring, *** *** ******** ********* ** *** ****** I particularly appreciate her method of guiding pregnant moms with diet, exercise, good thoughts and positivity throughout the duration. For my second pregnancy, I went to her even though i had changed location and moved to BTM. She has this magic of calming down moms-to-be and helping them relax in just a few minutes of conversation. I strongly recommend Dr. Meeta. She is our angel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It has been a wonderful journey with Doctor Meeta. I had consulted her for pregnancy. Initially I had bleeding and a cyst which was little concerning. But the way the doctor encourages and treats ( she explains the issues as well) to move forward is amazing. I felt more confident and positive. Every visit with the doctor has been so smooth in each trimester. I would highly recommend the doctor if you wish that your pregnancy journey should be joyful and to be taken care very well. She always recommends home remedies as much as feasible which is a huge plus. Does not exaggerate things - at the same time explains the issue very clearly and resolves it. She is very friendly and is very punctual. Her positive approach to every single issue is significant. ******* *** ** *** ** *** ****** ************* *** *** ***** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted doctor meeta from day one of my pregnancy and very much satisfied with her ..She made me feel comfortable  when I panicked during my  emergency c section and I had painless delivery under her supervision.I had Gestational diabetes from first trimister n bp in last month that was taken care well by her. She wil not prescribe unecessary medicines and  test .My entire pregnancy was smooth because of her .I always felt positive whenever I  met her during my consultations  .She is indesipensible part of my wonderful pregnancy journey . tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Choosing Dr Meeta Chauhan was the best decision I made which made my mother hood journey very smooth. She highly recommends natural birth which has become a very less opted solution in deliveries now a days.  She took care of my gastric issue with the minimum amount of medications,  which was a blessing to  me as I don't like much meds to gulp down.She was very cooperative in the covid situation too and was always available that shows her passion for her patients in this important journey of life. As it was  my first pregnancy I had a lot of doubts and questions which were taken care patiently from her side, with the additional guidance of do's and don't in every single visit. She was also a big moral booster  in terms of positive thinking and at the same time made  practical possibilities clear with a certain amount of ease.  I totally recommend her to other patients  and am sure they will be as happy and satisfied as me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I came to know about Dr. Meeta through my sister in law and decided to consult her. She has very positive attitude, keeps calm and has great patience to listen and clarify each and every possible doubt. After had consult to her even i feel very positive. she not give unnecessary medicines. She prefers simple home remedy solution for the treatment. She encourages to eat healthy home made food and exercise throughout the pregnancy. I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes during second trimester. She advised not to take medicine rather control diet and monitor blood sugar level on regular basis. It worked out nicely. it was a normal delivery without any complications. We are blessed with a healthy baby boy.  *** ** * **** ******* I look forward to continue my post delivery check ups with her. Thank you so much mam.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
