review:
We consulted with Dr. Meeta throughout during my pregnancy up until delivery. She was very comfortable to speak with, patiently listened to and answered all our queries and encouraged me to have a healthy and fit pregnancy. She timely informed us about all the tests, shots etc... She was also present during the delivery and led the process very calmly and made me calm.

Me and my husband were very lucky and happy to have her as my gynecologists and I always highly recommend her to anyone looking for a doctor during pregnancy.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Based on the review s we had decided to go to Dr.Meetha . Since it was my first pregnancy had lots of doubts .
But the first meet with Dr.  made everything very easy & sorted form . From day 1 I trusted her fully and followed everything . 
There is no more medicine prescription other than  calcium and iron . And whatever I had problems like gastric during pregnancy for every thing she advised to take home remedies and everything worked out well. 
Main she advised me healthy wait gain by having protein rich foods. 
During covid and lockdown I was near to due date she was available in hospital as well as for video consultation. 
Finally it was a normal delivery without any complications.
Blessed with a baby boy 💕.
Dr.Meetha chawhan magical hands. She is very positive and lively . 
She entered labour within 15 min I had delivered baby. That's Meetha chawhan ❤️. 
Thank s a lot mam for everything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We visited the Dr. in Feb 2021, after so much research in internet and it was worth every penny.
She takes care with all possibilities with minimal medication and more home remedies which is really essential for a pregnant lady. 
We had bit complication as there was a cord around the neck of the baby, and we were scared as we came to know about it after the initial scan. But, Dr. helped us mentally and with her right suggestion, guidance and help we got a little baby girl, healthy and fine. 

Thanks a lot for help, specially during this pandemic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Had an extremly satisfying experience with our pregnancy journey at Cloud Nine Whitefield and were blessed with a healthy baby. We were being referred to Dr. Meeta Chawan mam and we went ahead with the referral that turned out to be a best decision. Meeta mam is a highly experienced doctor being in the field for more than 20 years. *** ** **** ************** caring and comforting and we never had a single unsatisfied visit during the entire 9 months. She knew the exact reason for every situation a pregnant women goes through and suggested the correct thing to do. Her motivation and dietery suggestions helped us easily overcome GD without any need for insulin injections or extra medication. Thanks to Meeta mam and Cloud nine for being part of our wonderful journey to our parenthood. We highly recommend Dr. Meeta mam for all future moms.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Meeta Chawhan was the first and last doctor I met in Bangalore for my pregnancy. I was very happy with the way she handled my case (mild complication in pregnancy).
She gave me and my husband lot of positivity and hope. Never hid any information from us. The best thing about her is her communication skill, you will get lot of confidence after talking to her.
She delivered our baby boy safe and healthy.
I liked her a lot because of her knowledge, proper communication of the situation to the patient and her friendliness. Overall an amazing person.
Thank you doctor, god bless you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr meeta for my 2nd pregnancy which I expected to be normal. I like her friendliness way of treatment and the things she used to explain in a right way. All went good. As I got some complications like less baby weight and baby did motion mine was c section. But Dr saved my baby and did painless c section operation. Because of Dr only I was dare enough to face c section as I had experience of normal delivery for 1st baby. Both me and baby are healthy happy and safe. She did a marvellous job. Thank u so much mam. Thank u clounine hospital team for their timely cooperation and support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had consulted Dr Meeta from the 1st trimester of my pregnancy. She had provided timely suggestions on supplements and food intake so  that baby has healthy weight gain. Irrespective of whether its a video consultation or in person consultation at the hospital, the interactions with her have been hassle free and smooth. She explains what to expect out of lab & scan reports and ensures that the patient is completely aware of all the tests and the state of their body. This gives a lot of confidence. Overall the complete journey has been very smooth and delivered a healthy baby.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: A friend recommended doctor Meeta to me before I conceived. Consulted her from day 1 of my pregnancy to post delivery. Like the way doctor managed from day 1 by making things simple and suggesting nothing beyond what was required. Often in India, pregnancy is dealt as a medical condition, but Dr Meeta's comment "you are pregnant not sick" helped me break all stereotypes associated with pregnancy. I had a smooth pregnancy period, though I had gestational diabetes. Had some complication post delivery but finally over all of it. So, follow what the doctor says and you shall see the benefits.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr. Meeta when I was in my first month of pregnancy. My friend had recommended her. I found her easy to talk to and explain whatever I was feeling and going through. She doesn’t believe in medicines. She constantly instead on eating healthy and doing regular exercises. Never allowed me to gain extra weight which would be difficult to shed post pregnancy. Throughout nine months I went to her and followed her guidance. I had normal delivery in 39weeks + 3days. My baby is 1.5 months old and doing great. And I am already at my previous weight where I was at the beginning of the pregnancy. I would highly recommend her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: My wife was unfortunately diagnosed with ectopic pregnancy . Dr Chauhan  was prompt enough to do the scans and detect the actual reason of pain and uneasiness that my wife was going through. She clearly explained the next course of action. We got herself admitted the next day and even being on a busy schedule Dr Chauhan did the surgery on an urgent basis. It was a key hole surgery so the recovery time was less and my wife was back to her normal routine. Although we were worried about the operation but Dr Chauhan have us the necessary moral support as well. She even gave us the mental support to pursue pregnancy in future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr Meeta for my second pregnancy prenatal consultation and also she has delivered my second baby. I was very skeptical before visiting the doctor as my first pregnancy was in US and I wanted a doc who can help me for a normal delivery for my second time also. Dr Meeta is a very friendly doctor who explains all your complications and health issues in a nice way and gives you proper suggestions about your diet changes which would be good for your baby. I personally liked my second pregnancy journey with Dr Meeta and I would recommend others also who is looking for a good doctor for their delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I came to know about Dr.Meeta via practo & I must say, I was very fortunate to have such doctor in my pregnancy journey. 

I was in 5th month when I moved from Singapore to India & based on online reviews I consulted Dr.Meeta in Cloudnine, Whitefield & right from my first consultation I was well treated and instructed by Dr.Meeta

Based on our overall experience we felt we were very lucky to have Dr.Meeta as our Gyno.doctor as we had many pros over cons experiences

* Based on Body condition a right medication was provided ( preferably natural over chemical consumables)
* OnTime availability : No much wait time to consult doctor
* Way of approaching patients is remarkable
* Do's & Dont's during pregnancy period was well explained to keep myself & baby healthy
* Exceptional moral support was provided to me at difficult times of Covid- wave2 situation.

I strongly recommend Dr.Meeta to everyone and & will definately look forward  for any future consultations

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: I am under consultation with Dr Meeta for my pregnancy and delivery. I am very much satisfied with the service. She is very friendly, addresses all our queries with patience, recommends home remedies of the problem first rather than medicine. She stressed upon staying active throughout pregnancy by doing walk and exercises due to which I was able to control my sugar with minimal medication and had just right weight gain. I had bleeding in first trimester for which I was very scared about possible complications but her advises made me stay calm and positive throughout pregnancy. I am very thankful for havinh consulted dr Meeta.

She always recommends us to follow a good diet and instructed us on various things which helped us pre and post pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review: When I conceived, many people have referred Dr. Meeta . We went and consulted her for our first twin pregnancy. the entire process under her was very smooth . She explained everything in detail about the results of each scan , blood tests, vaccinations ,medicines. Since we were having twins , she also guided how to maintain good weight of the babies and how to keep them healthy. The twins completed 37 weeks under her and we are very thankful as there are was no risk of pre mature delivery. C section and it's recovery was also very smooth . She kept a check on my health and diet.Dr. Meeta is friendly and will always give positive vibes, and will make you delivery stress free for sure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I consulted Dr. Meeta for my second baby. She ** **** ************* *** addresses patient's concerns diligently. She has a structured approach to pregnancy complications and does not haste for expensive tests and medications. She recommends home remedies and diet changes. Under her guidance the onset of gestational diabetes was delayed until end of 3rd trimester, unlike previous pregnancy. I went into labor Sunday night and had an emergency caesarean on the festival of Holi. Dr. Meeta's team handled the emergency very well and I delivered a healthy baby. Her team monitored me throughout for medication, food, lactating the baby, physiotherapy exercises for recovery. Her post operative care is equally excellent. I faced high BP and severe headaches. Dr. Meeta was approachable for the treatment. I would highly recommend Dr. Meeta to family and friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have been consulting with Dr. Meeta from the starting of my first pregnancy. I was really impressed with her positive outlook towards the whole  journey of pregnancy, She always focus on proper weight gain, natural nutrition and exercises. Apart from the medical consultation (in which she is master) she prepared me for motherhood by motivating me to take utmost care of myself. 
I got admitted in hospital for labor induction for normal delivery. Despite long waiting hours, my labor pain did not start. She still motivated my to try for normal delivery. However me and my husband took decision to go for cesarean section after long wait. Doctor and hospital staff was very well coordinated and I was operated immediately.  
I am very satisfied with doctor friendliness and highly recommend her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We consulted Dr Meeta for our first pregnancy and since the beginning she instilled great confidence in us. She made sure we understand and practice “a healthy pregnancy” by following an effective diet that nurtures both mother and the child, follow regular exercise and enjoy the process. Throughout the pregnancy she was strict, yet empathetic and a great listener. 
By eating well, and maintaining a healthy lifestyle I gained 12 kgs during my pregnancy and lost 8kgs immediately after, thereby making my recovery process very smooth and easy. 
Throughout the pregnancy she explained each scan report, every milestone very patiently and ensured we are calm, confident, and well informed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I have consulted Meeta mam for my Pregnancy from day1 and during these 9 months , I am fully satisfied with her treatment. She is extremely experienced which can be seen in the way of handling her patients. I was really happy to know that she focus more on home remedies instead of prescribing medicine for all issues unlike other doctors. She focuses on healthy diet (more protein) and exercises/yoga because of which I have just gained 11 kg weight in pregnancy.I have delivered baby boy via C section due to some complications at the last moment and both of us are healthy and happy. 
I would like to Thank Meeta Mam for all her support and advises during this period.I will surely recommend her to others in need.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Labor and Delivery,
review: I was consulting Dr. Meeta for my pregnancy. The things I liked most about her include her straight forward attitude - she is direct in letting you know what she expects from you and also let's you know how things stand at any point in time, willingness to listen - she does not disregard our opinions and takes a consultative approach when defining the way forward while patiently answering all the queries, does not over prescribe - suggests natural remedies to correct deficiency/issue where possible, openness to alternative medication - she was open to me taking alternative medication for my short cervix while clearly stating what was acceptable. Considering my advanced age, a normal delivery was possible only under her expert care and supervision. Above all she comes across as a normal down to earth, practical human being!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited Dr. Meeta for Pregnancy.We had no idea or reference of doctors , I had googled and on practo read reviews about doctor Meeta . I visited her in 5th week of pregnancy after meeting her I was very happy the way she explains everything . She handled my pregnancy very smoothly. She is more focused on home remedies instead of giving medicine. In third trimester I got ICP which comes under high risk pregnancy , which she handled very nicely. I am blessed with baby girl :) . All thanks to Dr . Meeta for taking care of me through out my pregnancy. I would like to recommend her and give five star ⭐️

I have consulted Dr Meeta from 2017 for first pregnancy and in the year 2021 for my second pregnancy as well and both cases it was normal delivery,  I am so comfort with doctor treatment and friendliness approach with patients. Sometimes we did waited long to visit doctor during appointments that's because doctor is busy, would have involved in delivery cases which is understandable🙂. I would like to thank doctor for the best treatment and commitment in her profession.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I consulted Dr.Meeta  during my entire  duration of pregnancy and I never regreated  twice . She is full of positivity  and knows your issues without even open your file. I had some issue's during my pregnancy.  But she always explain  you things in a clam and friendly manner and takes care of things with out worrying you. She encouraged me to have healthy diet and do proper exercise through out my pregnancy with out any restrictions.  I had a NVD this February and a lot of thanks to her for making my pregnancy so smoothly and memorable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We visited Doctor Meeta from the time we tested positive for pregnancy.  This was our first pregnancy and was during covid times which gave us lot of worries. The first visit doctor told me "Pregnancy is not a disease". She gave us the confidence needed and ensured we truly enjoyed the pregnancy journey. To avoid frequent hospital visits, Doctor encouraged video consulting initially which was very useful. She clarified all our doubts and more importantly, doctor always recommended home remedies before writing down tablets. It is hard to find such doctor's! She encouraged to do exercises which helped in the recovery post delivery. She is an absolute professional and speaks to the point. Her diagnosis is always right and we had a very pleasant experience and continue to see her post delivery as well. Highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had consulted Dr.Meeta chawhan 3 years back for ovarian cyst. Her friendly nature and explanation on the issue was very satisfying. With her suggestion on diet I was able to resolve the issue. Now I consulted doctor for my Pregnancy care as well. She has taken care of me and my baby very well at all stages of pregnancy. She always encourages to go by simple home remedies which works 100%. When the reports are not as expected she explains both positive and negative side of it, which will help us taking right decisions. My NT scan was not as expected and my glucose was up and down throughout pregnancy, her treatment was awesome as it gave us confidence and lot of hopes to move forward. 
Thank you so much for your care and support. Thanks to Cloudnine for providing good support for moms via doctor Meeta chawhan. I had recommended Meeta for one of our neighbours, they did consult for pregnancy care. I will continue to refer her for everyone I come across.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Tests,Pregnancy Scan,
review:
It was really a challenging time considering this Pandemic year 2020 situation around the globe... firstly we opted for Cloundnine as hospital is quite specific in its domain and only specific cases r coming... this way we avoided unwanted risk in this pandemic time... 
I opted for Meeta mam as she is undoubtedly one of the best Gyno-obst known... She Consulted and guided me like a friend in all those difficult stages of pregnancy... My delivery was C-Sec as baby heart rate was falling after fair attempt for approx 12hrs of labour...
Also, taking this opportunity i would like to thank Meeta mam for taking care of me as well as my little one during this special time or rather journey of our life... !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We had decided to consult Dr Meeta from 12 week onwards and it was one of the best decision we have taken. Amidst the pandemic it was scary to visit hospital for checkup so Dr Meeta was encouraging to have video consultation to minimise the frequent visits to hospital. Second advantage of having video consultation was that my husband being able to talk with doctor.Dr Meeta was always giving home remedies for any problems rather than giving artificial supplements and during follow-up she will make sure to ask if we are following the home remedies or not. She will always encourage to enjoy pregnancy journey. She was always giving confidence for normal delivery and finally it happened for me even though I had some problems.She considers each pregnancy as unique one and always ready to clear our doubt.Choosing a right doctor during pregnancy journey is very important and I was under safe hands 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

I consulted Dr. Meeta from 3rd month of my pregnancy. Doctor is very professional. The way she explained the things and her positivity helped me to handle the pregnancy quite well.  She always motivated to eat a healthy diet. The kind of positive vibes that i received in the labour room was remarkable. Her calculations are very accurate in each and every aspect. and finally i delivered a baby girl. It was a normal delivery. I strongly recommend her...
Thankyou Dr. Meeta for your guidance, advice and support...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I consulted Dr.Meeta during my first pregnancy after advice from few friends and I am glad I considered it.

Dr.Meeta is full of energy and gives you a lot of positivity. Even if there are minor things to take care of, she communicates in a positive way and doesn't scare you. She is very friendly and remains calm. 

She has an elephants memory. She knows the patient history even before opening the file.

I recently had my second kid and she was my obvious choice.

I am extremely happy with Dr.Meeta, her knowledge, her way of communicating things, her medical diagnosis, advice and treatment. Would certainly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I started visiting Dr. Meeta when we decided on having a baby. Her confidence clarity of thoughts amd the way she explained thing in details made her my and my husband first choice for my pregnancy journey. review:
We came to know about Dr. Meeta, from Dr. Manju Nair. We also heard a lot good about her from family friends as well who had consulted here before.

Our experience with her was excellent. My wife was about 33yrs of age when we became pregnant with our 2nd baby. In all honesty, despite the age, the 2nd pregnancy was much better than 1st. During the delivery, her blood platelets and haemoglobin were far better than the 1st time. Also, she was able to recover from the postpartum stress relatively sooner than the 1st time and all thanks for Dr. Meeta for that.

We strongly recommend Dr. Meeta!

Thankyou Dr. Meeta!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: This was my first pregnancy and we weren't sure whom do we approach.We got to know about Meeta Chawan through reviews in Google.She was the best choice we made.From the beginning to the end she made this journey sound so simple with suggesting home made food to very few medications.Whenever asked if I have to avoid any food she would only say you can eat anything which is cooked at home and no other restrictions:)Also till the last moment she made us wait for normal delivery to avoid c section but due to some issues we had to go for c section at last minute.The final result was awesome and I delivered a healthy beautiful girl daughter without any complications.Even post delivery,she has been guiding us on how to recover faster.This has helped me in speedy recovery.Writing a review for the 1st time so that it can help others who are looking for a friendly and good doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,

She persistently encouraged me to eat healthily and exercise well which helped me throughout and post-pregnancy. Despite few complications, I had a smooth pregnancy under the guidance of Dr. Meeta. I was amazed by the care and positivity that she shows towards her patients. I highly recommend Dr. Meeta to anyone who's looking out for an Obstetrician-Gynecologist in Bangalore.

review:
It was good to be treated with professionalism and care. 

I consulted with Dr. Meetha Chawhan for my second pregnancy. She always explains everything very clearly and prefers home remedies for many things during pregnancy.

Because of her guidelines and suggestions I’m healthy during my pregnancy and also now. We are very lucky to be treated by Dr. Meetha Chawhan.

Actually we are staying near Brookfield which around 7km from itpl, Just because of Dr. Meetha Chawhan we have taken maternal care in Cloudnine.

We really thank full to Dr. Meetha and cloudnine for their care and efforts.
Special thanks to Dr.Meetha Chawhan for attending the delivery at midnight.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We consulted doctor since 3rd month of pregnancy till delivery and post that too. Doctor is too friendly *** ************ She explains each and every aspect of pregnancy in very detail. Doctor always pre informed of futuristic issues and recommend right medication to bring things to normal. She do writes little more scans and blood tests, but that is to track the patient is doing good or not and gives confidence to patient. She guided well for normal pregnancy . Though we selected C section delivery (our preference) as my fluid level was little low.  The C Sectional delivery was smooth. I definitely recommend Dr Meetha Chauhan for her commitment and friendly behavior towards patient. We enjoyed the whole journey of pregnancy under her guidance. Thanks for all support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have consulted Dr meeta for my first pregnancy.Right from my first visit i used to follow what all she suggested and she always told me to think and be positive. Her suggestions and guidance were very helpful. She suggested me a protein rich diet as we were cautioned that baby might have birth weight issues. Finally under her i could deliver a helathy baby normally. My baby weight was 3.1kg and it was possible because of choosing her. Thank u meeta mam for ur support . I choose cloudnine only for her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted Dr. Meeta for my wife's pregnancy related complication. My wife had short cervix due to which there were high chances of preterm delivery. She took over the case and since then everything went smooth. The consultation we had were specific, organised and the treatment advised by her were very subtle.Finally last week, my wife delivered a baby boy under her treatment. Happy to recommend her to all. Dr. Meeta has been patient,understanding , and her commitment towards her duty for her patient has been undoubtedly unmatched, which every patient looks for in his/her doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
During my pregnancy I was having short cervix and I was very much scared for preterm delivery.
My doc. Dr.Meeta supported me a lot and without any surgery she managed my preg.and pulled it to 9th month.
I appreciate the way she has taken care of mine and handled my panic situation.she only prescribes the required medicine, she does advice the home remedies. She is very much clear about the line of treatment.she does explain and clarify any doubt that you have.actually, I can say the way she explains you will be not having any doubt further.
I highly recommend Dr.Meeta for treatment because she believes pregnancy is not illness to be worried about but the phase to enjoy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,Gynae advice,
review: I consulted Dr Meeta Chawhan for my second pregnancy at Cloudnine Hospital, Whitefield-Bangalore.She is such an amazing doctor with a vast experience in obs/gyn field.My 9 months of maternity journey with Dr.Meeta was a smooth one.She is a very friendly person too.All her consultations were satisfactory.She explained all the minute details precisely.Gave me lots of tips and natural home remedies to get over the pregnancy related sicknesses.All the required scans,lab tests, immunizations etc for each stage of pregnancy was prescribed at the appropriate time.Dr.Meeta right from the beginning advised me to be positive which helped me to face my pregnancy without much hassles.I underwent a LSCS and delivered a healthy baby boy.Dr.Meeta gave me all the encouragement which took the fear off me of undergoing a surgery.Post C-section recovery was also good.I recommend Dr.Meeta Chawhan for all obs/gyn issues.*** ** *** ** *** **** ************* ** ***************** Regards Sini Mary Santhosh.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ***** ******* ** ***** *** **** ******* ** ********** My wife had very high blood sugar during her pregnancy and we were very scared. Dr. Meeta very clearly explained all the risks and assured us that as long as we follow all the instructions and take the medications on time as prescribed, we will be fine. We became proud parents of a healthy baby boy on April 3rd and Dr. Meeta was constantly minitoring every small detail herself. Even after the delievery, she made sure to check on us regularly and provide her valuable guidance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: On the basis of reviews, we consulted Dr. Meeta Chawhan and fortunately had a great experience with her and would highly recommend her. She is very friendly and gives satisfactory solutions to every query we had. She always emphasied healthy food and remedies and avoided unnecessary medicines to the extent possible. Also concentrate on baby weight and how mother should not gain excess weight. She immediately recognized the issue even on vedio calls and proactively gave treatment which helped after baby's deliver. However getting her appointment was always challenging and even you have her appointment waiting time used to be too long also not satisfied with the hospitals management.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We consulted Dr Meeta for my pregnancy. Me & my hubby came to know about her through our friends. She is very professional and she listen to all the queries patiently. Her counseling on what is expected at each phase of the pregnancy was very helpful and clears lot of questions that arise throughout the whole pregnancy in our mind. What we like most is her advice on having only required medicines on each steps of pregnancy,simple home remedies and excercises, which I found effective on my part. Thanks to Dr. Meeta for making our pregnancy journey an easy one.
Now we are blessed with baby boy. Overall, it was a pleasant experience and I would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy care and management,
review: I consulted Dr Meeta for my first pregnancy. Since I have chronic pancreatitis,  I was always anxious about my pregnancy care, but Dr Meeta made my entire journey so wonderful.She is an amazing doctor. She focuses on1. Simple home remedies ,exercises for every problems and no extra medication 2. Healthy diet 3. Positive energy and encouragement to enjoy the phase(definitely the most important thing)4. Gives you confidence and encouragement to have normal delivery, still giving freedom to chose what you think is best for you and your baby.I can not thank her enough for making my entire journey so wonderful. I stronly recommend everyone to visit her for pregnancy care and delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We were new in Bangalore in Aug'19 and were looking for a Gyanec to guide us with our pregnancy. ** ********* *** **** ** ******* *********** ******* ** **** *** ********** Basis online research we chose to interact with Dr Meeta @ Cloud 9. After our 1 visit itself in Oct'19, we were extremely confident that Dr Meeta would be able to guide us through our pregnancy. She constantly encouraged us to use less of medication and more of natural way of doing things. We delivered a healthy baby on 16th April.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
I highly recommend going to Dr. Meeta Chawhan during pregnancy. She is  friendly and frank, and would make you feel at ease during the nine months of pregnancy and delivery. *** **** *** ********* *********** ***** *** ************ She explains about diet. She is giving enough time to the patient. I had some issues during my pregnancy,  because of Dr Meeta Chawhan it went of smooth and simple. We told to Dr to do C-section but Dr Meeta suggest me for normal delivery. I got admitted in hospital by 12 in night and and labor pain started by 2AM because of my critical  condition Junior Dr called to Dr Meeta Chawhan,  she came to hospital in the night within 15mins and delivered baby.  
We are very Thankful to Dr Meeta Chawhan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is very friendly  in nature and I never felt that I visiting doctor  for the first time .Her aura made me feel very comfortable  and confident. During each visit her encouraging  words killed  all kinds of nervousness and complaint right away. We can't  Express our gratitude  towards Dr. Meeta in words. She was always  approachable through  what's app for all the queries . We are blessed with  healthy baby  now and extremely  grateful to  Dr.Meeta for her support  and guidance . Tons of thanks  to Dr. Meeta and I strongly  recommend  her .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I would strongly recommend Dr.meeta chawhan....I used to go to malleshwaram cloud nine for my pregnancy check up and got shifted to Whitefield for delivery..... My friend had suggested doctor meeta's name in cloud nine Whitefield branch...four weeks prior to my delivery I met her and started taking suggestions from her..... She is very friendly and take great interest in making the patient comfortable first...... I had a c sec delivery and with the great support of the doctor both me and the baby are doing absolutely fine.... Thanks to Dr. Meeta chawhan.....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,
review: Dr Meeta is very friendly and professional, I have felt free to discuss anything and everything related to my pregnancy. She has been very patient to listen and answer to all the queries we had. She always encourages on healthy eating and staying positive. She has helped me boost my confidence and I do not think my pregnancy would have been so smooth if it was not for Dr. Meeta.I would like to express my gratitude to Dr. Meeta for her guidance and helping us to make right choices. I highly recommend Dr. Meeta to every pregnant women as their consultant.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We met the doctor for the first time as soon as my pregnancy was confirmed. Because of her positive attitude and friendliness, from the day one we were assured that we are in the right hands. She is very confident in her approach and always encouraged healthy methods instead of unwanted medicines through out my pregnancy. From my 32nd week of my pregnancy,  we were very scared as the cervix length was becoming shorter day by day ,but when we have doctor like her,she understood our problem and made sure nothing to go wrong and helped us deliver a healthy full term baby.  Always grateful to her and totally recommend her without any second thoughts.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Consulted Dr Meeta for my first pregnancy. I was prediabetic even before my pregnancy, so was really worried about my sugar levels. But the doctor helped me to get the control over my sugar levels mainly through diet and exercise. She had a proper plan on how i could get over every week of my pregnancy with a consistant evaluation of my sugars. Since its very difficult especially to find the right stopgaps for our cravings during this period. As a doctor she is very friendly and cleared all our doubts patiently. I could definitely say that its only because of Dr Meeta, we had a very smooth journey and delivered a healthy baby boy. In pregnancy the bonding with the doctor is very important since its a long special and intimate journey. And for us that was perfect with Dr Meeta. All her advices helped us face the little complications that happened in the last trimester with much confidence. I Would certainty reccomend dr.Meeta for pre and post delivery care.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I would definitely recommend Meeta Chawhan to anyone looking for a good obstetrics/gynaecology doctor. I did refer to her entirely between Mid 2018 till my first delivery in Jan 2020 at Cloudnine Whitefield and it was really helpful for me with dealing with the challenges of pregnancy and childbirth. Major positives for me were:
1. She has good knowledge and experience and will answer all queries in detail and explain things very clearly.
2. She relies on natural methods and would always suggest ways for maintaining a healthy pregnancy explaining the dos and donts.
3. She handles her team well and cordinated the delivery process smoothly in the labor room and OT and has guided well during the post pregnancy recovery phase.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have consulted dr meeta chawhan for my first pregnancy. I was little curious as its my first baby for each small health issues like headache, nausea and weekness but everytime dr meeta's advice worked like magic to overcome those during my prgnancy duration. And now i am having a healthy baby. She is a friendly doctor and she encourages patient to take natural remedies ******* ** ****** *********** *********  ***** ** *** **** **** * ****** A positive vibe comes everytime when i visit her which encouraged me till my last day of pregnancy. There was a water leakage in my case in 38 week due to which she suggested c section and she took care of everything till my discharge from hospital. I was scared whether i need to take bed rest  for some days after c section as my relatives told the same but in 2 days after c section i was like a normal person. She always answered my queries on whatsapp even after delivery. Also she suggest proper diet options and exercise to have a healthy baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
We have consulted Dr. Meeta Chawhan, during my first pregnancy.  
She is a very positive and friendly doctor. She explains each and everything in details and prescribes least medicines.  We were very comfortable to visit her. She always encouraged to have healthy food and do exercise. She is always reachable and very humble. I liked the sincerity and value of time she gave for each patient. If she is busy (on emergency), she ensures to call us back and gave a solution to our problem and queries. Even after few complications, I have delivered my baby via normal delivery.
Huge thanks to her for bringing our little bundle of joy into this world.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I've consulted doctor for my first pregnancy. I had the normal delivery by God grace 6 weeks before. We consulted doctor at my 8 month and we're sceptical about changing the doctor in a later stage. But after meeting Doctor Meeta we realised that we took the right decision. Every time after meeting doctor you feel very positive. She explains each and everything with patience, suggests healthy diet over medicine. She is very friendly and comforts you with the pregnancy fear we all have. I'll definitely recommend doctor Meeta for pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Tests,Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy Scan,
review: We consulted with Dr. Meeta during my wife’s first pregnancy after moving back from the US when my wife was about 20 weeks pregnant. We were very impressed with Dr. Meeta’s focus on ensuring my wife ate very healthy and exercised throughout the pregnancy to increase the chances of a normal delivery. She treated pregnancy as a life stage to be enjoyed and ended every appointment with a ‘go enjoy’ , which made us very confident throughout the whole affair. She was meticulous about all the tests and tracking which needed to be done. We felt she was very scientifically inclined and did not heed much to old wives tales. My wife ended up having a normal delivery and the pre and post delivery care was excellent. We would highly recommend her if you are looking for a healthy and normal pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Being a foreigner living in India, I needed to find a gynecologist I trust to follow me on a long term basis. I took long time to find someone I am really confortable with till I meet Dr Meeta Chawhan. Her energy, honesty, listening skills ans scientific approach made me very confident. I really appreciate the fact that she takes the time to make me feel secure and explain the different situations. She always answer present in case of emergency at anytime, which was really reassuring while I was pregnant. She delivered our beautiful baby boy by C-section: I am glad to say that she did an amazing job and she followed me up really good during recovery. I partly chose to deliver my baby at Cloudnine Whitefield because of Dr Meeta Chawhan was there. I highly recommend Dr Meeta Chawhan as a gynecologist!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The first thing you notice when you meet her is her positivity. I consulted with her for my first pregnancy, i had a lot of issues throughout my pregnancy. Dr Meeta Chawhan  always suggested the right approach. She would answer all my queries and spend considerable amount of time during the consultation. She would recommend more natural home remedies than medicines and only prescribe if it is absolutely necesarry. Very friendly. Even during my delivery all i remember is her warm smile and assurance that everything would be alright. I would definetely recommend Dr Meeta Chawhan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: My search for a good gynaecologist stopped once I met Dr Meeta. Finding a doctor who is communicative, confident and competent is quite a task, and Dr Meeta      is a shining example of what a good doctor should be. She helped me right through my pregnancy with exemplary competence and kindness. She was patient with my numerous fears and questions, always gave me encouragement and positivity. Just talking to her makes me feel better and confident. I had a very smooth pregnancy and delivery thanks to her. She is kind, positive, confident and communicative. I am very lucky to have found her and wish her the very best.

tags: None
review:
Ever smiling friendly doctor. The foremost quality that you would look in a doctor to keep you at ease during pregnancy. We consulted her even before pregnancy and right through it. She always prefers natural medicines and food. Listens patiently. No extra tests. Not even an iota of uneasiness you would get in the journey with her. 

Now we are the parents of a beautiful baby, all thanks to her guidance and skills. She guided us properly as I had complications right from the beginning. At the end, we felt very much thankful after the delivery. Highly recommended doctor that you can consult.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Had shifted to Hoodi in my 5th month of pregnancy and checked Practo for reviews and selected dr meeta. I must say I made a good decision. Through out my journey I was extremely upheld with her positivity and almost no restrictions. Had gained confidence of being in good hands in no time. Although I was preparing myself for NVD with her guidance but had to go fr c sec at last moment but I am physically and mentally healthy being treated by her. She will support for home remedies rather than medicines. What comforted me was her connecting to the patient n family well and explaining the situation well. Am extremely happy and will recommend would be mommies who are looking for a doctor with friendly gesture she is the one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted Dr. Meetha for my ectopic pregnancy. I was so happy with her positivity and good vibes that I consulted her when I became pregnant again. We were always greeted with warm smile. She is never in hurry and answers all our queries with lots of patience. The scan reports are also in detail. I worked till the last day of my pregnancy with her constant encouragement and I am so glad about it. She was my stress buster and motivated me throughout.
I delivered healthy baby boy without any complication. I recovered very soon following all her advices. I really miss visiting her and literally had tears in my eyes when I bid her good bye. I would highly recommend her for pregnancy care and you will never regret.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Cesarean Delivery,
review: I went to the doctor after reading her reviews on practo itself and was very satisfied with the treatment . This was my first pregnancy . We started consulting her from day 1 of my pregnancy .  We were excited And nervous as well  but every time I went to her she cleared all my doubts and explained me every details of the scans and report . As I proceeded with the pregnancy , her confidence gave me confidence as well .She is very positive and straight forward with her patients. Doctor Meeta generally advices home remedies instead of medicine .She prefers normal delivery but we chose c section and  in operation theatre also she explained me the procedure and finally I delivered a healthy baby boy . I would recommend her to anyone . Thank you so much

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Meeta is very friendly n helpful. I was 6 month pregnant when I visit her and from day one I feel the change, she has been motivating n give information of everything that needs to happen from test to medicine n reasons for it. I would recommend everyone to go to her. *** ** *** ******  I have a beautiful daughter now it won't be possible without her. Our family is really happy the way she has guided about diet n natural protein, exercise importance. I have also recovered very fast by following her. 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: It was our first pregnancy and I was determined to have a normal delivery. Dr. Meeta was the one who helped me sail through it easily. She explained all the procedures clearly and cleared any of the doubts I had. I am so happy that I found a gynecologist who was helping me with the normal delivery, in a time when everywhere doctors suggest c section within a blink of an eye. I just followed every word of hers. As a result i gave birth to a healthy little baby boy, who had double nuchal cord. But it all went normally without any complications and with so much ease. This might sound all sweet and cheesy.. But it really was so and we are really thankful to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Tests,Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
*** ***** ******* ** *** **** ********* ************ *** ************* ** ********** ***** Not only does she explain everything properly, but also gives the right advices at the appropriate time, be it diet, exercises or other personal care issues, the benefits of which I'm enjoying, post delivery of my child. 

I had consulted multiple doctors, at other hospitals/clinics, including Cloudnine Whitefield, until I consulted Dr. Meeta for certain issues during pregnancy, which Dr. Meeta handled very nicely. 

The entire pre and post duration of my pregnancy including delivery was handled very smoothly by Dr. Meeta and she helped me deliver a healthy baby! Kudos to the Doctor.

review:
This was our first pregnancy so we were worried, confused & slightly scared. 
We were lucky to have chosen Dr Meeta.
She is extremely friendly and patient. She always explained all the things in great detail and took extra time to clear whatever doubts we had.She has a solution for each &  every problem . 
She specially focuses on everything natural and really avoids unnecessary medicines & tests. Despite certain known complications she ensured a normal delivery.
I really thank her for being a great support during my Pregnancy. 
 I would highly recommend Dr Meeta for preg care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We had gone to Cloud nine for my Pregnancy checkup.. as this was my first pregnancy I wanted a doctor with whom I could share my queries and set my expectations.. 
Dr Meeta Chawhan met all my expectations ... She ensured that I am comfortable and explained me in detail everything and was very patient in answering all my queries (I literally had a page full of queries)..
The best part was she never asked me to take suppliments .. she always encouraged me to take fruits and vegetables instead.. 
I would really recommend her for her friendliness, the way she puts you at ease and finally her knowledge.... She is a true expertise in her field!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Initially in cloud nine whitefield branch we met a doc but was not quite happy with the interaction then we decided to change the doc to Dr Meeta. I still in two minds if i made the right decision...then we meet Dr Meeta, spoke to her about our problems for pre preg counselling and the way she explained things and gave solution for complications, i was happy tht we made right choice. She is very active, full of energy and positive and also gives solution n explain things in laymen terms so tht ppl like us can understand the problem (ppl who are not familiar with medical terms)..she guided me through my pregnancy and always stressed on having heathy food with more n more exercise and minimum medications which helped to deliver baby boy naturally...so I would highly recommend Dr Meeta for preg care...and finally all thanks to Dr Meeta for guiding me through my pregnancy very smoothly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I started consulting doctor Meeta in Cloudnine whitefield  from 8 month of pregnancy as we have shifted to Whitefield .As my journey of pregnancy was bit stressing ,Dr Meeta's timely advice helped me walk through it smoothly and with great positivity.She will explain everything so clearly till one is fully satisfied. She was the only one who clearly explained my problem and gave me hope for normal delivery despite of the challenges . she is so quick in her actions and decision making which helped me till end. She has a quick solution for every problem.Cloudnine Whitefield is very lucky to have such a talented and efficient Doctor working for them. She is very quick and wise decision maker. Dr Meeta explains the pros and cons of every situation.My family is extremely thankful to Dr.Meeta. She is a blessing to this profession. 
Dr.Meeta thank you so much ,you came like an angel in my life. God bless you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Meeta mam has guided my pregnancy journey with amazing zeal and positive energy. I had gestational diabetes from 8week of my pregnancy. She gave me correct guidance so that with exercise walking and food changes, I could keep a check on my sugars in entire pregnancy without a single medication or insulin. She never suggested any medication and always had some home remedies for every problem.I would highly recommend her, for her helpful suggestions, explanation of every step , amazing energy which gives you enthusiasm to fight problem at hand, and her expertise. She is an amazing doctor and human being.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I started consulting doctor Meeta in Cloudnine whitefield branch from my 3rd month of pregnancy as we have shifted to Whitefield and read good feedbacks about her. She is very friendly, lively n informative. She addressed all my concerns patiently. She explained us what can be known from each scan and why do we need that.  She gave a diet chart to keep the weight in control and for every check up she instructed me what to do before the next check up. She kept me motivated throughout the pregnancy. The best part of Dr Meeta is she always gives advise for norm delivery. She helped me delivery my baby normally and came running in the wee hors of 4 AM. I was very nervous as it was my first delivery and she made the delivery very smooth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would highly recommend Dr Meeta as one of the best gynaecs.We went to Dr Meeta for my 2nd delivery. My 1st delivery had some complications and resulted in preterm delivery of my baby. Dr Meeta looked at all my previous scans and reports thoroughly to understand the case properly. She  ensured by means of tests that this time I dont face the same complications.She gave me minimum medicines during pregnancy and focused more on being healthy by following good diet and home cooked food. She would give lot of time to answer any and all queries we had.Her positivity and enthusiasm was infectious always rubbing on to us as well.We had a uncomplicated delivery at full term and a healthy baby boy. Thanks to Dr Meeta!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I started visiting Dr.Meeta during my 5th month of Pregnancy. The very first visit, she went through my history of scans and check ups and gave a brief on it completely. Doctor always supported me with natural remedies to have a control on my diet and she stressed on how important is to exercise and keep ourself active through out the pregnancy. She insisted,guided me for normal delivery inspite of having complications in my case. Hats off to her !! when my Doctor so confident, I felt I'm in safe hands and not to worry on anything.. I'm lucky to have her constant support and motivation through out my pregnancy. And now I'm blessed with a baby boy with no issues.. Thanks to Dr Meeta!!!

I had a normal delivery and am blessed with a baby girl. All Thanks to Dr.Meeta in supporting and guiding me throughout.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: After reading reviews of DR.  Meeta Chawan, I decided to consult her for my pregnancy. As it was first pregnancy, we wanted best. We decided to show her at Whitefield cloudnine branch. After meeting her for 2-3 consultations I was sure that I want to continue my pregnancy with her. She was well experienced, cleared all our doubts and mostly she makes you mentally satisfied with all the queries.she is very much positive while dealing with patient's and handled all the hurdles with utmost care during our pregnancy.She gives you minimum tests required, proper diet details required, exercises to be done. She prepares you for normal delivery from beginning but it's upto patient how much they cooperate.For me everything went very smooth with her and I will strongly recommend her.

I would really recommend her ** *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** *** ** ******

We visited Dr. Meeta at cloud nine Whitefield hospital starting after  the pregnancy detection, followed by regular health check up during the entire pregnancy journey and delivered our baby girl. The experience is really good *** *** ****** ** ** ************** friendly and explain everything during the pregnancy journey and even after post delivery check up. I/ we would like to recommend Dr. Meeta to all of my friends and relatives for sure those are here in Bangalore.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Pregnancy under Dr Meeta.
It was a safe and practical journey with Dr. She talks to the point covering all required aspects at every visit. Once I had major stomach ache in 7th month and called Dr at night, she immediately responded to the emergency and guided to visit the hospital. To our surprise the duty doctor who attended me was aware about my health and symptoms before I reached.It was really impressive and comforting that Dr Meeta took my health so seriously and at that point of hour also was available to monitor inspite of not being in hospital. 
She not only helped me deliver my baby but also prepared me for post pregnancy strength required.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
This was our first pregnancy exciting and scary at the same time.  We decided to consult Dr Meeta Chawhan in cloudnine whitefield.  She encouraged to enjoy each moment of pregnancy and made us feel positive.  Like every other pregnancy we too had several complications. However Dr Meeta handled and took right decision at right time and we had 
nothing to worry about. She was particular about the good nutritious diet and exercise  during the period which helped in growth of the fetus and  recovery post delivery. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: I delivered my first baby in  cloudnine, old airport branch, but this time for second baby we wanted something near to Whitefield. Based on few recommendations, we searched for her appointment and fortunately got in no-time. My first visit with doctor was quite friendly. Each trimester was a new challenge for me which doctor Meeta resolved very well. During third trimester, water level went down and baby weight was not increasing. I was very much in anxiety and tension. Doctor Meeta helped me to overcome these challenges. She suggested me diet chart and I followed it regularly. Finally a day had come and it was Sunday. In the second half of the day, I went to pain. She suggested to go to hospital and approach duty doctors. Based on her instructions, they suggested for emergency c-section. She arrived on-time and did surgery and finally we had our second baby in this world. My journey with doctor Meeta was good and I would like to recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have always visited Dr Meeta for any gynaec issues ever since I shifted to Whitefield. So, obviously she has  been my preferred doctor during my pregnancy. I have PCOS and weight issues but Dr Meeta took great care of me and always encouraged me to eat healthy + stay active & positive all through my pregnancy. I was very scared that something might go wrong but everytime I met her, all my tensed nerves calmed down. ** ***** ***** ********* *********** ********* ** ***** *** always suggests natural remedies as the first treatment. She answered all my queries with patience, no matter how silly they were. I had a low lying placenta and was always worried, but Dr Meeta would sense the worries in every check up and instill positivity in me and my husband. I would recommend her to every woman who wants to be in good hands during pregnancy. She definitely makes you feel safe and never forces for anything that one is not comfortable with. Doctor definitely connects very well with her patients and this is what every patient aspires for during the pregnancy journey. Thank you so much doctor for taking good care of us and helping my family to meet our baby girl.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I visited her in my 7 months of pregnancy. I was having gestational diabetes. Baby's weight was also low. Till the end of 39th week, I didn't induce labor and also baby was not down due to a cord around the baby's neck.  Overall it was not normal. 
But the way she motivates you to keep doing the efforts, the treatment she provided, it helped me alot. My baby was born with a good health and weight . I am also fine after the operation. 
Personally, she makes me feel like a elder sister who will motivate you and push you for making the effort.  You will have the problem but she will make you feel like you can easily go through it. She will always say a line " are kuch nhi h, Aaram se ghr jao" ☺ she is highly proffesional with her work specially the "OT". The way she deals either with her team in OT or the patient, it is appreciable. Even if you go to the hospital in emergency or you didn't get to meet her, junior doctor will treat you and she will have all the information about your health even without meeting you. 
A funny thing I want to share, "I ordered Idli for breakfast when I was admitted,  but I got upma" I asked the canteen, they said, the doctor has said so...  Cause I need to give a sugar test" 😊😅
What I mean is, u will be taken care in every way 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I will surely suggest Dr Meeta name for pregnancy check up. I can't forget her smiling face and cheerful voice during each visit (though she was in 😷) Our child is the gift of God and mam is the source to get. Blessed with a baby boy through normal delivery. I am very much satisfied with doctor's treatment and behaviour...she is also straight forward and always avoid unnecessary medecines... always gives priority to natural food and the natural process...Even I had few complications but she guided so well to overcome of that.You have to trust and listen her carefully.
Moreover even though she is the most busiest doctor in cloud nine, she keeps contact with you when it is really necessary and she clarifies all your doubts.. And yes ofcourse as a patient you have to also maintain the basis ethics...

Anyways I had an placenta leakage which happened during delivery due to that my baby was in NICU and antibiotics started for him...well these comes under pediatric to deal with it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: before consulting dr meeta me and my wife were consulting some doctor in co###m##ia hospital whitefield, my wife due date was  around 18 march , last two months dr left for overseas, after returning dr called and told we have to do c section as baby weight is not good and have to kept in  nicu later, before that dr has not told about any complications just out of the blue dr was telling this.we also consulted pediatrician and he gave some big budget for nicu, although money can be arranged but our trust was broken because dr has never explained these things before .my friend told me to take second opinion with dr meeta as he has got positive feedback from many friends and people in his circle. we took second opinion with dr meeta and  she told there is no need for need for c section right now  but we have to monitor baby growth, she was very strict with my wife diet and we also followed what she told to us .finally after 3 weeks my wife delivered baby normally. now both are healthy doing great after 2 months.Thanks a lot dr meeta for your support and guidance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Firstly ,I would like to thank Meeta Mam for her constant support and guidance through out my pregnancy. I was blessed with a baby girl on 13th March through normal delivery under the guidance and treatment of Meeta Mam. During this pandemic, I conceived when I was in my home town but after 2 trimester I had to come to Bangalore due to my husband's office situation. We were worried as how we will take care of my pregnancy during my third trimester as it is the most important time of the pregnancy. We started taking her consultation from 5th month onwards and we made the right decision to go to Meeta Mam for  as she not only helped in increasing my baby weight from  1.9 kg at 28 weeks to 2.9 kg at 37 weeks but also helped me in reducing my weight. Initially , I was worried as I was not sure whether I would be able to go through normal delivery due to my over weight (30 kgs more than usual expected weight ) but Meeta Mam helped me to push for normal delivery . Me and my family are so very thankful to her for making my pregnancy journey so smooth and memorable .What I like best about her that she never prescribe too many medicines . She played a role of game changer in my pregnancy. She is now my go to gynac and obgyn.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Name - Kalpana SinghTreatment - Normal Delivery at Cloud nine WhitefieldDoctor - Meeta ChauhanLike others even I agree that Dr. Meeta Chauhan is truly a blessing for all those women who want their pregnancy journey to be smooth and successful. It was my first pregnancy and I was very nervous and anxious with lot of questions. She always answered my queries with patience. She is a doctor who does not even ask you to follow latest practice but also tells you to follow your Mom's practise as well because she believes those generations were really strong enough to deliver a baby without any medical facilities. She always guided me that take learnings from your Mom as they are always right. Till 2nd trimester my pregnancy journey was smooth but in the 3rd trimester I had faced lot of complications. I got BP issue, Liver issue, started bleeding while passing urine etc.Since I had high BP issue normal delivery was impossible for me but Dr. Meeta consoled me saying that we will try for normal delivery till the end so don't take tension and think positive.With God grace and positive attitude of Dr. Meeta I had normal delivery and blessed with an angel.We both are doing good now. We always remain thankful to Dr. Meeta for always motivating me through out my pregnancy journey. She consulted me like a mentor.Thank you so much Dr. Meeta for everything. I would always recommend Dr. Meeta for consultation.Stays blessed and Happy Dr. Meeta.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been pretty anxious when I learnt I was pregnant. My family wanted nothing but the best for me through my journey of pregnancy, Dr. Meeta Chawhan was my 3rd doctor from the time I was pregnant, I had to change the doctors as I wasn’t happy with them. After I met Dr. Meeta Chawhan I didn’t have to change any further. I met her when I was 6 months in my pregnancy and finally felt happy and confident. She is quite friendly and advised utmost care through the remaining months of my pregnancy. She ensured I planned for my delivery from 34th week onwards itself, which was the most important part of my journey since I had no clue when and what is needed. I delive d when I was ok the 37th week l, I was rushed to the hospital at dawn, Unfortunately I had to go thru C-section and was super scared, but I knew under Dr. Meeta Chawhan I need not worry much , I delivered a beautiful baby without any issues and happily taken care of during my stay in the hospital. Thank you Dr. Meeta Chawhan for assuring a smooth journey. I recommend her to the ladies who need attention and care.

tags: Value for money,Wait time,
review: My Experience - Disappointed1. The doctor is generally two to three hours late in following up with patients due to OT and other emergencies, but the Hospital doesn't care to inform patients beforehand about the delay.2. For even small queries, you will have to wait in queue again. Like if you went to do some test in the hospital premise you won't be able to show result/ quick consult with the Doctor without waiting.3. There is even followUp charge (half of the consultation fee during the first 6 days after consultation) for small queries that Doctor prescribes if you don't followUp on the same day. Even if you want to followup on the same day, the Doctor is not going to have a free slot.4. They don't provide Doctor's or any proper personnel emergency contact so you are just stuck since reaching her is insanely frustrating. 5. The fees is 1000 (850 cons.   150 reg.) oppose to what is mentioned on Practo.** ** ***** **** *** **** **** ** * ********** ******** ***** *** **** ** **** *** ***** *** *** ********** ** * **** **** *********** If you have all the time in the world to throw away and is very calm and patient person, you can think of booking appointment here. I am not coming here again for any future issues.Don't have a problem with the Doctor, it is the poor and negligent management which is making us suffer ***** *** ******** ** ****** **** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited Dr Meeta Chawhan 10 months back as we wanted to plan our first baby.
During our first meeting itself we got very positive wives from Dr as she is always positive and the way she explains the pregnancy stages and she asked to start the initial medication which improves pregnancy chances.
The very next month, i conceived and started the treatment with Dr Meeta and consulted as per our schedule.
During my pregnancy i faced some other health issues as well and Dr asked me to take few natural home remedies which helped me to cure my ailments, which i really appreciate.
And i was consulting with Dr as per our schedule to ensure the baby is doing well by doing regular scans and blood tests.
During my 9th month she informed us,
that there could be chances of issue, if we opt for Normal delivery and she clearly explains the risk factor involved in it.
So we decided to opt for LSCS and confirmed the same to Dr and operation was scheduled and i delivered my little angel under Dr Meet Chauhan supervision and both of us are doing really good now.
Everything went well and i am really impressed with Dr Expertise level of understanding the diseases and educating patient and most importantly her positive nature which helped me a lot to be calm during my delivery.
Thanks a lot Dr Meeta for all your efforts to make my pregnancy journey easier.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have heared and read reviews about Cloud 9 hospital and its maternity services but was not sure. About drs.then I found good feedback about Dr.Meeta Chawhan and I decided to see her after confirming pregnancy for follow up and delivery.and I am so greatful for my decision to choose her.
 I was already over weight when conceived so during my first consultation she explained her plan to achieve healthy pregnancy and childbirth, during each visit first thing she would do is to listen patiently all the complains I had in time and then she gives all possible solution which were most of natural and home remedies, also she used to encourage for healthy lifestyle during the time which can help me post delivery 
Even how much rush or emergency cases are there,she always with same energy and positivity which made me so comfortable and confident day by day towards delivery
One thing I most appropriate about Dr. Meeta is she is Frank enough to share and explains about complications or difficulties during follow ups which actually prepare us mentally to face the situation if unfortunately occur,
I have gained overall 10kg weight and reduced almost same within 2weeks post delivery after following her diet suggestions and delivered healthy baby girl at week39

tags: None
review: It was our second pregnancy and we were looking for good doctor in Whitefield. It was very difficult to search the good doctor during pregnancy. Finally our search finish and we met with Dr. Meeta Chauhan. She explained all the procedures clearly and cleared any of the doubts we had. One good thing in her, she is not preferring unnecessary medicine during pregnancy. That is really awesome, because many doctors are scaring to patients and running multiple medicine. Which is not required. She is giving enough time during OPD. As we proceeded with the pregnancy , her confidence gave us confidence as well. She is very positive and straight forward with her patients. Due to Rheumatoid arthritis and low lying placenta, we have not tried normal delivery but she had insisted us for that. And she never happy if someone is not going for normal delivery that is very rare in current era. When doctors are doing treatment as per hospital direction. If you are in Bangalore and pregnant. Please meet Dr. Meeta Chauhan once. You will see the difference. Thank you so much Dr. Meeta Chauhan for your guidance during pregnancy. It was really great journey with you. Kudos to the Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Doc Meeta Chowhan since we plan to have a baby .Now i am blessed with a baby girl and all credit goes to her .She always encourage for exercises,home remedies and i love that part of her .She is so friendly that if you enter her room she will welcome you with a smile.I would like to appreciate the way she simplifies to explance us the most critical science which is pregnancy .Through out my pregenecy nothing was restricted for her .I was allowed to do everything ,to eat whatever i like .Coming to medicines parts she was strictly against it .Very few medicines i took throughout .She always encouraged me for a normal delivery and till the last moment also she was saying the same .My husband couldn't see me in labor and we went for a C-section ,that is want we choose .Thank you Ma'am for all care and support throughout my pregency .I would recommend Dr Meeta to all ladies who are planing to jump into the new and most precious chapter of life(pregency) .Guys believe me specially the IT professional ones Doc Meeta relief the mental stress to a different level  by her words and her friendly nature .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am so glad I chose Dr Meeta as my doctor for my pregnancy. Dr. Meeta It was really a great experience with her throughout my pregnancy and I had a healthy baby boy,I started consulting her in Cloudenine Whitefield from my 3rd month Pregnancy. 
She is very friendly & informative human being. She prefers normal delivery which was the key point that made us trust her and follow her advice. She never gave any extra supplements rather advice to have regular exercise and to follow proper diet.
During my Pregnancy i suffer with Gastric problem a lot, the best part of Dr. rather then provide medicine she always prefer home  remedies which help me a lot during that period.
Apart from all these she is a enthusiastic person and always have a positive attitude.
I personally feel and suggest to everyone if you will think to visit cloudnine Whitefield you must consult her once.

review:

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Meeta has delivered both my daughters. She is very knowledgeable.. always greets with a smiling face and answers all our questions (though she speaks little fast.. my husband finds it difficult to sometimes get what she is explaining 🙂). She is easily available on call via junior doctors and her appointments are easily available but the waiting time is high (probably because of the large number of patients she needs to look in a day.. again due to her popularity and trustworthiness) but she ensure that she attends to everyone even if she is the last doctor leave or visit patients on her leave day.She focuses on well balanced food and workout plan during pregnancy. The best part is she anticipated chances of early delivery and took the necessary measures (steroids injection) to ensure that both my babies lungs were developed and ready for the outside world.we are extremely happy and satisfied with her treatment and would recommend her to others.

She is highly skilled and I had a pleasant experience with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy care and management,
review: I’m super happy with Dr Meeta and the way she handled my pregnancy. I had vaginismus and right from the 13 week pregnancy visit onwards, she never pressured me to go for PV exam. I’m extremely grateful to her that she made my pregnancy with Gestational Diabetes also very smooth and well cared for. She was always available and continuously monitored my baby’s growth. When the time came, she saved the day and made timely decision to deliver the baby via C section because fetal movements had reduced a lot. I’m very thankful that she was the one who delivered my baby boy and took wonderful care postpartum as well. Thank you Dr Meeta!

review:
i definitely recommend her for bringing and adding confidence to patients. Felt very positive talking to her, especially 'cos i met her after an ectopic pregnancy.
