She is NOT into unwanted tests/scans - very practical and to THE point to what was best for me at that point of time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is very friendly and will clear all your doubts no matter what they are. She will explain everything in detail about why specific scans are conducted and their importance. She will advice what kind of food to be eaten and what to do through out your pregnancy. She has a very practical approach which is very refreshing and she will always motivate you to have a healthy attitude during your pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We consulted Dr. Meeta from the beginning our pregnancy and delivered baby in Whitefield in July. She is very friendly and explains the problem clearly with patience. Mostly will try to avoid the medicine until if its really needed. 
She handled with care and delivered the baby happily.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had just moved to Bangalore when I was just 2 months pregnant and with loads of questions and doubts in my mind, I was not sure whom to consult with. Initially I had approached another doctor who came out to be an infertility specialist. So he then referred me to Dr Meeta. Since then I got to know her and have been seeing her throughout my pregnancy, delivery and also post delivery care. It was my first pregnancy and since I had health issues as well which made my pregnancy a bit complicated, but she handled everything with utmost care and ease. She had always been to the point and explain everything in-depth. I used to bombard her with so many questions, some of which were even so silly, but still she used to answer each of them with full patience, which made me feel so comfortable and doubt free. she is a doctor who encourages for normal delivery which is rarely seen in doctors nowadays. inspire of my complications, she tried till the last month of pregnancy to see if I can have a normal delivery, but somehow it didn't happen because of my complications and Ceasarean delivery was the only option, but no regrets as it was only for my and my baby's wellbeing. she is also a very cordial person who always wears a friendly smile of her face, which infact takes away a lot of fear from us. I feel blessed to be in the hands of her for my childbirth. also I recovered very soon after delivery. hence I would strongly recommend her for every woman who needs special medical care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I'm Thankful to Dr Meeta. She helped a lot during my pregnancy. She was patient and humble to understand the situation. during my last month, some unexpected complications arose and due to her timely intervention. we now have a healthy baby. However, she was really inspiring and Friendly and have lot of patience from the very first interaction. he has been much more than a Doctor to me.She is supportive... Reachable... any time :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Great Experience with the Dr. Meeta... We had 3 Miscarriages before at Canada, decided to visit this Dr and She suggested few tests. Then everything went so good with her guidance... She is supportive... Reachable... Friendly and have lot of patience.

Thanks a lot Mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr Meeta for pregnancy planning till baby birth and my experience with her was really great.She listens patiently, makes you feel very comfortable and addresses all queries and concerns very convincingly. She is very positive, in all complicated situations she will provide positive suggestions which is really great.Throughout my pregnancy, she guided me very well, never prescribed unnecessary medicines and tests.I thank her for making my pregnancy a beautiful experience. Highly recommend her to all the expecting moms.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I would like to say thank you to Meeta ma’am. During my pregnancy I used to have lot of cold, cough, head ache but she never gave me any medicine instead she gave me home remedies to cure and avoid medicines which was not needed. Entire pregnancy she always suggested me to do lot of exercise so that I can have an active pregnancy which I actually had. During my anomaly scan I got to know that I have low lying placenta because of her good advice my placenta came up. In my third trimester my baby had put loop around the neck still she was able to do my normal delivery. I am grateful to Maam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The purpose of this review is to express my deepest appreciation and gratitude for the exceptional care Dr. Meeta provided during the delivery of my second child. A memorable and pleasant experience was made possible by her patience, expertise, and kindness.***** ***** ********** *********** ************ My health and the health of my baby were always her top priorities. Her advice on how to maintain a healthy diet and exercise regime was invaluable. As a result, I stayed healthy during my pregnancy and recovered quickly after giving birth. Dr. Meeta has been an invaluable resource to me during this difficult time, and I cannot thank her enough.

My confidence in trusting the doctor with the delivery of my child was greatly enhanced by her positive attitude and caring nature.

As an amazing gynaecologist, Dr. Meeta is kind, hard-working, professional, and dedicated to her patients.

I highly recommend this doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I visited Dr. Meeta for my pregnancy journey. She always patiently and clearly explain about pregnancy and all the issues I was facing, she is the kind of doctor which every woman wanted during their pregnancy. She is very friendly, and motivates for the positives and guide in a direction which is necessary for to be mothers and there shouldn't be any postpartum depression. Love the way she talks, and the way she explains about everything. 
I had a BP issue in my last few weeks of pregnancy but she amazingly handled and also tried for normal delivery but at the end baby's head got stuck in umbilical cord. Hence, had to do c section, but I didn't get any problem and got very active after 2-3 days of operation. All thanks to Meeta mam of the way she handled.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr Meeta Chawhan in Cloudnine Hospital during my pregnancy and today I am here writing regarding how glad I am to meet Meeta ma'am. Pregnancy is a very important phase of life and I am grateful that I chose Meeta ma'am for those 9 months. I can't thank Meeta ma'am for the support she has been in during such times. There is no better doctor than Meeta ma'am if you are looking for a gynaecologist not in Whitefield but the entire Bangalore. She is the best in her profession with no additional medicines or tests but what is actually required. She is a strong believer of Natural remedies and there is nothing better as well.I recommend Dr Meeta in any situation. There is no way you will feel that the decision of consulting with the doctor is wrong in any way

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: After reading the reviews of Dr. on practo, we decided to consult her. The entire 9 months journey was satisfactory but the  we shud not wait for any complications last minute. My delivery happened 10 days before the due date. Later we came to know that the doctor was going on leave for a week which was not informed to us earlier therefore we presume the advise was intentional. We opted for normal delivery hence artificial pain was induced. Due to lot of pain we were skeptical whether to go for c section. Never did the doctor encouraged to try. Her advise during the labour period was also baised towards opting for  a c section. I believe if she wud have motivated once we could have gathered courage and strength for normal as I was 7.5 cm dilated. I dint have a positive experience during my labour *** *** ****** ********* *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had a good experience with Dr.Meeta during my second pregnancy. With her support and guidance, we were blessed with a healthy baby girl. Overall pregnancy journey was smooth and hurdle free with her support and guidance. Thanks a lot Dr. Meeta.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Meeta Chawhan is one of the busiest Doctors but always meets you with a smile and greeting. She's highly proficient and consults both offline and online which ensures that you can meet her at short notice as well. I'd have a list of questions noted down which she'll answer before even asking so she understands what you'd be thinking at various stages of pregnancy. I consulted her for 2nd pregnancy and she guided me on overall wellness post delivery. Throughout the process she explains things in detail and calms your nerves down. Her demenour is always friendly and approachable.

I'd like to thank her for making my pregnancy journey smooth and would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor is very practical and  always pushes her patients towards a normal delivery. She instills that thought right from the beginning and keeps pushing us for it throughout. She is very transparent with the reports thats we receive and pro actively gives medicines(only if needed) and solutions for any complications she may have noted. 
Otherwise she s a person who gives only home remedies for any issue you mau face. 
She is a stickler for diet which helps us gain only as much weight as we should . 
She is just great.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: You have been an angel && a blessing guiding us through the ups and downs.Thanks is just a word but we have the gratitude for your efforts  and care.You are a credit to your profession and we truly appreciate what all  u did.Thank you for all your help and guidance to bring our princess to us!! tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

She will be very friendly and provide timely medicine and suggetions for my babies weight improvement. We went to cloudnine Bangalore in the 9ty month.i have got labour pains on the last day of EDD. We admitted in the hospital immediately. After 6 hours of labour pains meeta did normal delivery for me and we are blessed with baby boy. There were no side effects post delivery. I became perfectly alright within a month and stiches got cured. 

Finally i want to mention One thing that we strongly recommend Dr. MEETA  if you want to go for normal delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We consulted Dr Meeta Chawhan for my first pregnancy and had a brilliant experience. we started visting Dr Meeta after my first trimester.Though we had lots of ups and downs throughout my pregnancy she made everything ease by her great support and guidance. She always advises for healthy diet and natural remedies rather than prescribing unwanted medicines. Inspite of the tough journey  we had, Dr Meeta had  delivered our little angel via emergency  C section. We are forever  thankful to Dr meeta and her team for their care and support throughout our journey. She is extremely professional and literary the nicest doctor you could ever ask for. We would highly recommend Dr. Meeta Chawhan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr.Meeta is a very friendly and practical doctor.She makes her patients understand things in natural and logical ways so that they will stay calm and relaxed.She always recommends natural ways of healing, suggesting easy home remedies, explaining proper reason for the problem and giving simple solution for them,instead of prescribing any high cost or brand freaks medicines. Though it was for first time, because of her I stayed calm and comfortable throughout my pregnancy without any worries and panics and was able to deliver a healthy baby. Will always remain grateful and thankful to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: This was my first pregnancy and I was very impatient initially. Dr. Meeta was the driving force who not only used to make me feel comfortable but also listened to all my queries very patiently. She gave great tips to deal with the prenatal problems.The best part is that she recommends very less medicines and always recommends home remedies.She encouraged me to be active throughout my pregnancy which eventually helped me to recover on time post delivery .Always takes care of your concern patiently,assures me for normal delivery,i was also ready for that.But due to some complication i decided to go for C section.During the operation also she was talking to me and making me comfortable and was giving moral support.I had a healthy baby boy delivered by Dr. Meeta on 18th May,2018.A big big thanks to Dr. Meeta for bringing our bundle of joy in this world.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: As this is my first pregnancy having dilama to choose the gynecologist near to whietfield. Atlast really glad that we took the right decision to choose Dr. Meeta as our Doctor. She is extremely friendly, understanding and remembering the past  followup history and giving solution immediately.She greets every followup with pleasant smile which makes us more comfortable and trust her completely. She listened to all our queries very patiently and addressed them correctly. She did not gave un necessary medicines and tests. Her reassuring words gave us more strength to become parents. She makes us feel safe and Happily. She is well experienced gynecologist. Our vist continue through out 9 months journey and had blessed twins safely. We strongly recommend her to others.-SahithyaHarish

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My age was 34 when I conceived.It was my first pregnancy. I was very scared about it. Every time when I visited her, the warm welcome and the positivity I got from her was the most important thing I needed. Also during pregnancy I was having  spotting issue for which I have to visit hospital sometimes in odd timings, she always helped out in those timings also. Rather then giving supplements she suggested to have proper diet ,infact she explained in detail which food need to be added.Thanks to her now we are proud parents of a sweet Lil boy.Overall we had wonderful experience with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Coming all the way from different state in 2nd trimester. I was searching for the doctors who could be best for me and luckily I found Dr. Meeta who guided me throughout my journey and in the month of May we blessed with a baby girl.She was kind enough to understand the complete case and took it up with complete responsibility.Her smile and positive attitude not only motivated me but also gave me a confidence during my pregnancy.She was always available to clear my doubts.I have seen very less doctors who prefer home remedies over medicenes and she is one of them.I will strongly recommend Dr Meeta.Thank you so much mam for your support and kindness.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My husband and I cherish my pregnancy and delivery experience at Cloudnine with Dr.Meeta Chawhan..She is on time. Very Frank about the ups and downs and without hesitation gives us all the information that we should know. The most satisfying aspect of my doctor visits and checkups is the time the doctor spends with me listening, addressing my doubts and encouraging the fact that I walk out without any second thoughts about my currrent state..If this is something you want for your checkups then Meeta doctor is a goto person for it

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),Surgical Abortion,
review: Dr Meeta was a blessing for us. I had a lot of complications in my pregnancy including hypertension, subchronic hematoma (huge), short cervix, high blood glucose, low baby weight.. but she always guided us perfectly and we sailed through. She never gave us false assurances but at the same time we always felt positive after meeting her and that i think is most important quality of a doctor (being realistic and motivating at the same time) especially when you are in a complex situation and you look for an expert guidance. Her treatment and assessment was perfect for me and i am very happy that i found her and she could handle my case. Infact her way of explanation and guidance is so good that i now know how to easily control my blood glucose level by balancing the proportions. An absolute go to person for any pregnancy issues. Highly highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: So let's start with the word Thank you for Dr Meeta what an lovely and overwhelming experience it was i would recommend everyone who's is looking for right doctor for right guidance on fertility and after conceiving pre and post delivery guidance as it is my own experience I can suggest her.Her strengths are her knowledge her friendliness and most importantly she push u for  natural way  of doing things and taking care of urself rather than taking unnecessary medication lots of appreciation from my side and i will recommend her to the evyone *** *** ******* *** **** ************** thumbs up!!!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had a previous miscarriage and pcod from a long time. So I was very deligent about choosing the right doctor and I was lucky enough that my decision was right to get the proper care under meeta mam.  Throughout the pregnancy I had issues like low baby weight, anemia, bleeding during 12th week and low amniotic fluid level and finally cord around the neck during my labor. For all of these issues meeta mam suggested only natural methods like food exercise and water and I delivered a healthy baby boy.  More than anything I was confident that I was in the safest hands. I want to thank you wholeheartedly for bringing my little one to the world safely.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had visited Dr. Meeta for my fibroid surgery. I had a huge fibroid which was almost of 10cm and was causing a lot of discomfort during my periods. Because of the fibroid my periods were so painful that I was not able to do my daily activities and used to be stuck to bed. Dr. Meeta suggested me to get the fibroid removed through a surgery although I was too afraid because of the word surgery still ma'am explained me the issues and the procedures so well that I decided to take upon the surgery. It was a Laproscopic surgery and now it's been almost a month of my surgery n I'm back to my normal life. Without any complications and painless period.I'm really glad I met Dr. Meeta for my surgery every thing went so smooth. She is a real gem to our health sector....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We consulted Dr Meeta during my Pregnancy.She always gives preference to home remedies and avoids unnecessary medication.She advised to take protein rich diet and as a result of this I did not gain much weight during the pregnancy which also helped in coming back to my original weight after delivery.She also adviced to exercise daily during pregnancy which helps to maintain good health during pregnancy and after delivery.She is very friendly and trustworthy, always listens and clarify all doubts in a detail.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is very good for us through out the pregnancy for my wife, whatever small things she faced difficulty, doctor suggested everything naturally and helped her to get free, doctor never suggests any medicine unecessarily, 36th week we went to doctor as my wife got pains but doctor suggested this are early ones not to worry and said labour pains will be different, we thought she may take call by giving manual pains and go with delivery but she is very firm until 38th week completion unless any complications she won't go for delivery as baby will completely grow by 38-40 weeks, I appreciate her for that as many doctors just say let us go with pains and do the c-section, but she is not. only thing is hospital prices are very high on all around* ** ** ***** **** **** **** ******* **** ******* ********* ********** ** *** **** **** ** *******

You will get lot of confidence after talking to her. She delivered our baby safe and healthy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Meeta was my doctor through my pregnancy and delivery. It was my first pregnancy and I was of advanced maternal age so I had a lot of questions and concerns at every step. Dr Meeta would always patiently answer my questions in detail. I found her extremely supportive throughout. I was detected with Gestational diabetes and she helped me manage it with just lifestyle changes. Both me and my husband liked her pragmatic approach to dealing with all kinds of situations that happen during pregnancy. We were very happy to have Dr Meeta as our Doctor and would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This is our first pregnancy and Dr.Meeta mam has taken good care of us .In each and every moment of this journey she was beside me and has given very good support to fulfill our dreams .she is friendly doctor and listen to your issues patiently and help to clear those issues .she takes pregnancy to be smooth and even while delivering the baby she gives good moral support.Basing on your physical condition she prefers few exercises and walk to make you fit in entire pregnancy period and to take care of yourself and newborn baby.she prefers homemade food and help to clear any odds with this and prefer protienacious food which will give healthy weight gain to your baby and strength to you.    we are very much happy to suggest Dr.Meeta mam to all who are going through this beautiful journey of pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was referring to Dr. Meeta from the start of my pregnancy. She is very friendly, straight forward and active person with a smile always. She guided me correctly with respect to diet and medications. Always suggested natural treatments. I trusted and followed the same which helped me deliver a healthy baby. She always responded to my messages when i had concerns. Though I had aimed for normal delivery and Dr tried her best for normal but due to emergency situation had to undergo LSCS. Though I was very scared, she stayed positive, was very kind and comforting during my labour and delivery process and I blindly trusted and believed in her. Really appreciate the Staffs, Duty Drs and Nurses who helped us in this entire journey. Thank you Dr and Cloudnine - Whitefield for making our journey smooth during this pandemic time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: me and my husband we are blessed with baby boy last month.  all thanks to Dr Meeta Chawhan.  during this covid situation we were very scared about our hospital visit and all. but all goes smooth. Dr Meeta is very friendly and she helped me with all home remedies and very less medicine. she always prefer for normal delivery though I have gone through c sec because of some emergency but she was trying normal Delivery till last minute. she was very particular about healthy weight gain. after c sec the very next day she told me to start walking a little bit.and within two weeks I was completely healed. the whole experience was amazing with Meeta mam. highly recommended and it's a blessing that we went to meeta mam for our delivery. ❤️

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have consulted Dr. Meeta Chawhan for my pregnancy at Cloudnine Hospital, Whitefield. I also visited her before my pregnancy and since then she is my first choice. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We are happy based on our experience. As Dr. Meeta ma'am guides like a family, approachable,a proper explanation to do's and don't over all a homely treatment. I consulted her for 9 months and she is the person to bring our baby to the world with her safe hands. She holds a great patience answering all our queries and curiosities. She always encourages with a fix voice for normal delivery which is also a signature statement of Cloudnine Hospital. All went well with us without any hindrance. Till date she discuss on health issues of baby's and myself whenever we cross our path in hospital. I thank Dr. Meeta ma'am and the staff of Cloudnine Hospital.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
An amazing human being *** *** **** ****** * ***** I wanted to write the review for a long time but the new baby in our hands did not quite get the time. The first time I met her still I remember Meeta ma'am told me,"Dont search anything in internet related to pregnancy." As it was my first pregnancy my husband and I were nervous when we first visited Dr.Meeta ma'am but from there on the journey till birth of our baby boy was simply a joy ride filled with relief under her supervision.Her timely advice during my early pregnancy on additional supplements kept things well in control. She is very friendly and takes lot of time to explain and address the issues.
I am really blessed to meet her in my life.
I wanted to thank Dr Meeta ma'am for everything that was done for us during our first pregnancy.
3 cheers to u ma'am....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a great experience with Dr Meeta Chawhan during my pregnancy. Being a difficult pregnancy and complicated delivery, I was very worried, but felt at ease under Dr Meeta's guidance. *** ** * **** ******* *** confident Dr, taking minute details in consideration and making right decisions. She is friendly and warm and always reachable when required. She provides genuine suggestions which helped us take decisions regarding additional things like stem cell banking, expressing BM etc. She gives importance to natural care than medications which is very encouraging.

I had a comfortable pregnancy, delivery and post pregnancy which was possible due to Dr Meeta. I would definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I am very happy that I had chosen to go to Dr meeta (last year) at the end of 1st trimester pregnancy. She helped me with all the existing issues I was facing during pregnancy and also helped me deliver vaginally. Her instructions and advice throughout the pregnancy resulted into my normal delivery. She is quite friendly and will not prescribe unnecessary medicines. She answered all the doubts and questions I had during pregnancy and post that in a way that I can understand better. Thanks to her my pregnancy and delivery was so easy. I would happily refer anyone to her for any gyanic issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

reply_text: From what I read here its quite clear you didn't understand anything I advised and recommended. I am glad you finally found a doctor you can understand. Wish you the best in your pregnancy for the future. One suggestion though especially in these difficult times pregnancy is such a beautiful and important phase of your life so when you don't understand any recommendations that your doctor advises instead of jumping to conclusions and trying to spread the negativity around try to talk to your doctor to understand the issues. Will definitely help you with your precious pregnancy outcome.
